Who was it?

11121.content:
It was a pretty normal day. You were playing Suoer Mario 3D World, and you were playing as Peach. You had always liked Peach and thought that she got a lot of bad rep. You had just had Peach enter a pipe, when suddenly, your tv went black. You went over to your wii u to see what was wrong when the ground started to shake! You bought it was an earthquake, until a warp pipe appeared right in front of you! The ground stops shaking and out of the pipe comes Princess Peach! Your mind is currently blown. One of your favorite video game characters has just come into your living room!
Peach: excuse me?
That snapped you out of your daze
You: uh...yes?
Peach: can you tell me where I am? I don't think I've ever been to this part of the Mushroom Kingdom before
You: uh..well...this isn't the mushroom kingdom
Peach: oh! Well, I must be on my way. It way nice meeting you.
Peach turns around to go back into the pipe.
11121.title: Choice A

choices: Peach gets a board game out of the closet
You fix something to eat for the two of you.
111211.content:
The pipe vanished. "It looks like you're staying a little longer. If you want, I can show you the guest room," you offered.
"You wouldn't happen to have anything to do with that warp pipe bringing me here and then disappearing, would you?" Peach asked kind of worried.
"Worried I'm trying to take you hostage? Don't be. I don't know what happened, but I have no issue with you staying," you say as you turn off your Wii U.
"I've been kidnapped so many times that I am a little worried about this kind of situation," Peach replies as you lead her to the guest room.
"With how beautiful you are, I think I could see why someone might be tempted," you tell her. She blushes a bit at this.
"Here you are. I hope you enjoy your stay," you tell her as you open the door to the guest room.
Peach takes a look at the room and then turns around and gives you a kiss on the cheek and says, "I think you've earned that already seeing how you've treated me so far."

111222111.content:
"Okay, now you choose who you want to play as to help save the Sprixie Princesses." you tell Toadstool, who's completely enamored with the bright colors present on screen.

"Hmm, well, it's only natural for me to be the parallel world version of me, right?" Toadstool says a bit nervous to start the adventure. "I think I'll go with this 'Peach' then."

"Even though I am much cuter and prettier than her..."

"Hmm? What was that, Princess?"

"Oh, nothing, nothing~ Let's get going already! Who are you going to be?"

"Luigi's the best jumper in the game so I'm going with him." you tell her.

Her brow furrows as she looks back at you and the TV.

"Aww, Mario won't be joining us then? What a shame..."

"W-well I can always choose to switch whenever we start a level so it's okay, don't be sad!"

Toadstool's big eyes light up, "Okay then! Let's get this show on the road!"

You and Princess Toadstool played for a few hours until you made it to World 6. You were kinda a stickler for 100%ing games so it took longer than you wanted to, especially with needing to teach the princess everything about the game. She picked everything up pretty quickly though and was soon just as good at finding Green Stars and Stamps scattered throughout the land.

"Well....we've been playing for a while, would you like to resume playing tomorrow? We'll be sure to beat other world King Koopa then!" you say, a bit worn out.

"Sure, that's alright with me! But I do have a bone to pick with you, Mister!" Toadstool says, her eyes shifting towards yours, almost...seductively.

"Uhh...w-what is it?" you say.

"I've tallied up the total amount of times we've beaten each other's score on every stage, and it looks like...I've won!" the princess says, showing you a piece of paper with a bunch of tally marks.

"Huh!? Are you serious!? You only won because you picked up like every coin in the level and took all the Green Stars out from under my nose!"

"Be that as it may, a princess doesn't lie. I've won here, and that means..." Toadstool scooted closer to you on the couch, her face now mere inches away from yours "...We're going to play a punishment game!"

You didn't know how to feel about this but you decided to go along. Why not, right?

"Alright...what's my punishment, Princess?" you say defeatedly.

"I'm glad you asked...!"
111222111.title: Continue

1112221111.content:
You almost had to do a double take when you saw what the princess was doing. You always had a small thing for feet, but the fact that Toadstool was allowing you to pleasure her feet was almost unreal.

"Umm...I'm sorry Princess, this is a bit much...I don't know if I can--"

"You will do it or else I can think of even worse punishments!" Toadstool quickly interrupted, puffing out her chest and looking away with a pouting face. Was she really into this and you just never caught on?

The moment she took off her sparkling red heels you caught a whiff of her feet. Clearly the smell has been contained in them for quite a while. They didn't exactly smell bad but there was definitely a hint of sweat.

Only after a couple seconds did you realize you were staring at her smooth perfectly pale looking feet and immediately looked back up to see Toadstool looking back at you with a huge smirk on her face.

"Hmm? What is it? Is there something...that caught your attention?" she said, putting her right foot close to your face and wiggling her toes.

You stared at her red painted toenails for a few moments and realized that the sweaty smell from before was much stronger now, yet...you didn't dislike it...

Her toes didn't seem to have that much toe jam in-between them but there were tiny bits here and there that were hardly noticeable. For some reason this didn't bother you, her feet were certainly beautiful...

You slowly raise your hands to grab onto her right foot to hold it into place. It was so soft...you almost wanted to press your face into it but kept your cool as best you could. Maybe if Toadstool would be into it...should you ask...?

Snapping yourself out of your trance you gave one last look at the princess' face, who was staring back at you with the same curious expression you had. Clearly she was just as invested in this little game as you were. Her face and body were quite beautiful, you could even tell under her huge dress. You could see quite a bit of her leg which was a rare sight to see, and God were they amazing. Sadly you couldn't see far enough to her thighs...but maybe soon.

Anyways, back to her feet. Deciding not to stall any further, you stuck your tongue out towards the sole of her foot and...wait...is that little specks of dirt on her sole? Oh lord, why were you getting turned on by this sweaty, smelly, and slightly dirtied princess' foot? You wanted to taste it so bad, press it to your face, kiss it, everything...

Your tongue made contact with the hot sole of the beautiful princess and you couldn't stop licking, you liked it way too much! You wanted more! You looked up while still licking to see the princess with her eyes closed and a smile on her face, she seemed to be quietly humming to herself, it was quite cute. The taste of sweat was absolutely delicious, you couldn't get enough. You wanted to clean her whole foot, both of her feet! You couldn't believe you ended up enjoying this "punishment" game so much...

As you kept licking the sweat and grime off of the princess' toes, heels, and soles, your mind wandered you wouldn't have minded if this had kept up for a bit longer...

"H-hey...are you listening? Hey! Stop please!" you heard Toadstool's voice call out to you before getting a soft kick in the face. It was more playful than anything so it didn't hurt much.

You lay down on your couch face up, you couldn't believe what was about to happen. You stared up at the imposing figure of Princess Toadstool, who stood over you with a kind yet mischievous smile.

You were about to become a cushion for her butt for who knows how long...

"Ah, w-wait Prin-phhmmmmphhh!" before you could even pretend you didn't want to do this you were cut off by the princess' curvy and juicy bottom coming in contact with your face. The many layered dress made her colossal ass seem even larger and comfier. It felt like a hundred pillows were surrounding your face at once.

The only noises you could hear were the occasional button clicking from the controller Toadstool was using and what seemed to be Toadstool's stomach growling. Princess Toadstool gets a cheeky grin on her face again, and turns around for a moment, showing you her beautiful auburn red hair. After fiddling around with the pockets you had no idea she had in her dress, she pulls out a mushroom and pushes it toward your face, motioning you to eat it.

"This special mushroom will turn you into a piece of clothing of mine!"

"It'll do what!?" you reply back, shocked and honestly a bit intrigued.

"Just as I said, and trust me, I've used it on plenty of my Toad servants before. Don't worry, you'll turn back within a day! A perfect amount of time for a punishment, don't you think? All I have to do is think of what clothing I want you to be while you eat it and presto!

We might not be able to communicate clearly though, it's kinda finicky on when it chooses to let thoughts transmit between the wearer and the wearee. That's really the only downside. Of course all your senses will remain intact, how could it be a punishment without smell or taste?
So what do you say? Are you brave enough?"

You were a bit fearful to try something so dangerous sounding but the temptation of what she might turn you into fed into your morbid and somewhat perverted curiosity...so you decided to eat the whole mushroom...

"Wow, he actually ate it..." Toadstool mumbled with a slight giggle.

"Ah. That sorta fits with what Toadstool told me," Daisy said in a calmer tone. With that, your fear returned. "But you seem too cute to give back to Toadstool, so you could marry her. I mean, she has the Mario bros by her side all the time!"

Did Kootie Pie Koopa win the brawl of the nintendo cartoon ladies or did Daisy win?

Kootie Pie has pure strength and trickery on her side, as well as her magic wand. She also has her minions, which tend to be from the Super Mario Bros- Super Mario World range of enemies.

However, she has a vicious temper and can be easily distracted. She can also be rude enough that the others would be willing to team up against her. She also has a strong hate, possibly weakness, to cold temperatures.

But what about Daisy?

Princess of Sarasaland, which consists of four different kingdoms. So she might have more political power than the others... which doesn't count much for the fight.

1112221122111121211312121111121.content:
You watched in fear as the princess thought about what she was going to do for your punishment. She had magic, and could do anything she wanted after all.

She eventually takes her hand off your chin and turns back to you smiling. Not a creepy or mischievous one, but a calm, sincere one.

"Oh it's alright." she says as you sigh in relief, "You were only trying to be helpful."

"Thank you for understanding princess." you say, relieved.

"And to show no hard feelings," Toadstool begins, "I want to share this with you." she sincerely says pulling out a mushroom. It seemed off though, one half being pink and white, the other being normal. She smiled as she broke the mushroom in half, offering you the pink side.

Not wanting to make her angry or seem rude, you take the mushroom, and bring it up to your mouth and bite into it. It tasted sweet. Like peaches and fruit. You quickly finish your half as the princess eats the other. As she finishes off her half, she smirks and places a hand on her hip.

Suddendly you begin feeling weird, and in a bright flash, you feel completely different. You look down at yourself and gasp. You were in Toadstool's dress, your hands shot to your chest, feeling the soft, large breasts underneath. Red hair falling to your face, but your leg still hurt.

You looked at where Toadstool was standing a moment ago, but instead of the princess, you find your own body smirking at you, hand on it's hip.

"There," Toadstool says in your voice. You're at a loss for words.

"Bu-b-but... wha-..." Knowing what you're trying to say, Toadstool, now you, walked over to your side, the smirk not leaving your former face.

"This is your punishment, 'Princess.'" she explains, "Since you seem to think a Princess can only be helped and pampered and not help others, then you shouldn't be arguing about it if you are one." the shock still hadn't left your now soft, petite face. Toadstool clapped your hands together, and left the room, "I'll get you your breakfast Princess." You had finally found your voice.

"But Toadsto-" Your own body stuck it's head through the door, shaking a finger.

"Uh, uh. I'm not Toadstool. you're Toadstool, and I don't think a proper princess like yourself should be trying to help a man like me." She says, you blush, there wasn't going to be any changing her mind here...
1112221122111121211312121111121.title: You're a Princess now!

“What…?” you asked.

“Yep, bras and panties are going to be part of your future. Those mushrooms can only be found one month of the year and the day I arrived here was the last day of that one month period. Also, because of how often I get kidnapped, it’s a nice change of pace to be the one helping out instead, Princess,” your former body explained while reminding you of the effects of that mushroom.

You had made it past the museum in Egypt at the start of the game when your former body asked, “What exactly is this game?”

“It’s a stealth platformer called Sly 2. You play as a gang of thieves who steal, but have an honor code to only steal from other criminals,” you answer. 111222112211112121131212111112121.content:
"Would you be interested in a romantic dinner with me? Maybe we can see where such a dinner would lead. Don't worry, I'll fix it and help you to the table," your former body offered. "Why are you doing this?" you asked. "This is the kind of dinner I was hoping to have if I ever found anyone I was interested in. That's why I'm doing this for you," Toadstool told you.

This is why she was offering to do this. She wanted to play out her dream date with you. On the one hand, this meant she did like you. On the other hand, you were on the opposite side of the relationship. "I guess so," you tell your former body. "While I cook the dinner, maybe you'd like to take a relaxing bath," Toadstool suggested. "It might be a good idea," you tell Toadstool. Toadstool helps you to the bathroom and helps you get undressed, then helps you into the tub.You adjust the water temperature and Toadstool leaves.

After the tub fills up, you turn off the water and sit there and relax. You think about your situation. Could you have eaten a partially hallucinogenic mushroom? Could Toadstool have lied to you about the mushroom to teach you about lying? Despite these thoughts, you do try to at least relax as you take a bath. 11122211221111212113121211212121112121.content:
The princess sneezed, causing everyone to fly back. You were a little dizzy from the landing. When you looked around, you could see the damaged vehicles, but you couldn't seem to find the general or the soldiers. They seemed to have vanished. Meanwhile, you're lifted up to Princess Toadstool's face. She gives a friendly smile.

"Excuse me." She says. Both of you giggle, but there was still one problem. You needed to get her out of the city so she didn't hurt anyone or get into any more trouble. You then had an idea of where to take her. You tell her which way to go. She listened carefully and made sure not to step on anyone. After about thirty minutes, the two of you finally get to a lonely house.

"This is my family's summer home. We use it for reunions, but the next one isn't until next year. No one comes here besides that time, so it's perfect for you to stay." The Princess was a little confused.

"I can't fit in there though." You explained to her that the grass would be soft enough, she couldn't hurt anyone, and you'll feed her as much as you could. "What about the portal?"

"First of all, think of it as like a secret base. Second, I don't think the portal is connected to my house, it may appear where you are since you're from the other world." You say, she nods and sets you down. She moves around it until she finds a comfortable spot and sits down. "Is there anything I can get you princess?"

"Some tasty food would be nice." She says. You nod and tell her to wait until you get back. You walk to the nearest town and buy tons of food. Though it's very heavy, you still make it back. When you get to the house . . .

1112221122111121211312121121212111221112.content: Princess Toadstool despite having committed what one would actually call video game murder was surprisingly happy and pleased with herself "Whoopee,Hooray! I did it! Ohh it feels so good to for once in my life do something like stomping on a Goomba on my own!" As she jumped up and down apparently forgetting she was nearly 60 feet tall people screamed as roads cracked and a few office buildings toppled over and Toadstool realized what she had just done gasped "Oops I'm very sorry about that! Is everyone alright?" Nobody replied due to the dizziness everyone was experiencing right now so instead she turned to you on the ground and picked you up "Did you see that? I finally defeated a Goomba all on my own!" You nodded "You sure did princess but I bet you probably crushed a lot of them back within the Mushroom Kingdom!" Toadstool shook her head "No not really I spent more time running away from or getting captured by them and Koopa Troopas,not to mention Shy Guys,Trousers,Snifits,Flurries and any of King Koopa's other lackies but this.....it felt so good to finally do something that didn't involve the Marios to come and save me I could get used to being this BIG..." You sigh and point downwards at the tiny people at her feet "Maybe you would but they sure wouldn't like seeing a 59 foot Princess romping through their fair town 24/7." Toadstool's good mood disappeared replaced by swift concern "Ohh yeah I forget sorry again everyone!" She called down below with a gracious smile but rather than fear and anger towards this Godzilla sized princess the people cheered and applauded once more "Thank you everyone glad to help out!" Toadstool beamed happily having never felt this good the only thing that could make this a happier day was King Koopa's ultimate defeat and banishment from her kingdom altogether "Well I should get going as I really don't want to cause you or your town anymore destruction than I already did." She stated firmly as she sought to head back to your house and wait until she shrunk back to normal size but a random citizen screamed out "No wait please stay for a while you saved our lives from that thing the least you could do is...." And he paused briefly and you soon saw why as he was one of the local reporters for the town's newspapers "Give us a interview and tell us about yourself and where you come from." Toadstool looked highly puzzled "Huh? You mean none of you are remotely aware of who I am? I'm Princess Toadstool of the Mushroom Kingdom!" "No you're not the Princess of the Mushroom Kingdom is Princess Peach!" Said a young boy in the crowd with a Super Mario Galaxy T-shirt on "And you look nothing like her besides she's got blonde hair and you have red hair." Toadstool huffed annoyed "Well in reality I'm Princess Peach I just look different..." "No you're not!" Screamed the boy again "Yes I AM!" Toadstool cried out "Princess Toadstool,Princess Peach does it really matter? I also rule most of the Mushroom Kingdom." "Really? Then does Mario,Luigi,Yoshi,Wario,Princess Daisy and Rosalina exist in your Mushroom Kingdom too?" Asked the boy Toadstool frowned "Well Mario and Luigi do of course but Bowser where I come from he's called King Koopa as for these people called Yoshi,Princess Daisy,Wario and Rosalina I have never heard of any of them before who are they?" She asked curiously "Characters who are part of the Super Mario video game universe we know!" The boy said with a cold smirk you then spoke up from Toadstool's palm "Well she speaks the truth son she really is Princess Peach but she comes from a cartoon version of Mario based on the first two original NES games you know Super Mario Bros and Super Mario Bros 2 that's why she looks different." You carefully explained but the boy didn't buy a word of your story "Whatever I still don't believe she's the actual Princess Peach...." "YES I AM!" Toadstool cried out completely frustrated "Oh yeah prove it!" The boy smirked folding his arms what should the princess do now?

"You leave him alone!!" The princess stands over you with a frying pan in her hand. "You can take me! But I wouldn't let you hurt him!" "No...princess.... Don't..." You say weakly. The princess looks at you "no! I won't let him hurt you!" Koopa watches this and realizes that the princes has feelings for you, then he gets an idea. "NOOOO!!!"says the princess, who immediately jumps in after him. But what the princess didn't expect was that koopa had expected her to do this, so he set the portal to go two different ways. 1112221122111121212221121.content:
Her burp was so strong, it pushed you and the crates straight into the wall. Though it smelled a lot, you didn't care and ran to her side. There were tears running down her cheeks. When you untied her, she hugged you hard.

"Where have you been? I'm now the fat princess of the mushroom kingdom." She said.

"Don't worry, it's not too bad. Let's get you out of here before the others come back." You said. She nodded, still a little frightened. You picked her up and carried her out. Though her weight was like a truck, that didn't stop you from taking her to a secret house. You were the only one who knew about it. It was hidden deep in a cave, the perfect place to hide from those idiots. There was also a hole at the top, so light shined in. You got her inside and put her on the bed. Her belly was big enough to the point where her dress couldn't hide it. You started to rub it, she was still crying.

"I'm going to be like this forever, aren't I?" She asked. You shook your head.

"Not if I can help it. If you want to get back to normal, I'll do everything I can. For now, just get some rest." You said, and kissed her on the forehead.

"Please . . Don't leave me . . I don't want nightmares." You grabbed her hand.

"I'll be right here the whole time holding your hand." To make her more comfortable, you sang a lullaby. She fell asleep, still holding your hand. You sat there for two hours straight, not letting go. You were starting to get tired, but you agreed to stay next to her no matter what. Every once in a while, she burped a little, it didn't smell good. Before you knew it, you couldn't stay awake anymore, you fell into a deep sleep.

You had a nightmare if the princess getting hurt. No matter what you did, you couldn't get to her. You started to cry, when you heard Toadstool's voice. You woke up and shook your head. Toadstool was next to you, holding your hand.

"Looks like you were the one having a nightmare, even though I was the one captured." She looked down at her belly. "While you were asleep, I found a punching bag in the closet. I tried punching it so I was prepared if those guys showed up again. I can punch hard now." She grinned. You shuddered, but you were happy for her. Toadstool . . .

111222112211112121222112111.content:
As you watched her work out, you were amazed at how determined she was. You eventually fell asleep watching her. Your dream was weird. Princess Toadstool was tiny, but holding up a planet sized weight. She was lifting it up in no time. You tried to run towards her, but she didn't get any closer. When she was done, she threw the weight away and suddenly grew to a giant. She looked down at you.

"So, you tried to make me fat huh? Well how do you like me now?" She asked and brought her foot over your head. She must have though you were one of the bullies from before. "You're pathetic, like a stupid spider. Let's see you die like a spider." Princess Toadstool brought her foot down right on top of you.

You suddenly woke up and fell over. You looked around, but didn't see the princess. You called out to her and waited.

"Don't worry, I'm sure she'll be back." A voice said, one you were afraid of. Before you could turn around, a hand covered your mouth. The other two showed their faces.

"Hello freak, remember us? We captured your girlfriend."

"She may be gone now, but she'll be back for you, and this time, we'll make sure she eats like a good girl." The main one, which was still behind you, making sure you didn't run away, whispered in your ear.

"How would you like to be her meal? It's the least you could do for helping her get away from us. Don't worry, we'll make sure your death is . . .very . . .painful." He said. You struggled until you heard a loud noise. The others started covering their ears as well.

"Boss, what's happening!?" One of the minions cried out. Suddenly, you heard a familiar voice.

"Oh, I decided to drop in, I wanted to make sure you three were rewarded for before." You look back to see Princess Toadstool drop in from the hole in the ceiling. She floated down using an umbrella. You were amazed, she looked as if she hadn't been fat before. She looked amazing.

"Well well well. If it isn't the so called princess. We missed you, I suggest you surrender, . . . That is, if you don't want your friend to get hurt." The main one said. The princess shook her head.

"I'm not surrendering, but you're out numbered. It's a good thing you didn't look behind you." She giggled. Even though you kept staring at her, the bully turned around to see what she meant. He only saw his two minions and was very confused. He started to look towards the princess when she suddenly grabbed him around the neck. He screamed, the others weren't sure what to do. The princess held him and grabbed a large rock. She hit him on the side of the head, causing him to pass out. She looked at the others, angrily. "Do you want to be next?" The others quickly ran away, causing the princess to laugh.

"Are you alright princess?" You asked, getting up.

"Am I alright? Are you kidding? I feel like I can run around the whole planet! I feel great! As for this guy, I don't think he's feeling too good." Princess Toadstool pointed to the knocked out enemy. The two of you tied him up and brought him inside. When you got him settled, the princess hugged you. It was nice being hugged when she was now back to normal. "Hey, I think we should punish my captor. Let's . . .

You tried to hand her cone back, but she wanted to eat it a slightly different way, she made you hold it close to you and stay still, which was a little difficult since it was cold. Princess Toadstool then leaned in and started to eat it. She kept getting closer to your chest, until she was practically touching it. The royal girl then licked ant that was on your chest. It started to tickle, making you giggle. You looked at her. She looked beautiful in her jumpsuit, though it looked a little tight around her boobs.

The next place you took her was the movie theater. You took her to see one of your favorite movies. At the end of it though, you looked over and saw she fell asleep. She had crumbs on her, and looked so peaceful. You carefully picked her up and took her back to your house. When you got there, the lights were still off. You sneaked in the front door and set the princess on the couch. You put her blanket over her and went to bed. That night, you dreamed of her being happy. She said she wanted to be close, and to never let you go. You woke up the next morning, feeling really good. Suddenly, . . .

11122211221112122111.content:
Princess Toadstool looked as happy as ever. You were no longer embarrassed of her looking at you in your underwear. You walked up and hopped on your lap.

"Did you have fun last night? I know I did. Also, your mom came to me this morning and asked how it went. I told her I had a great time." She said. You smiled and kissed her, making her blush. "Aw, thank you. Well the real reason I came in was I thought of something fun we can do. You need to get on your knees though." You smiled, she seemed to have fun ideas, even though they tended to be embarrassing, so you listened.

You got on your knees and looked up at her. She went around behind you and giggled. Very carefully, she moved so that you were in between her legs. You were able to see was her smooth legs, white underwear and her bra. To make sure you didn't move, she sat down on you. You could feel her big butt on you. She sighed with happiness.

"You make for a very good seat. Be glad I'm doing this, not even Mario has gotten this close." Princess Toadstool wasn't planning to get up anytime soon. Suddenly, your mother came in and asked where you were. Princess Toadstool stayed quiet, but pointed down to her dress. Mom said nothing, gave a thumbs up and left. Meanwhile, you were having trouble breathing. You tried to call to her, but her dress prevented your voice from getting out. You only had one option.

You reached up and started to tickle her stomach. She started giggling, you could tell because you could feel her shaking. You kept tickling, turning her small giggle into a laugh. You needed to hurry though, your oxygen was running out. You kept going, thinking you were about to faint, when she got up and moved. Light came into view and you could see your bedroom again.

She was still giggling a bit. You told her what almost happened. She kept smiling.

"Don't worry, if you fainted, I would have simply kissed you until you came back. Anyway, let's go to the kitchen, I'm starving." You told her you wanted to sleep in a bit more. She nodded and left. You went back to sleep. This time, you dreamed you were tiny and the princess was big. She covered you in her dress like before, however, this time a strange hand inside grabbed you. It brought you higher until you were at her underwear. Just then, her legs started to close in. Though you struggled, Toadstool was too strong. Just when the walls were on you, you woke up. You went downstairs to find . . .
11122211221112122111.title: Imprisoned in her dress

111222112211121221112.content:
You saw the door was opened a little bit, which meant someone else was in there, since dad never left it open. You looked to see if anyone was watching and entered. When you got down there, you saw the Princess was looking at some weird bottles.

"Princess! What are you doing here? What if dad comes in?" You asked a little scared. She shrugs.

"Don't worry, your parents went out to a movie five minutes ago. We have this place to ourselves. I can see that your dad likes to create things." She said. You were worried that there might be a camera somewhere. Though you didn't like it, you also looked around. The two of you saw different inventions, one of them was a chair that could groom your hair. However, when the princess was looking at something else, you noticed a notebook on the table. You flipped through the pages until something caught your eye. Your eyes got bigger when you read it.

"Princess . . . You may want to come here . . . Like now." You said. Princess Toadstool came over and read what you had seen. The letters at the top bolder and read "The Portal". Below it was a note from your dad.

"I think there is a problem with it. This portal can open up to different dimensions and bring people here or take people somewhere else. I've tried it once, but it didn't open, unless . . . It opened somewhere else, or it's delayed. If only I can make it so I control where it goes, then I could send my wife and son to the Mushroom Kingdom, since they like it so much. The portal still needs work, but I think it's almost done, I just need some help finishing it. I'll get a friend here when I can, though I won't tell my family. They shouldn't know yet, they don't even know how many things I have invented. I don't know how I'll tell them. . ."

The note stopped there. Both you and the princess were surprised.

"So . . I'm here because your dad made the portal?" She asked. You shrugged, honestly at this point, you didn't know what to believe.

"Maybe we shouldn't tell him that we know, I don't know how he'll react." You said. The princess nodded and turned around. "I'm sorry, I had no idea, if I did, maybe . . ." You started to say.

"Hush, it clearly says you didn't know, plus, there's no reason for me to be mad. From what I have learned, humans will do weird things. But enough about that, I found this weird gun looking thing, should we try it out?" She asked, holding a green gun that looked like a water pistol.

"Oh go ahead, not like he builds weapons. Unless he has a basement under the basement that I don't know of." You say. The princess smiles and fires it at you.

She pulls out a chocolate bar. Even though you're a dog now, you shouldn't be allergic to it. You ate it and burped. "Good boy, now let's play." She said. The princess wanted to play . . .

Your father entered, looking unhappy. He told you to come downstairs immediately. You obeyed him, a little worried. You went downstairs and sat down on the couch with Princess Toadstool, she started to hug you. She didn't think anything was wrong.

"I know that the two of you sneaked out last night." Your father said. You knew that was a rule, to never go out at night. "I think something else is up too. You two seem to be together a lot. So I want you to tell me right now, is there anything you're not telling me?" You didn't know how to answer, you couldn't challenge him. However, the princess was more confident.

"Okay, so maybe we went out last night. However, we're old enough, so why are you worried? We just went out for ice cream, it's not like we went to a strip club or anything. Also, of course we're together a lot. First off, he's my best friend. The other reason is he's the only person I know here besides you and your lovely wife." The princess said, and hugged you again. Your father was still a bit mad, but he honestly couldn't argue with those reasons.

"All right, fine. I'll let you off the hook for now, but you better not sneak out again. If you do, I will punish you." He said and went into the kitchen for breakfast.

"Thank you. It feels like he's always trying to find a way to yell at me." You say. "But is it true? Am I your best friend?" The princess nods and hugs you a third time.

The two of you went to go get breakfast. Your mom had made waffles. Princess Toadstool loved them. She asked you to feed a bit to her. You nodded and used her fork to pick up a piece and put it in her mouth. The two of you giggled, however, you couldn't help but notice your dad was watching closely. Throughout breakfast, Princess Toadstool ate six waffles. When you had one piece left, she decided to feed it to you. Though you ate it, she accidentally spilled syrup on your shirt.

"Oops, let me clean it up." Princess Toadstool said. Instead of getting a towel, she leaned in and started to lick it up. Though you were worried about what dad was going to say, your mom just laughed.

"Is it good?" She asked.

"Oh yes, very tasty." Princess Toadstool replied. Your dad grumbled, but mom told him to be quiet and said the two of you were only having fun. You were a bit more relaxed when you saw your mom took your side. You knew she like Princess Toadstool, but you weren't sure if she would go against the man of the house. Princess Toadstool looks up at your mom. "Hey can we . . ."

I have no desire to take you there unless....you wanted to go." She added with a mischievous smile

He's more obsessed with pasta than helping me free my people and Luigi well he's a bit too much of a what's the word a wimp to be taken seriously at times! Toadstool confessed and you were surprised to see actual cartoon hearts floating above her head but still you didn't reply you already knew she developed a serious crush on you moments later you arrived at the store and the princess brought a purple bathing suit for her to wear as you were already wearing your swimming trunks once you headed to the park to head into the pool area.........

Your dad started to argue, but your mom quickly covered his mouth with her hand and told you it was alright. Princess Toadstool said thank you and immediately grabbed your arm. Princess toadstool dragged you upstairs into your room without hesitation, clearly she was excited about something. The princess threw you onto the bed and started going through your clothes.

"Let's see . . I bet there is something I can dress you up in." She said.

"What am I, a doll?" You ask. She looks at you with her big eyes.

"Do you not want me to dress you? I thought we were going to have fun." She said and looked like she was about to cry. After a moment you sighed.

"Okay . . Let's see what you can find." You said, you didn't want to make her unhappy. Besides, if she were to tell your mom, you would face her wrath.

"Yay!" She said and started searching again.

--------------------------------------------------

Meanwhile, downstairs, your parents were having a conversation.

"I just don't think we should let those two get close, what if she hurts him, or kidnaps him?" You father asked, concerned.

"I don't see a reason why she would hurt him, and she doesn't seem like the kidnapping type to me. Besides, we can stop them from being together." Mom replied.

"What if she takes him back to her world? What if she turns into a toad? She is the mushroom princess after all."

"Well, there's no signs of him changing or the fact that the princess can change people like that, and if he goes back to her world with her, we should be happy. It's his life, not ours. Besides, we can let them be mischievous, that's how you and I were when we were younger."

"That princess . . . She's going to get him arrested one of these days."

"For what, eating ice cream? Having fun? How about you trust me for once, okay?" Mom gave dad a kiss,

". . . . . . Okay, I trust you. Hey, can we not tell them about this conversation?"

"No problem."

----------------------------------------

After a while, the princess found a suit, one that you had forgotten about.

"What about this cute one?" The princess said and pulled out your Halloween costume. Your eyes widened when you saw it. It was your pink bunny suit. You only wore it for last Halloween, and it made you feel naked when you had it on.

"Um, can we switch to something else?" You ask, a little embarrassed. The princess shook her head and threw the costume to you.

"I'll even leave the room, but you better tell me when you have it on." The princess left and waited outside the door. Still embarrassed, you took everything off, but your underwear, and started to put on the suit. It still fit you surprisingly. You told her to come in. When she did, her eyes widened when she saw you. "OHHH YOU ARE SO CUTE!" The princess ran over and jumped on you. She rubbed her face against your soft chest. Your mom came in with a couple of carrots as a snack and then saw you. "Look! Isn't he adorable! I just want to pet him and love him forever!" The princess said excitedly. Your mother smiled.

"You look good son. It's a good thing I brought carrots." She giggled at her own joke and set the plate on the table next to you. She left, while giggling.

"Okay princess, right now I'm your pet so tell me what to do." You said, probably shouldn't have because she got super excited when you said that.

"Oh I'm so going to . . ."

You heard a knock at the door. As you stood up, you said, "That's probably the mailman. I'll go check."

Toadstool nodded as she said, "Alright, but I'll keep and ear out if you need anything."

As you neared the door, several envelopes were stuffed into the mail slot. Looking outside, you saw no package. After you grabbed them, you headed back to Toadstool. As you did, you shifted through the envelopes. You muttered, "Junk, Junk, Junk. Recipe magazine, unfair contest, And... 'You may have already won a vacation' letter... So there wasn't much point to check, Toadstool..."

"That last one sounds like it might be interesting. Does it say where?" Toadstool asked as you sat down.

"Uh... The Bahamas. Says it also is a expense paid summer vacation as well. I doubt it's a winner," You said as you began to open the envelope in question.

As you read it, Toadstool looked at the recipe magazine as she said, "The last time I took a vacation, it was at Hawaii... although during that time, Koopa tried to take over the mushroom kingdom with a robot doppelganger of myself."

"Huh... Good thing you got me to check this. I did win..." You said.

"does this mean we get to go to the Bahamas?" Toadstool asked with hope in her voice.

"Well, do you have any problems with us staying on a ferry for a few weeks?" You asked.

Toadstool shook her head before she hugged you. She said, "I'll make sure to surprise you with my swimsuit!"

You blushed as you hugged her back.

King Koopa looked away and began to rub his chin. "Hmm... Isn't that part of North America?"

"Yes, your maladroitness," Mouser answered.

" Last time I had anything to do there, I gave Hip control over it, but before that, I gave Kootie Pie control over it as a present," King Koopa muttered. "If we have time, we can give North America back to Kootie. But for now, let's go kidnap the princess!"

11122211222.content:
The princess devours her food as if it was nothing. You watched as her salad entered her mouth and disappeared forever. Once she was done, she gave a satisfied burp and patted her tummy. You smiled and took both of your plates to the sink. As you wash the dishes, you can't help but notice that Princess Toadstool is smiling at you. You're starting to feel glad that you're her friend and not her food. You walk back and sit down with her.

"So princess, can I ask you some personal questions?" You ask.

"Sure, but I know what you're going to ask. You want to see my private spot, right?" She said, putting her hand down there. You suddenly feel really embarrassed, causing your face to turn red like a tomato. The princess laughs. "I'm kidding. What do you want to ask?"

"Um . . Well . . What's your height and weight?" You struggle to say.

"What? Are you calling me fat?" The princess gets a serious look, making it hard for you to speak. She then smiles and starts to giggle. "I'm kidding again, stop worrying so much." You didn't feel any more confident, but you tried to worry less like she said. The princess told you her exact height and weight. "You know what, this is what we'll do. Once you ask a question, I'll ask one, sound fair?" You nod. She then asks you the same question you asked. You tell her the truth, though it made you feel short. She was interested though.

"Ok, my next question is this. What do you like to do for fun when you have free time, like when you're not captured or running the kingdom."

"Well, I like to play sports, and I also like relaxing in the sun. What about you?" You tell her you like to draw pictures or play video games. You tell her that you could draw a picture of her later if she wants, making her really happy.

"So princess, what's your favorite color and food?"

"I love pink, you can tell by the dress. As for my favorite food, I love peaches. They're pink and are soft and juicy."

"Wow, ironic considering your counterpart is also named peach." You say, giggling. She then asks you the same question again. You tell her your favorite color and food. "Okay princess, I have a serious question. Why were you so hungry before? I never see you apart anything in the TV show." She giggles as if it was obvious.

"I got really hungry because it looked really tasty. Besides some fruits, veggies, pizza, and pasta, you never really see anything unique. You're salad was veggies, but it was different veggies combined, which I almost never get to have." She says starting to look sad. You try to cheer her up by saying she can have whatever she wants here. She smiles again, ready to ask her question. "So, do you have any friends, and where's your parents?" You were caught off guard by the question.

"Well, my parents are on vacation, and gave me the house to look after for about a week. As for friends . ." You stop talking there, it was a little awkward.

"What, tell me." She persisted.

"Well, besides you and my buddy Stanley, I have almost no friends. In school, I was a nerd who liked school, and around that time, nobody else liked school." The princess gives you her sad eyes.

"Well, at least you have two friends, right?" She asks, trying to cheer you up now. You smile.

"Yeah, that is good. Anyway, so what's it like being a princess . . When you aren't captured." You ask.

"Well, a lot of things are done for me, so it's a carefree life, usually. I do have to go to meetings and visit towns sometimes, but they're typically fun. So, what's it like being a human in your world?"

"Well, people typically work for money, and do most things themselves. When they have time, they spend money to go to fun places and act like a child. That, or they're on their devices the entire time." You look at the clock and ask her if she wants to walk around town. The princess does, but has one more question first.

"I know you said you have few friends, but do you have a girlfriend?" She asks directly. You start to blush.

"No, I don't. I wish I did, and if I do get one, I hope she's as great as you." You saying this, made the princess blush. You decided to step away from this conversation and took her hand. The two of you took a walk, you showed her many places that you liked to go to. After an hour of walking she asks you . . .

11122212.content:
"Are you hungry?" You asked as you gestured towards the Kitchen.

"Do you have any fruits or vegetables?" Toadstool asked as the two of you headed towards the kitchen.

"Yep!" You replied with a nod. "I know how to make a neat Peanut butter and banana sandwich! If that's not your thing, I have an apple slicer that you might like."

The princess let out a sigh of relief before she said, "Anything sounds good. I'm just glad I met someone who knows the value of healthy food..."

"Oh yeah... Mario just loves pasta, doesn't he?" you asked as you began to prepare the Peanut butter banana sandwich.

As Toadstool began to look through your cupboards, she answered, "Luigi too! In fact, they both love anything deepfried or plain unhealthy. Luigi once turned into a chickensaurus because of one of Koopa's schemes!"

Once she found the apple slicer, she said, "Oh! So all you have to do is push this down on the apple? That's... surprisingly simple. I'm surprised none of the mushroom people ever thought of it."

"Well, my dad always said that necessity and laziness are the parents of invention. Perhaps none of the mushroom people were lazy enough to think of inventing it?" you asked as you finished the sandwiches.

Toadstool used the apple slicer on a couple of apples as she answered, "Maybe. Thanks for the complement, though."

You smiled a little as you helped prepare the plates of food.

The two of you then returned to the couch. You asked, "Ready for more of the cartoon?"

"Yes," Toadstool answered. "Perhaps we should watch the one where I came out of again?"

You nodded as you set it up.

As before, nothing happened. Toadstool sighed. "Maybe we need to wait a day and try it around the time where I appeared in this world?"

"Possibly. I don't know much about magic," you answered. "How was the sandwich?"

"Delicious! Where did you learn how to make it?" Toadstool answered, cheering up quite a bit.

"My parents. My mom likes to follow cook books, but my dad likes to experiment and try out new kitchen gadgets," You answered.

Toadstool smiled before she asked, "Can I take a look at some of the cookbooks?"

You nodded.

So she spent a couple hours, just reading the cook books. You merely watched her, enjoying how she looked.

When she noticed you looking at her, she asked, "Is something wrong?"

"Oh, nothing. Just enjoying how you peaceful and beautiful you look as you enjoy yourself," you answered.

Toadstool blushed and hid herself in the book. After a few moments, she quietly said, "T-Thanks... It's been so long since I either had a long enough time to lose myself in a good book or been complemented on my beauty."

"I'm glad to be of help," you said.

"It's just... I've spent so much time either helping others or fighting off King Koopa and-" Toadstool muttered with tears in her eyes before she shook herself and said, "Whoops! There I go, talking too much!"

As Robot Toadstool began to shift from side-to-side and cutely said, "Let's visit video game land and announce our love!"

You thought about it.

On one hand, Robot Toadstool was her own person and no longer a tool of the Koopa Clan. Her visiting video Game Land could lead you and her to joining the real Princess Toadstool and the Mario Bros on their adventures.

On the other hand, you didn't want even the slightest risk of Robot Toadstool to either cry or get destroyed. There also was the threat of Kooky taking back control of Robot Toadstool.

"I don't know... What if the Mario bros or the original princess don't like you?" you asked.

Robot Toadstool paused as she pondered your words. After a few moments, she seemed to get less cheerful, but said, "Even if they don't like me, all that matters is your opinion."

"Well... do you know a way to get to Video Game land?" you asked.

"Do you have a spare bathtub?" Robot Toadstool asked.

"In the basement," you answered.

===

After Robot Toadstool turned the spare tub into a warp pipe, the two of you wound up near a sign that read, 'Welcome to the Mushroom Kingdom!'

"Let's hope the Mario Bros and Princess Toadstool are here and not on one their adventures," You said.

Robot Toadstool nodded before she held up a picnic basket and said, "And if they aren't, we'll at least have a nice picnic!"

So the two of you headed to a large.... well, it looked like a combination of a large house and a castle, right near a small house.

"My Data tells me that small house is Princess Toadstool's," Robot Toadstool answered. When you looked at her in a confused manner, she explained, "She doesn't like to show off her wealth, but she does like looking over the history of the mushroom kingdom royalty. There's also the symbolism behind the royal heads residing in the kingdom's castle in times of crisis that inspires hope in the mushroom people."

You nodded. It sorta made sense.

Eventually, the two of you knocked on Princess Toadstool's front door.

111232133321.content:
As the second remote was used, it didn't work.

"What gives?!" Kooky shouts.

"Remember how I said this isn't your robot? This is proof of it. I chose to collect the memories from your old machine and put them on to a new storage medium. This beauty here is running a 64-bit Linux distro and her old system can't match the specs of the new hardware, even if you overclocked it. In other words, your old hardware and software are gone," you tell him.

"What did you do with it?" Kooky asked.

"It's in the trash cans outside. If you want it, you better hurry. The trash truck should be arriving soon," you answered seeing if they'd believe.

The Koopalings rushed outside and started going through your trash like they were a bunch of raccoons. You found this very entertaining as you laughed watching them. Truth was you took the old parts to a recycling center days ago. In addition, you made sure to do some formatting so data from there couldn't be recovered from it. On the one hand, this could be seen as a good thing for the Koopalings as it would reduce any sensitive data from the device from falling into the hands of criminals. On the other hand, it meant even if they did get the parts back, they'd be starting from square one again with getting her back together again.

"Are my old parts out there?" Robot Toadstool asked.

"Nah. I just told them that to see if the trash would take itself out and look what's outside," you said as the trash truck arrived emptied the cans into the back of the truck, Koopalings and all.

"If my old parts aren't out there, where are they?" Robot Toadstool asked next.

"I couldn't bring myself to throw them out or destroy them, but at the same time, I didn't want to use them when tech has improved so much since then. As such, I took them to a recycling center. Hopefully they'll end up being put to better use than the Koopalings would ever try to," you explain

"What's Linux and why did you pick choose to use it on me?" Robot Toadstool asked.

"Linux is a kernel for operating systems to run on. It's also free to use and free to modify, which is why there's so many different Linux distros such as LinuxMint, Debian, ZorinOS, Puppy Linux, Arch Linux, and Fedora to name a few. Different Linux distros have their own features, purpose, and software included. Many distros and programs for Linux are cheap or even free to download and install," you explained.

"Is there anything else I should know?"

"In addition to having a number of ports for connecting to devices, you also have the ability to connect to some devices wirelessly. I've also taken some care to set up security measures and filters to keep you from accessing dangerous stuff and to make it harder for bad programs to try to take control. However, if you want to know about your hardware, you can use the Wifi connection. I set it up when installing the security and updates. On that note, you might want to make sure you install updates when are any as they fix security flaws and improve performance. If you want to know more about what your hardware specs are, there should be some diagnostic programs you can access," you explained.

11123221.content:
On a whim you were playing one of the Super Mario games one TV and were playing the cartoon on another TV, while there was a thunderstorm outside. You even had the two TVS side by side.

When a particularly close thunder came along with a very bright bolt of lightning, you decided to stop before anything bad would happen.

When you were about to set your console to turn off, you stopped when there was a ripple on the screen, like the TV screen was made of water.

"What the..." You uttered as you got up and poked at the TV. Indeed, it was like the screen was made of water. A thought occurred to you about the other TV, the one that was showing the Mario Cartoon. That screen was also like water. "This... is weird."

Then the screens began to ripple once more on their own, getting faster and faster. You bent down to study it, when you heard the sound of someone crying out like they were in the middle of falling. Then came two pink comets, one light pink and the other regular pink. They knocked you onto your back. The Two TVs, video game console, and DVD player all shut off.

After a few moments, you took stock of your situation. You were on your back with two women on your back. One was dressed like Princess Peach from the later Mario games, and the other was dressed like Princess Toadstool from the Mario Cartoon. You didn't speak, as you kind of liked having their rather attractive bodies pressed against yours.

"Ow... What happened? Last thing I remembered was looking in a new warp pipe," Toadstool asked as she slowly stood up.

"Who said that?" Peach asked as she stood up.

Both princesses looked at and studying each other. Eventually, Toadstool said, "I am Princess Toadstool of the Mushroom kingdom."

Peach looked shocked and said, "but how? I am Princess Peach of the mushroom kingdom! I've never heard of a Princess Toadstool, other than an odd nickname I like having for awhile."

"I once had the nickname of Peach, but I'm sure I'm the only princess of the mushroom kingdom at the moment," Toadstool answered.

Both princesses were looking a little concerned and annoyed at each other. Before an argument could break, you said, "I think I can answer that with a theory!"

The two Princesses looked down and were both concerned for your health. They both helped you up. You continued, "Ever hear of the Multiverse theory?"

"I once heard Professer Nerdnick mention something of it, when trying to figure out a way to help the Mario Brothers home," Toadstool answered.

"And I once listened to Professer E. Gad's speech about it. It's also how I compete with a lot of other beings in races, sports, and..." Peach said. She looked sheepish as she added, "Fights."

"So yeah, Let's do a quick rundown to doublecheck. Coinflips; Heads in one universe, tails in another. Shirt in one universe, sweaters in another. Redheads in one universe, blondes in another. That ring any bells?" You asked. Toadstool and Peach looked at each other before they nodded. "So with that out of the way, I think you are analogues from different universes. And..."

"And?" Peach asked.

"The two of you wound up in a universe where there is fictional media that probably seems a lot like your adventures," You added nervously. You tapped the TV screen and found them solid. "You came out of the TV screens, but they're solid now and I don't know if there is any warp pipes to get you back home."

After a few moments, Toadstool picked up the game box that had Princess Peach on it, while Peach picked up the DVD box.

After a few moments, Toadstool said, "Huh... I do hope they're fun to play..."

"And safe to watch. some things are quite dangerous and scary in my mushroom kingdom," Peach said.

"Mine too," Toadstool replied. Both princesses smiled at each other, sensing a kinship. "You have easily scared mushroom people and a koopa king that likes to kidnap you?"

Peach let out a happy gasp as she said, "You too? I do love my people, but I sometimes wish they could stand up for themselves during some of the nastier threats. As for the Koopa king, mine is named Bowser. That's their name in your universe?"

"Bowser as well, but we all call him King Koopa, since calling him by his name is being too personal for our liking," Toadstool answered as she and Peach traded the Game box and DVD case.

"So... Whose hungry? I can whip up some hamburgers and side dishes," You said, wanting to join in on the conversation. Both princesses looked at you and stepped up close to you.

"Well, you are kind of cute up close," Toadstool said.

"I agree," Peach added. "but It would be rude for uninvited guests to simply sit back and let their host cook all by themselves. So let us help."

So You and the princesses began to cook dinner. As they helped you cook, the princesses occasionally made a flirting attempt with you. However, one princess' flirting attempt did not go unnoticed by the other. In fact, one princess' attempt at flirting seemed to invite the other to flirt in mere moments.

The making of Dinner went smoothly. Neither of the princesses seemed to have any problems with each other.

When it came time to eat dinner, the two chatted about how they did things in their respective worlds.

You wished you could add something, but you were a commoner among royalty.

Once both princesses were done talking, they sighed.

"I'm jealous that the lands in your world tend to be self-sufficient," Toadstool said. "I have to travel to make sure everything running smoothly."

"And I'm jealous that you're more able to fight King Koopa more ably than I am with Bowser. With all the magic I have, he's able to sneak past my defenses and kidnap me everytime..." Peach grumbled before she took a bite of food.

Peach looked towards you and asked, "So what do you do most days, (Name)?"

"I tend to keep my parents' place nice and tidy as they are on vacation. Since I live out in a rural area, we could go on a quick walk after dinner. Or maybe we could watch a few cartoons and play a game or two?" You asked.

"An exercise after a meal is always welcome," Toadstool said. Peach nodded.

You nodded as well.

After Dinner was eaten and the dishes were washed, You went to ask if the princesses needed a coat, but Peach waved her hand and both princesses were now dressed in workout clothes.

Toadstool's was simpler, but looked easier to clean and move in. Peach's had some more flower and peach symbols on her clothes.

You shrugged before you and the princesses began your small jog around your home.

I don't think I've ever been to this part of Sarasaland before."

You didn't immediately answer, not sure how to answer the young woman. "Uh..well...this isn't Sarasaland. You're in my living room, Daisy."

"Wait, you said I'm not in Sarasaland?" She asked, you nodding in agreement. "Well, it was nice meeting you, Ty, but I have to leave."

Daisy quickly waved farewell to you before turning around to go back into the portal... however, just as she was about to enter, the portal closed up.

"Oh, no." Daisy moaned. "Now I'm stuck here!" She then turned back toward you. "No offense."

"None taken." You stated. "But if the portal appeared out of nowhere once, then it might appear again. All we have to do is wait and hope that the portal shows up again, then you go back home."

Daisy nodded understanding. "I certainly hopes it does appear, but what do we do in the meantime?" She asked curiously.

You grinned widely enough to match Daisy's previous ones. "Are you hungry?" You asked as you gestured towards the Kitchen. "I can whip something up for you."

"Sure!" The tomboy princess agreed as the two of you headed towards the kitchen. "So, what's on the menu?"

"Well, there's some pizza in here." You replied. "But, if that's not healthy enough for you..."

"Are you kidding?" The princess chuckled. "Pizza has four of the five food groups: the grain is the crust, the vegetable is the tomato sauce, the dairy is the cheese, and the meat is the toppings. It's, like, the healthiest food ever."

"Well, it's hard to argue with that logic." You concede as you take out a extra large meat lovers pizza and put it in the oven.

While the pizza warmed up, you and Daisy conversed. She shared her tales of adventure and fun with Mario and crew and you teased her about her relationship with a certain green-capped plumber. She took it in stride though, much to your relief. You would NOT want to be on the wrong side of her wrath.

Eventually, the pizza finished baking and you take it out of the oven. As you sat it on the table and left to grab some plates, napkins, soda, cups, and a pizza cutter, Daisy gazed at the incredible Italian delicacy.

"Wow," She uttered, wafting the spicy aroma to her nostrils. "I can only imagine how it will taste."

"You won't have to imagine for very long." You said as you grabbed what you needed as laid them on the circular metal table. "What type of soda do you like? I have Pepsi, Coca-cola, Root Beer, and Sprite."

"I'm not familiar with those brands." Daisy admitted, getting her own plate and napkins. "I prefer Koopa Kola."

"Well, if you want, you could sample these and see how they stack up to yours." You suggested while cutting the pizza into twelve slices.

"I'm good with that." Daisy agreed, taking four cups and pouring two-liter bottles of each soft drink into them. "Thanks for the grub!"

You filled your own glass of Pepsi and grabbed a couple slices of pizza."You're welcome. I hope you enjoy."

"Believe me," Daisy said, coating her slices in Parmesan cheese. "I will."

For the next thirty minutes, you two ate dinner. Daisy took a bite out of her first slice and her eyes sparkled in awe. The gooey cheddar cheese was melted to just the right viscosity, not too runny to be a liquid soup but not rigid to be a solid brick. The bread bed beneath was fluffy and soft, absorbing some of the moisture from the tomato sauce like a sponge. The pepperoni slices were sprinkled with spices, as was the sausage and ham. And the thin blanket of Parmesan cheese complimented the other flavors without overwhelming them. All in all, it had made for an experience that nearly caused Daisy's taste buds to explode in pleasure.

"Oh, my... " The regal figure muttered quietly. "This... is... AWESOME!"

Her energetic exclamation got your attention and you looked up from your meal to see Daisy scarf down the rest of her pizza in a matter of seconds.

"I take it you like the pizza." You teased.

Daisy merely nodded before stuffing her second slice into her gaping maw. You could've sworn that she unhinged her jaw to get that down in a single gulp. The woman must have felt pretty parched after that, because she immediately proceeded to down her Coke, draining her entire cup in five seconds flat. What surprised you most was how little her stomach stuck out from her body.

She repeated the process with her remaining slices, alternating between two pizzas and the Root Beer, then the Sprite, and lastly the Pepsi, until she had finally finished her meal. You had only consumed four slices and one cup of pop, yet Daisy managed to finish faster despite eating eight slices and four cups

"That pizza hit the spot." Daisy stated, rubbing her belly, which had finally distended against her dress.

"How was the soda?" You asked as you take both of your garbage and put it in the trash can.

"Meh, it was ok," Daisy responded mild-mannerly. "None of them hold a candle to Koopa Kola. But if I had to gave an arbitrary numerical rating, I'd say that Koopa Kola is a solid ten, Pepsi is a six and a half, Coca-cola is a six, Root Beer is a five and a half, and Sprite is a five." Daisy stated before thumping her right fist on her DD cup breasts. "*BBBBHHHHHOOOOOUUUURRRRRAAAAAPPPP!*"

A burp of uniform tone blared forth from the depths of Daisy's digestive tracts. It sounded akin to the roar of the mighty Koopa King himself, although it possessed the unique characteristic of smelling like partially two-thirds of a pizza, a pint of carbonated beverage, and stomach acid. Said stench assumed the form of an opaque emerald fog that threatened to pollute you entire house!

The force of the burp was enough to literally blow you away, as you found yourself being propelled straight toward your living room couch, you hair now a disheveled messy mop. Such a disaster-piece of a belch exploded for a grand total of ten seconds, after which the epicenter of the eruption only had two words to say.

"Pardon me." She giggled sarcastically.

Meanwhile, you recovered from your flight and tried to fan away the toxic fumes encircling you. "Daisy, you are something else." You said amidst the constant coughing.

"Thanks, you're not bad either." Daisy said as she approached you, completely unnerved by the noxious cloud surrounding her. "Sorry about stinking up your house. I got carried away."

"Don't apologize. It's cool." You said. "I can just open all of the windows and air this place out."

"Actually, after that chow down, I feeling pretty sluggish. Can I sleep with you on the couch while I digest?" Daisy requested.

"Sure." You answered.

Daisy laid down on the couch, her head resting on your lap. You blushed as you rarely have intimate interaction with females in your world, let alone a completely different one. She closed her eyes as she began to digest her big meal. You found her to look rather cute while she is asleep and soon join her in slumber.

1113322222221.content:
You braced yourself mentally and physically as the portal drifted away out of existence after the figure that emerged from it revealed itself to be….

...Nothing. Nothing came out. Kinda anticlimactic, there. You were expected some unearthly figure from another dimension to emerge from the portal and blow your mind with knowledge or warnings from beyond your world that would no doubt fall upon your planet as you know it.
Instead the portal just disappears, leaving no trace of it whatsoever behind, and your living room returns to being the way it was. It was if the sudden crash boom bang never happened to begin with.

Truly bizarre. But sadly, nothing spectacular. It just was.

The brief out of this world experience left you scratching your head.
“Well...” you say to yourself, “...that was… something?” You'd chalk it up to just a minor acid trip, but youre sure you skipped out on taking acid today…
Nevermind. You just shake your head and turn back to the direction of the back door to resume your precious star watching.

“Ehehehehe...”

At least until you heard the sound of giggling behind you. You turn around and in no time at all, the giggling stops. Nothing's there. Just hearing things? Anyways, back to the star watching.

“Hehehehehe...”

But as soon as you turn to the backdoor, you hear the giggling again. This time it's closer. You squint your eyes and quickly turn to the direction of the giggling!

*Gasp!*

You heard a surprised gasp but nothing's in front of you! If you didnt know any better, you coulda sworn you caught a glimpse of woman in white at least for just a nanosecond! Regardless, whatever you think you saw, you aint seeing it now.
“Hm,” was all you let out before turning back to the backdoor.

“Hehehehehehe...”

Again you hear the giggling. This time it was much closer. Not only that, you could feel ice cold breath blow against the back of your neck with each giggle. You stayed perfectly still, keeping cautious and trying to assess the situation. But all the while the giggles didnt stop.

“Hehehehehehehaaaaa….”

That's when you caught a glimpse of the reflection in the glass of the back door. You could make out a pale ghoulish figure behind you giggling in sync with what you were hearing! A white haired woman in a fancy white dress with a pink polka-dotted crown grinning your way with purple blood-shot eyes, letting her tongue almost the size of your arm slip right out her mouth with each giggle!

“!!!” you immediately whip back around faster than the speed of sound!

“Eeep!” you caught a brief glimpse of this ghoulish woman yelp in surprise just before putting her hands over her face! Then just like that, you saw nothing at all! A GHOST!! YOU GOT GHOSTS!

“WHO'S THERE?!!” you whip out the gun from your pocket like you would against any home intruder and start demanding, “SHOW YOURSELF!!” You wait patiently pointing your gun at nothing in particular as gaze all directions.

A little time passes, but nothing appears.

“C'mon! I just saw you!” you state, looking up and down left and right for the ghost, “come on out now! You cant hide from me!” You wait.

And you wait.

And you wait.

And you wait some more.

And still nothing.

You pant hard, shivering a bit, expecting something to pounce on you the second you lower the gun. If you'd build the courage to look in the reflection again, you'd have looked like you seen a ghost (ba dum PISH!).
Quite an awful lot of time passes before you begin to soften your nerves. You turn your attention away from what isnt even there and look at the gun you were brandishing. Then you start to feel silly. Seriously, you were actually gonna try to SHOOT a ghost? Even if a ghost was really after you, what good's that gonna do? It's not like the bullets are enchanted or drenched with holy water or some crap! And how are you explain this to the cops when the neighbors call 911 from all the racket you made?!

“Ugh….” you finally lower the gun and smack your forehead, “what the heck is wrong with me?” On the plus side, this bit of embarrassment cooled your nerves. Maybe you were just hallucinating things. Maybe you actually did slip in a little acid shot today! You really need to cut down on the stuff before you start hallucinating vampires, too!

You laugh to yourself and put the gun away. “Well… THAT was something!” you repeat yourself. And with that, you decide to resume your star searching without any more interruptions. For the remainder of the night, it was peaceful and relaxing again.

Unfortunately for you, the uh, oddity wasnt over. Far from it. In fact, that wasnt the last time you saw your 'imaginary' ghoulish intruder.

In fact, when did you start hearing the giggling again?
1113322222221.title: GET GHOST!

11133222222212.content:
Some time later, you decided to do some exercising. While there was no giggling, you did feel like you were being watched. In fact, you could argue it was more like you were being leered at.

In any case, when you were done exercising, you decided to take a shower.

You stripped, pausing only when you thought you heard a girlish "Oh my!"

"Whose there? Show yourself!" You called out.

Nothing, just like before.

So you decided to go take a shower, hoping it might clear your head of whatever was causing you to see and hear things.

After turning on the water and setting it to a comfortable temperature, you got into your shower.

You slowly spun around, letting the water hit your body. After you felt you got wet enough, you began to scrub body wash over yourself.

"Oh my..." The voice said, this time more sensual.

From the corner of your eye, you looked at the see-through curtain.

There was a bit of a mist, like when warm water in the air is rapidly cooled.

It seemed to be in the shape of a person's upper half.

You continued to wash your body, but fear ran down your spine.

After a few moments, the mist began to form into a person.

They had long white hair, equally white dress, and that pink polka-dotted crown.

It was the ghost from before!

They were trying to cover their eyes with their hands... though still peeking through gaps in their fingers. It even seemed like they had a purple blush on their cheeks.

You turned away, not wanting to look at the ghost. You began to pray in your mind, not wanting to attract any more attention.

Princess Booette...
