111332222222123.content:
Your first course of action would be to immediately call the Ghostbusters, only to remember that they dont even exist. So your second course of action would be to brush off the ghostly girl youre seeing as a long-lasting figment of your drug-induced imagination and resume your bathing in peace.

That was a mistake. For when the late Princess finally stopped gawking at the naked commoner and his physique which was awfully fine and kept in optimal shape despite his lower class status, she had decided to do what came natural. Natural for a Boo, that is.

*Flush!*

"!!!!" you jumped up into the air at the ice-cold sensation that hit you out of nowhere! For a brief moment, the shower water raining down on you went from luke warm to freezing your balls off! It didnt last long, but the goosebumps and blood rush you got from the rapid change of temperature hitting your body took a while to go away. You groaned and peeked out of the shower to see the toilet finishing it's awfully long convenient flush. A stupid prank. Now who couldve done that if youre the only person in the house?

*Squeak squeak squeak*

"GEEZ!!!" the ice-cold water comes back with a vengeance and this time it STAYS there! You rush back over to notice someone flipped the nobs to Cold at it's max! Shivering from the blistering cold, you quickly readjust the knobs to set it back to warm as soon as possible!

*Squeak squeak squeak SQUEAK!!*

"GYAADD!!!" And now it's too hot! You had only a second or two to notice the knobs moving by itself before being burned with scalding hot water! It was so hot, you couldnt bare to stand in the stall any longer! You rush out, almost tripping on the wet floor, and just think 'SCREW IT' and just get your things.

Too bad your things werent there.

Seriously, your clothes were gone. You remember where you left them, right on the counter next to the seat. They werent there anymore! No sign of them!
You begin to panic as you checked the floor for a towel to dry off with.
No towels either! All of the towels were gone! ALL of them! But you just had them all washed and put away like yesterday! How could they all be gone already?!

And uh... who turned off the shower? You sure as heck didnt. Youre pretty sure you paid your water bill. It couldnt have been that ghostly figment of your drug-induced imagination, could it?

Not wanting to take any chances, you burst out of the bathroom buck naked, ready to dart out of the house… after you find a change of clothes first! Provided your clothes arent missing too, of course!

But just as soon as you step out of the bathroom, you find yourself in the middle of a long, dimly lit hallway. A hallway more suitable for a fancy mansion than a small little bachelor house. This hallway consists of 18th century candelabras, neatly painted vases with exotic ferns (some of them alive and snapping), painted Victorian portraits of female nobles (one of them with odd green curly hair, red bows, and wielding a purple fan all snobbishly), and glass windows which outside reveal a harsh thunderstorm in the middle of a barren wasteland!

“Ok… these drugged up fantasies are getting WAY outta hand,” you mutter to yourself, desperately denying the sheer horror developing within you. You walked down the nearly endless hallway, hoping to somehow wake up from this bizarre nightmare, but you never do. You pretend the distant high-pitched giggles echoing across the walls dont creep you out either.

And as if hallucinating about walking down the creepy hallway of a haunted mansion wasnt horrifying enough for you, all the candles suddenly went out at the exact same time. And everything got so dark, you couldnt see the hand in front of your face.

As if things could not get any worse, you just had to do the dumbest possible thing at the moment and ask how could this get any worse!

“HUUUUUUUUUUUUUU!!!!!!”

A loud high-pitched howl could be heard from the other side of the endless hallway you were stranded in! You couldnt see the howling figure in the darkness, but you could make out the glowing red eyes gazing into your soul. Your instincts tell you to stay perfectly still and not to panic.

...But then you saw it's incredibly bright wide grin appear out of nowhere and all bets were off!
You dashed away like a bat out of Hell, trying to get as much distance from the beast in the shadows as possible while conveniently placed adrenaline pumping speed metal played in the background!

The corridors that were the endless straight hallway twisted and turned, but you had no time to question it what with a ferocious smirking unseeable monster chasing after you!
You at least managed to see a door and without a second thought dashed through it and slammed it shut behind you. The room looked to be a small plain guest bedroom with a bed, closet, and a wardrobe cupboard. With no window to jump out of, you jump into the cupboard and hide in the little pile of dresses inside.

And you wait.

The conveniently placed speed metal quickly changed to slow pounding, not unlike a heartbeat, as if switching from 'YOUVE BEEN SPOTTED' to 'YOURE ALMOST IN THE CLEAR, BUT ONLY ALMOST'!
And to prove it, you hear the door open and the heavy panting and pacing from your stalker, no doubt prowling around the room in search of you!
You take very little breaths, despite being exhausted from the chase. Sure enough, this spontaneous experience took a lot out of you. One minute youre seeing a stage fright ghostly girl laughing behind your back and the next youre stranded in a haunted house buck naked and hiding from a monster! What kind of drugs have you been taking to have THAT kind of disturbing imagination?!!

Regardless, cuz too much of you actually believes what youre experience is real, you take no chances and remain hiding in that cramped cupboard in absolute silence, hoping for the monster to go away.

After a long waiting, the pounding in the background finally stops and...

11133222222231.content:
After what seemed like the beginning of the very end for the world as you know it, the crash boom bang began to subside and the unearthly portal to who knows what unearthly dimension vanished, and the smoke cleared, then all that remained behind from that outrageous time-space continuum rift was the silhouette of a woman.

An odd looking woman with short black hair, an iron necklace around her neck, and wearing a black dress that had designs of sharp teeth outlining the folds of her dress as well as within the blouse section like the dress was eating her breasts!
She gazed at you attentively with huge black wide pupils as she grinned widely, revealing big sharp jagged teeth that looked more fitting on a shark! If you had to sum up her description in just one word, the one coming to mind would be FERAL. Other words like 'grizzly', 'beastly', 'animal-like' and 'not housebroken' would be a close second (if 'not housebroken' was only one word!).

Despite her feral sass, you also detected royalty judging by the pink and white polkadot crown on her head. Maybe she's a princess or something from wherever it was beyond that portal. So many more thoughts, theories, and questions came to mind, but nothing was getting resolved just staring at this grizzly girl like a drooling idiot (nevermind SHE'S the one drooling!).
If you wanted answers, you'd best get them from the source and start asking her questions.

You introduce yourself.
“H-Hi, I'm-”

“RUFF RUFF RUFFF!!!”

“YAAAGGGGHHH!!!”

Nevermind, she lunged at you and you ran off screaming!

Despite being fancy dressed, she charged at you on all fours, snapping her teeth at you and barking like a starving dog! Fortunately, by the time she cornered you against a wall, she almost choked herself with her own collar in a failed attempt to pounce on ya! She kept attempting to reach for you, but something was restraining, preventing her from getting any closer.

As luck would have it, the iron necklace of hers was actually a chain collar. Looking past the growling princess, you see a big wooden stake sticking deep into your carpet that her collar is chained to. Really sucks that it's tearing up your brand new carpet, but that stake is the only thing keeping Princess Sharptooth from sinking her jaws into your throat and tearing your body to pieces!

“Grrr!! Grrr!!” infuriated with the chain, she kept tugging at it and biting into it to no avail. The iron mustve been hellastrong. This gave you a bit of time to catch your breath, but just a single breath alone was enough to bring her attention back to you and go “RUFF!! RUFF RUFF RUFF!!!” At the moment she was less a princess than a wild dog on a tight leash!

Whatever brought this oddity into your house, you'd find it amusing if you werent pinned against a wall with little to no space to shimmy around the feral girl on a chain leash!
And despite the chain, she kept constantly reaching for you and barking, “RUFF RUFF!! RUFF!!!”

"N-N-Nice girl... good girl..." you calmly spoke while you looked for a safe way around her or at least something to draw her attention away. You werent going anywhere and she wasnt about to let you. Though the chain was damn near indestructible, youre certain that wooden stake wasnt. If that thing breaks or pops out of the carpet... teeth.

You had to quickly think of a way out of this sticky situation while you still had the time. Since she's barking like a dog, does she know how to fetch? Maybe you could toss something her way and she'll chase after it, giving you the opportunity to flee the house!
But then another thought comes to mind. Maybe you can try to communicate with her? Surely, if she's so elegantly dressed, she cant possibly be THAT primitive! Surely she's completely lacking manners and royal civility! Would it really be that farfetched to attempt to talk with her?

Whatever you wanna do, best do it quick! She's clearly not the patient type!
11133222222231.title: Bow Wow Wow, Yippee Yo Yippee Yay!

112121.content: You were driving home from a shopping trip. As you stop at an intersection with stop signs, you notice some strange lights above the park nearby. You decide to make a stop and check it out. To your surprise, you notice a woman in a white dress, with brown hair, white gloves, and long ears. "What happened? Do you know the way back to the castle?" she asks. "There aren't any castles around here," you answer. "Great, I guess I am lost. My name is Zelda," she introduces herself. "Nice to meet you, my name is Max," you tell her. "Max, do you live around here?" she asks. "I was just returning home from a shopping trip. I could let you stay with me for the time being. If you want though, I could get you something to eat before going home," you tell her.
112121.title: Twilight Zelda

choices: If you can give her a tour of your home and neighborhood
Explain more about how things in your world works
That she's actually hungry and wants something to eat.
1121212.content:
As you open the car door for the Royal Princess of Hyrule to get in the passenger side Zelda just stands there looking utterly bewildered and frightened: https://cdn-images-1.medium.com/max/600/...*EH0VB2ljcBAu7XXWd732Fw.jpeg.

"Is there something wrong?" You asked.

"What type of animal is this you're on? I never seen a horse quite like this!" She exclaimed taking a step back as the actual roar of the engine no doubted terrified her.

"It's not a animal at all princess...it's a sort of mechanical device called a car." You said quickly.

"A c-car? My goodness! It looks fercious! A-are you certain it's not some sort of monster?" She asked timidly actually pulling out her sword at her side(unlike other versions this Princess Zelda was more trained in physical combat).

"No I reassure you it's perfectly safe. Come on it won't hurt you at all. It's not even alive princess." You said but still she held back.

"B-but then how does it make that strange noises then if it's not alive?"

"Because I'm actually controlling it from in here. Come on it's completely safe." You pressed her as finally she nodded and slowly climbed in on the passenger side looking at you curiously.

"Oh alright...anyway thank you for rescuing me..ohhhh!" She let out a loud outcry as you started up the car and started to drive off down the road. "My word! I thought you said this 'car' thing wasn't alive!"

"It's not princess." You replied your hands on the steering wheel. "I'm controlling it with this circular thing in front of me." You carefully explained.

"Oh alright then..but y-you said there are no castles around here? None at all?" She asked.

"No I'm sorry but we don't have any castles or fortresses in this era Princess."

"And what kind of era or place may I ask is this?" She asked curiously looking out the glass covered window at the scenery before her,at all the mailboxes,road signs and people's houses and lawns.

"It's called America or the USA...Ohhh you must mean what planet you're on I mean Earth,you're on Earth." You replied as you turned down the road to your own house.

"America? USA? Earth? What odd names... And you said your name is Max?" She asked studying you carefully.

"Yes." You replied.

"How incredibly strange but nonetheless I do thank you for your kindness towards me..my word this is certainly a strange kingdom I'm in. Do you have a king or queen in this America-Earth?" Zelda asked curiously.

"Actually it's just America and its not really a kingdom at all it's more of a country with dozens of smaller places or pieces of lands what we call states. Right now you're in a small town of Richmond,VA and...." You start explaining but she interrupted.

"A-a town? Oh you mean like Kakariko?" As her face brightened but you shook your head.

"Well the town you're in right now is a bit more advance compared to your kingdom's own. You'll see in just a bit...er what are you doing?" You ask a bit annoyed as she began touching your shirt and frowned.

"Your clothes are incredibly odd,I have never seen such designs and symbols like that one(pointing at the Nike symbol on your T-shirt)before. Are you a sorcerer by any chance?"

"Huh? No I'm not you see magic doesn't really exist here in America even though we are familiar with it." You said as you slowed down to let a car pass by you on your right.

"Y-you have no magic? But how do you create all this...this stuff then?" She asked arching a eyebrow.

"I'll explain a big later Princess Zelda." As you finally stopped the car right in front of your parents' driveway and got out.

"Is this your home?" She asked as you helped her out of the passenger side and she began looking around in awe at your lawn and porch area to the front of your house.

"Yeah since you apparently have nowhere else to go,I was thinking maybe you can stay here for the time being princess. We have plenty of room and I have no problems with providing you with anything you may need." You explained as you told her to follow you into the house to which she nodded giving you a sweet smile.

"Yes thank you,I'll love to stay here at least until I can get back to my own time in Hyrule." A bit later the princess asks you....
1121212.title: She would like for you to just take her back wi...

1121222.content:
Do you want Toon Zelda?

Personality wise, she's more of a pirate than a princess. She's also one of the more tomboy-ish versions as well.

She also is the first one in the Zelda series to have and use a gun.
1121222.title: How about princess Toon Zelda?

11212222.content:
What about the Cartoon version of Zelda? The one from the Super Mario Super show.

Sure, she's bossy and a bit rude, but she has to deal with a father who's not all there in the head and a hero who keeps wanting a kiss for everything he does.

She prefers to wear a riding outfit, over dresses. That does not mean she dislikes them. It might be that she tends to be a woman of action, leading her knights in battle, rather than staying in the castle and praying for the hero's success.

But unlike the Zeldas of the video games, this Zelda doesn't have the Triforce of Wisdom in her body/soul. But she does have a friendship with it, as they talk from time to time.

There's two versions of Zelda. The one from the show that had a crossover with Captain N, giving this Zelda familiarity with Technology up to the 1980's.

The one from the comics doesn't have that familiarity, but is friendlier with Link.
11212222.title: Western Cartoon Zelda

choices: Cartoon Zelda - familar with tech up to the 80's, but shorter temper
112122221.content:
You merely waited as the person steped into view.

It was the Zelda from the LEgend of Zelda Cartoon! The one with a purple longsleeve shirt, blue vest, and pink riding pants.

However, as soon as the portal closed, Zelda closed her eyes and began to fall forward. You ran and caught her, though you were surprised at how heavy she felt. As you dragged her to the couch, you did accidentally cop a feel.

Most of her body was toned with muscle from working hard every day... and possibly from usage of the Triforce of wisdom.

The fact she looked and was stronger than you kind of turned you on.

After you put her on the couch and put a blanket on her, you sat in a nearby chair.

You hoped the vast difference in Technology wouldn't make her panic or something.

Eventually, she woke up in a panic. She clutched the blanket and looked around for a few moments before she calmed down. She looked at you with an blank look.
112122221.title: Western Cartoon Zelda

choices: "I'd like for you to take me around this town if you please."
"A tour around your house if you don't mind."
1121222212.content:
As her bright blue eyes adjusted to the bright light(and as a 2D hand drawn animated character she must have been scared out of her wits of this new strange 3-D World) Princess Zelda gasped out loud "Wh-where am I? And who are you?" She stammered breathlessly as she leaped up from the couch you open your mouth to begin explaining but Zelda appears a little too frightened as her eyes dart around your living room or rather your parents' living room and the more she sees,the more she has trouble taking it all in "What kind of palace is this?" She asks herself as she observes the nearby widescreen TV on the wall,then the entertainment center finally she looks questionably back at you "Oh hello can you please tell me where I am?" You get the urge to speak after a moment of breathlessly staring at her.

"Umm this is going to be a little hard for me to explain Miss Princess you mind if I call you Princess?" You carefully ask wanting to earn her respect before she thought you were a underling of Ganon or something

"Just Zelda,you may call me Zelda." She said as she took a seat on the couch again

"Okay then Zelda well how to put this...." You say twiddling your thumbs "You're not in the land of Hyrule anymore in fact you're far from Hyrule altogether."

"Then where exactly am I may I ask?" She asked as her eyes narrowed

"Well you're in my parents' living room this is what houses nowadays look like in the year 2017 it's sort of a future thing." You said not thinking she was going to believe you and your instincts were correct as Zelda's eyes narrowed again

"A future thing? The year 2017? What in the name of the Triforce are you talking about? Please tell me the truth where am I and why have you kidnapped me?" She asked raising her voice as she stood up at first you though she was going to attack you but she stood her ground folding her arms "Give me a answer as princess I demand immediate respect!" She said in a serious tone


"I already told you the truth Princess Zelda I haven't kidnapped you and you're in my house don't worry no harm will come to you Princess." After a while Zelda gave you a small smile

"Well-I guess you're telling the truth so I believe you-but you say this-this is the year 2017? And it's the future?" She asked looking around again you shook your head

"It's not really the future well I suppose it looks that way to you but if you want I can-" But she cuts you off with a question

"Wait you said I'm no longer in Hyrule well can you help me get back there? It's urgent Ganon the evil wizard has sent a throng of powerful monsters to attack the kingdom and I have to help my friend Link defend the mystical Triforce and kingdom from him!" She said actually grabbing hold of one of your hands once more you were utterly surprised to how physically strong she was it felt like a iron clad grip.

"I-I'd like to Zelda really I would but I can't." You choke out she looks horribly confused

"What do you mean you can't? I need help getting back there!" She said looking serious again

"The problem is there's physically no way for me to get you back there Princess as in this year magic doesn't exist and there's literally no way for me to get you back there unless....." You pause and look at her

"Unless what? Do you have a solution? Please tell me!" Zelda presses you

"The vortex-um portal just before you appeared there was a strange swirling vortex that must have sent you here Zelda it may be the only way to send you back but unfortunately I have no idea when it will appear again we might have to wait for either a few minutes or a couple of hours." You carefully explain Zelda thought about what you just said for a minute

"So if this vortex thing appears again it will be able to send me back?" She asked you nodded and she sighed but then brightened up "Well I suppose I have no other option but to wait as you said-oh forgive me but I never even asked you your name!" She blurted out

"It's Willy." You tell her and she nods and introduces herself shaking your hand

"Well Willy I must say I'm rather intrigued by this strange new world you live in especially all these 'things' can you tell me what they are?" She curiously asks looking specifically at the television,computer and entertainment system you nod eagerly

"It would be my honor Princess." She looked a bit annoyed

"I told you please call me Zelda,people call me Princess all the time it gets so annoying! Anyway what is that thing on the wall called?" She pointed at the TV

"It's called a television,it's been around for decades and here I'll show you what it does take this..." You hand her the small remote which she finds highly confusing and you tell her to press the button marked 'On' to which she does and is antoished when it turns on

"Oh my! How did it do that? Is it magic?" She asked amazed looking at he moving,colorful pictures on the screen

"No it's more powered by electricity or what you may think of as lightning from a storm I'll explain more on it later if you want is there anything else you want to know? Do you want a tour of the house and later on I can introduce you around town."

"You can? Bu-but how?" She looked out the nearest window and was equally amazed at the outside world "I notice you don't have any horses we can ride."

"We have cars,they're faster than horses." You inform her pointing out at one to her her mouth falls open as she sees what you're pointing

"Oh! Are they also powered by electricity?" She asked you shook your head

"Well some of them are but anyway did you want a tour of the house or you want me to take you around town and show you around?" Zelda thinks for a bit then decides.....
1121222212.title: Comic Zelda - unfamiliar, but friendlier.

choices: Yes and she in turn develops strong feelings for you
No she's too busy eating to notice
11212222121.content:
The Princess of Hyrule doesn't hesitate to reply "Oh please can you introduce me around your town? I'd like to see more of this new world while we have the time that is......" As she kept glancing around for that strange portal you mentioned earlier waiting for it to appear but you escorted her outside showing her how the car worked and everything about electrify,mechanics and so on "Oh this is incredible! I sure wish we had something like this in Hyrule it would be a lot faster than getting around on horses! May I try that whatever it is you're doing?" She asked from the passenger side as you were driving down the neighborhood block showing her some of the sights

"Umm I'll teach you how to drive a bit later Princess Zelda maybe...for now I'll just show you some of the stores and stuff." You explained.

Following a entire hour of showing her the wonders of the modern world the two of you were sitting down at a local restaurant outdoors

Fortunately for you the Hylian Princess was far too busy enjoying her plate of pasta to notice you were practically creating a miniature waterfall the way you were drooling at the mere sight of her luckily you managed to wipe off most of it with your spare napkin finally she looked up

I have gold if you need any...." As she reached into one of her pockets and to your surprise didn't pull out some of the traditional rupees that Link used as currency in the games but actual gold coins several of them you still shook your head.

"No that's alright you keep them I got this I was just fooling with you Zelda,if you want more spaghetti let me order it for you..." But she stopped you

"Actually I'm pretty full enough thank you for offering that though but anyway what shall we do now?" She asked curiously as she prepared to leave the gated in restaurant area you accompanied her

choices: The game she was from (both Ocarina of Time and Majora's Mask)
Around the house, she would be staying in the guest room
112312221.content:
The lovely Anju, from Majora's Mask, stepped into your living room. She immediately saw you, and was surprised. She started to get a little nervous.

"Oh hello. Welcome to the Stock Pot Inn. Umm, did you have a reservation?" She asked. This was a little amusing to you, apparently she hadn't noticed the change in scenery. You told her to look around. Though she was confused, she did as you said, suddenly her eyes widen as she sees she isn't in the Stock Pot Inn. "Wait, where . . Where am I? How did I get here?" She asked, starting to panic. You grabbed her hand and helped her sit down.

You told her there was some weird portal, and that she was in your home. Though you didn't know if this was a good idea, you also told her she was a video game character. Surprisingly, she took it pretty well.

"I'm sorry about Kafei though." You said, this shocked her.

"Wait what? Did something happen to him?" She asked.

"Didn't he disappear in your world?"

"Not that I know of, I saw him a couple days ago, at least for me it was a couple of days ago." She said. You asked her if the Festival of Time was coming up. She told you it was supposed to be tomorrow. That helped you figure out that the portal appeared in a time before the game.

You decided to help her get settled down by bringing a glass of water. As she took it, you told her you weren't sure when the portal would appear again.

"That's alright. I'm sure Kafei can wait. I just wish he knew that I was safe." She said. You patted her on the shoulder and told her it would be alright. In the meantime, you showed her . . .
112312221.title: The patient but nervous Innkeeper

112321.content: Which form is she in?
112321.title: Imp or true form

1123211.content:
She floated to the center of the room. The portal behind her closed up and vanished. You were completely shocked and couldn't move. She was looking right at you, and started to get impatient. She demanded that you tell her what was going on. After a moment, you were finally able to move and told her you weren't sure. When you told her where she was, Midna shrugged.

"It doesn't really matter. As long as you don't work for Zant, I'm fine with you. How about you show me around, I need to see what I have to work with." She said. You nodded, and motioned for her to follow. However, she didn't feel like following at the moment. Instead, she hopped into the air. Before you knew it, she landed on your back. When you started to object to this, she covered your mouth with her hand. "Now now, be a good boy and show me around." She said, petting you like a dog. You sighed, realizing you weren't going to convince her to get off.

As you showed her your house, you didn't mind her being on you. She smelled nice and was mainly kind to you, aside from a few jokes. When you showed her your bedroom upstairs, she got off and jumped right on your bed. She got comfortable and motioned for you to come closer. You knelt next to the bed, looking at her beautiful face.

"I've decided to stay here for a while. As an added bonus, you get the best job ever. You get to be my servant, and like a servant, you'd have to do exactly as I say. Don't worry, I won't make you do anything too harsh like eat trash. Right now, I'm hungry so get me some food." She said, giving you a smile. You nodded and did as she said. Although you weren't sure how you felt to be her servant, she was really cute, so you wanted to make her happy. You went down to the kitchen and made her the best meal ever.

You happily brought it up to the bedroom. She was currently checking out her nails. When you set it down, she told you to kneel and feed her. You rolled your eyes and did so. You were careful not to bring your hand too close to her mouth. You filled up her belly, making her satisfied. When she thanked you, she grabbed your hand and brought it closer. She slowly licked it, sending shivers throughout your body.

"Mm, you also taste good. You better be glad that you're a human, because I would have you in my stomach already." Midna let go and asked you to . . .
1123211.title: Quickly becoming a servant

11232111.content:
"I have some stuff to do in town," you tell her. "May I join you?" Midna requested. "Sure. I have a few library books to return. The controller I use with my PC is showing signs and wear and tear as the buttons feel a little loose, so I'm wanting to purchase a new controller for my PC. I might have to look for a smaller controller for you if you want to play PC games with me, though. " Midna's attention turns towards the window as she notices it is still daylight outside and says, "There might be a bit of a problem. I'm not exactly good with sunlight."

You thought about it for a second and realized she is right. You'd be taking a risk if you took her outside during the daylight hours. Granted, you may be in the car most of the time, you didn't want to take a chance on it. You realized there might be something you could do. "I might have an idea. I do have something was created to prevent people from getting sunburned. Maybe it would be what you need," Midna looked a bit shocked to hear what you just told her. Was there really a way the Twili could walk in the sunlight without any harm? "Now you have my attention. How do you keep a Twili safe in daylight hours? You'd have to block the sun," Midna said.

You pull out a bottle of sunblock from the dresser and answer, "This will do that for you when it is applied to your skin." She put her hair out like a hand for you to squirt the sunblock on. Once it is in her palm, she rubs it all over her body. You squirt a little on your hand and get some spots she wasn't able to get. You decide to bring the bottle with you as you get your phone and car keys. Even though you had plenty left in the bottle, you figured that having an extra bottle or two wouldn't be a bad idea. "So where do you want to go to first? Which ever we go to first won't be as crowded if we went to it later, so it is your call," you tell her as you head outside and lead her to the car. You then help her with the seat belt. Thinking about it, maybe you should consider getting a booster seat for her. Yes, she might not like being treated like a child, but it might be a good idea given her size, you weren't sure a regular seat belt would do.

As you got into the driver's seat, Midna finally answers your question.
11232111.title: The Twili Sunblock Experiment

choices: Decide to explain the whole Zelda myths to her
Show her how to play the game
11232112.content:
As she endlessly floated around examining and touching everything with a child's curiosity Minda suddenly yawned you couldn't help but tease her playfully

"Wow looks like someone's tired!" Minda gave you a deep frowning look

"Don't try and baby talk me! I'm well used to people like you thinking just because I'm this adorable size that I'm some type of weird baby thing! Yeah I'm sleepy what about it? So you're going to leave so I can get a few good winks or what?" She snapped sounding very cranky you didn't wish to argue who knew what she could possibly do to you with those bizarre powers? But nonetheless you complied with her wishes and told her you'd check up on her later.

Once you closed the door to her room you began to watch a little bit of TV but nothing good was on do you started playing your new Nintendo Switch instead you just got one yesterday and of course the first game you got was Breath of The Wild after a while you were highly surprised when Minda came floating in looking widely awake

"Whoa you're up already! That was quick!" You muttered not taking your eyes off the widescreen TV

"Yeah we magical creatures of the Twilight Realm don't require much sleep as you humans do! Anyway what do you want to......." But she paused once she saw what you were playing "Hey- isn't that Link? What's he doing in that thing?" She looked horribly confused "What exactly is that you're doing? It looks neat!" She said eagerly everything else she may have had about possibly shrinking you or eating you went out the window

"It's called a video game and yes this is Link but not the one you're familiar with." You explained Minda looked even more confused and you.........
11232112.title: Let her take a nap

choices: She wants you to show her around
She wants you to please her stomach by giving it food
1123212.content:
The twilight princess steps out as the portal closes. You are immediately amazed at how beautiful she is. However, she looks tired. After taking a step, she starts to collapse. You immediately rush over to her and help her get on your couch. You're afraid that it's because your world is equivalent to the Hyrule's light world, since the Twili have a hard time surviving in the light world. You spend most of the day taking care of her. You help her drink water, you give her some soft food, like yogurt, trying to give her strength. At the end of the day, all you can do is wait for morning.

As you sleep through the night, you dream about her. You couldn't believe that out of everyone that could have appeared, she was the one who came. You were very lucky, that was if she could get better. When you woke up the next morning, you went to check on her. When you came downstairs, you noticed she was gone. You started to look around, when something landed on you. You fell onto your stomach, dazed a little.

"Well well, who do we have here?" You looked up to see Midna was on you. She looked much better, you knew she was going to be able to walk among humans normally, in a way. You asked her nicely to get off of you, she shook her head and smiled. "If you want the ability to get up, you'll have to answer all of my questions, I won't move until then. My first two questions are who are you and where am I?" You tell Midna your name.

"You came in through a weird glowing portal. After you stepped through it, the portal vanished. Do you remember something like that?" You ask. Midna thinks for a minute.

"How about I tell you what happened from my side?" Nabooru offered.

"I guess, but if you're willing to not cause any trouble while out in public, you could tell it while we go out to dinner," you suggested.

"Are you asking me out on a date?" Nabooru asked.

"Well, if you're willing to not steal while out in public, yes and I'll pay for it too," you offered.

"I accept your offer," Nabooru says.

"I have to get some things from my room first," you tell her. You then head to your room and get your keys and wallet. You then noticed your stun gun. You had gotten it after a nasty break up and worried something might have happened, but hoped you'd never need to use it. You decided to bring it with you in the event that something then return to Nabooru.

As you walk outside she takes a look around, then asks, "Where's your horse?" Everything seems so strange to her as she looks around. The roads weren't made of dirt or sand. Instead it looked like rocks and some kind of strange black substance to here.

"Follow me please," you say. You then guide her to the passenger seat of your car, then open the door for her and tell her, "Please have a seat."

She gets in and asks,"What exactly is this thing?"

"It's my car. It can travel much faster than a horse, and will likely be a new experience for you. By the way, look to your right shoulder. There should be a safety harness device there. It's called a seat belt and it needs to be fastened in to a socket that's to the left of your hips before we can get started," you tell her. She does as you tell her, then you shut the door and head back to the driver's side, open the door, sit down,close the door, buckle your seatbelt, then put the key in the ignition and start the car.

As you drive, Nabooru asks you about things that seem new to her. She asks about radio in the car, what the roads are made up, what those "strange leafless trees with wires on them" are, and some other questions. You couldn't blame here for asking these questions. If you were in an unfamiliar place, you'd probably have some questions too.

Eventually you pull into the parking lot of a restaurant. However, before you got out, Nabooru remembers something. "I think forgot to ask you your name." she says.

"It's Alex," you answer. The two of you unbuckle your seatbelts and exit the vehicle to enter the building.

Nabooru finished looking over the menu and then the two of you ordered. Afterwards, you take out a couple of wands. "Are those what I think they are? How did you get them?" Nabooru asked.

"I am not going to pretend to be a mind reader, but it seems they were after you. I used this on the 'Kathy' and 'Kelly', thus stunning them, which resulted in them dropping their wands. Once they hit the floor, I switched them with a couple of twigs before turning them against them," you tell her while showing her the stun gun and the wands. Nabooru looked proud at what you managed to accomplish.

"I'm not proud of stealing from and conning the elderly, but at the same time I had a bit of a bad feeling about what they'd do if I didn't take that chance to get these away from them. It would be irresponsible on my part. I'm actually wanting to destroy them the first chance I get. By the way, I want you to keep this. It's called a stun gun," you tell Nabooru as you hand her the device.

"Well, it seems like you might be a hero worthy of a rank among the Gerudo. We might be a mostly female tribe, but a trophy like those wands would be something that could earn one a lot of respect even if they're an outsider. Plus you’ve pretty much saved everyone here. Anyway, how do you use this?" Nabooru says while examining the stun gun.

"If you've ever had a crossbow, it's something like that. You aim and pull the trigger. The range of the device is limited, but it will briefly paralyze the target. Of course, you can only use it so many times before it stops functioning. That's when it will need a recharge. I'll show you how to do that later," you explained.

“I’ll be holding you to that. After all, there is no point in having something to defend myself with if I don’t know how to use it,” Nabooru says.

Just as she finishes telling you this, your order arrives and you both enjoy the meal.

After arriving home, the first thing you do is explain to her a bit more in depth how to charge it. “This here is a USB port. They come in many shapes, but this type is a USB type C. The good thing about it is it’s reversible, so you don’t have to worry too much about struggling to get the cable in correctly,” you explain as you plug the cable into the device.

“What’s this end of the wire for?” Nabooru asks as she stares at the other end.

“The best way to describe it is that’s it’s a legacy port. It’s on many devices and still continues to be the standard port for many devices to this day. While charging the batteries inside of devices like this up to allow them to be used is one purpose of them, it’s not the only use for them.” you answer as you plug in the adapter.

“What’s that box for?” she asks next with curiosity.

“The device is charged when it’s plugged into the wall. The good thing about this is it can be swapped out with other ones if needed,” you explained.

“So if you lost the wire or box, you’d only need to replace one of them,” Nabooru says as she gets the idea of it.

“That’s correct,” you tell her.

Nabooru gives you a kiss and says, “It’s nice you’re looking out for me. I think you can guess what happened to me.”

“Yeah, fire and ice messed up big time and you were sent here,” you guess.

“That’s right,” Nabooru confirmed.

“I should probably show you around. I don’t think I gave you a proper tour earlier,” you say thinking a bit about earlier. You then proceed to show her around the house. Afterwards, Nabooru goes into the guest room you show her and changes her clothes. When she returns, she’s wearing her game clothes again.

So what happens next?

Ruto fell through the portal and fell onto your couch. As you hurried over to her, the portal closed. You looked at her. You knew she had scales, but she looked pretty naked to you. She didn't look hurt though which was good. You put your fingers to her neck, she had a pulse.

"Are you ok princess?" You asked. Ruto stirred and opened her eyes. You grabbed her hands, very happy. "Oh thank goodness, you're awake! I was worried that-" you started to say, however, Ruto slapped you across the face.

"How dare you lay a finger on me! I am the Zora princess, and I demand to know who you are!" She said, pretty pissed off. From her perspective, Ruto had just watched all of the residents of Hyrule become free. She had gone to the top of Death Mountain with the other sages when a bright light appeared. Now, there was some strange Hylian touching her without permission. You introduced yourself and told her where you were. You also told her about the portal you saw. However, she didn't look satisfied. "How could a Hylian such as yourself use magic like that? Only the great fairy can grant a Hylian that." You frowned.

"I'm not a Hylian. I'm a human, which is very similar, and I didn't create the portal. It just appeared out of thin air. Please, let me help you. I can get you something to eat." You said.

"Very well. I am hungry, and clearly there is much to learn about your world." You asked her to follow you, however, she didn't seem to like the idea. "If you want me to go anywhere, you're going to have to carry me. Come on, hurry up now." She said. It seemed like you didn't have much choice. You carried her on your back. She was pretty heavy. 112322222211.content:
You drop in front of the door, completely out of energy. Ruto climbs off and helps you up. When you look at her face, she looks genuinely concerned.

"Are you alright? I'm sorry, maybe I was pushing you a bit too hard." She says. You smiled and said it was alright. When you told her this, she walked in like nothing happened. You go in with her and help the zora order. She's disgusted when she sees people eat fish, but you get her to focus on choosing something to eat. The two of you sit down once you get your food and eat. You are having a good time, when an employee walks up to you.

"Excuse me sir, are you planning to sell her? We could buy her from you." He said. Both you and Ruto were confused.

"What do you mean?" You asked.

"Well, we know how to serve fish, and she looks like a healthy one. How about $100 for her?" He bargained. You looked at Ruto. It didn't even cross your mind that people might think of her like that. You didn't want to think about it. However, Ruto wasn't very happy.

"How dare you! You think I'm just some sort of fish that you can roast? I am Princess Ruto, and eating sea creatures is offensive to me!" She said.

"Ooh, feisty are we? Yes, I'm sure we can serve you." He said, licking his lips. You have seen Hyrule Warriors, so you knew Ruto could fight and protect herself. However, this guy was starting to annoy you as well.

"Well, it looks like we can make money Ruto." You said smiling. Ruto was confused until you winked. She decided to just play along.

"Yes it does sweetie." She said. The employee was confused.

"Just think about it, if we were to go to court and tell them they tried to harm a customer, especially one that is a princess, we could make so much money off of them. They could go bankrupt." Though the princess wasn't sure what that meant, she nodded, still smiling. This made the employee sweat like crazy.

"Wait wait wait. I'm sorry, please forgive me. If you don't sue us, we'll give you this meal for free. I'll pay for it myself. I'm extremely sorry." He said, scared. He paid you your money back and went over to the counter, pretending you weren't there.

"That was a good trick. Good job, and thank you for helping me." She said.

"Well, since you're a zora, who knows, maybe you would be poisonous to a human." You said and shrugged. She frowned. "Or maybe you would taste so good, they would die with happiness." You quickly added.

"That's better." The two of you finished your meal. You stepped outside, ready to experience pain again while carrying her.

1123322221.content:
You recognize her immediately. You also happen to notice that the portal was the exact one from Hyrule Warriors. When you get up behind her, the portal closes. You tap her on the shoulder, which startles her. She turns around, and looks at you with scared eyes.

"Where am I? Where's Cia?" She asks quickly. You're confused. You tell her everything is fine and that she's safe. You then asked her why she is looking for Cia. She takes a deep breath and slows down her words. "We had beaten Phantom Gannon. Cia and I went back home to look after the Triforce of Power. A few weeks later, a portal opened up and sucked me in. I want to know where is Cia?" She asked. You put a hand on her shoulder. You told her that she was on another world, you knew who she was and how you knew and that the portal closed. You also theorized that Cia didn't get sucked in like she did. Surprisingly, none of this shocked her. Her reason was anything was possible, and being a video game character wasn't as bad as you might think. You gave her a friendly smile.

"Don't worry, you can stay here until the portal reopens. I'll give you access to the whole place, sort of like if you were living here." You said. She hugged you and thanked you. She held onto you for a long time.

"You smell good by the way." She said and stepped back. You blushed, then showed her around. You gave her the guest bedroom, which looked a lot nicer than your bedroom. There was a bathroom connected inside the bedroom, there was also a window and a closet. She asked you to leave her so she could take a shower. You did as she asked and went downstairs. As you waited, you looked online to see if you could find a reason this happened.

You found some stuff about the portal, but there wasn't much about going in it. You started to get frustrated when Lana called you up. You went upstairs, but stayed outside.

"Yes Lana? Something wrong?"

"Can you bring me a towel? There doesn't seem to be any in here." She said. You told her alright and went to get one. You brought it back and told would leave it outside the door. Once you left the room, you started to think. The only explanation you could think of was that the portal brought creatures from different worlds the whole time, and the one she encountered was out of control or something. You also thought that she might have been big enough for it to close on her making it so that Cia wasn't pulled in.

You hear footsteps behind you. You turn around to see Lana. However, she wasn't dressed, she was still holding a towel to cover herself. You blushed, trying to keep your eyes up at her face.

"Sorry, but is there anything else I can wear? I want to wash my regular clothes." She said. You got up, avoiding eye contact and told her to follow. You took her to your parents bedroom. You didn't know if this was a good idea, but you were willing to try it anyways. You searched their dresser and pulled out some of your mother's clothes. Without looking, you handed them to her. She giggled. Though this was a normal reaction, she couldn't help but find it funny how you were embarrassed to look at her in her birthday suit. She decided that after she got to know you better, maybe you could see more of her skin. You might even be able to replace Link for her. The thought excited her, that she didn't have to worry about Link being with Zelda anymore.

She put on the clothes you gave her. You were told to turn around and see her. When you look, she was barefoot, wearing a pink shirtsleeve shirt and tight jeans. She asked how she looked.

"Wow, you look . . Beautiful." You said. She hugged you, making you blush. When she let go, she knew what she wanted you to do.
1123322221.title: Quickly becoming a girl's crush?

11233222211.content:
You nodded and told her you would in the morning. You took her to the guest room and helped her get comfortable. She ended up taking her jeans off, which was a little awkward for you, but you smiled. You left her to get some sleep and went to your own bedroom. As you got ready for bed, you thought about how cute she was. You were determined to help her have fun tomorrow.

You woke up the next morning, feeling something heavy on you. You wanted to open your eyes, but you needed to get used to the light. When you tried to stand up, you heard some giggling.

"Ooh, you're awake. Good, because I can't wait to see this world." The voice said. After a minute, you remembered what happened last night and opened your eyes. Lana was smiling at you, while sitting on you. She was back in her jeans and full of energy.

"Alright Lana. Please get off me and give me a minute." You said. Lana smiled more and leaped off you landing on her feet. Though it hurt a little, you more surprised how high she could jump. You got up and got dressed. You decided to take her somewhere for breakfast. When you were ready, the two of you walked to the closest restaurant. On the way, Lana looked at the different people. She was fascinated to see what they wore. When you got inside the building, Lana hugged you. She loved the smell and the way the place looked.

"This is amazing!" She said. It was funny how easily amused she was. You helped her order some eggs and bacon. You ordered the same thing. When the two of you sat down to eat. . .
11233222211.title: New places for the pretty girl

choices: Decided to explore what you had hidden
Decided to wait until she knew you better
11233222212.content:
"I'm pretty hungry, can we get something to eat?" Lana asked. You nodded and took her to the kitchen. It was still a little awkward having her wear your mother' she clothing, but you were glad she liked them. You sat her down at the table and started to get food for her. She excitedly watched you work. After about ten minutes, you had gotten box stuffing, broccoli, some milk, and a peanut-butter and jelly sandwich for her. For dessert, you had ice cream. You set the plate down in front of her. Without hesitation, she started to eat it. "This is amazing!" She said, making you smile.

Lana ate pretty quickly, you were surprised at how hungry she was.

"So, can I ask a question?" You asked, she nodded, but kept eating. "Before you and Cia were separated, and I mean at the start before Gannon was defeated or before Cia got Wizzro and Volga, what was your original name?" Lana swallowed and used a napkin to wipe her mouth.

"Well, you can guess from the names of Cia and Lana, but my original name was Ciana. It's something I don't really think about often. Anyway, what is for dessert?" She asked excitedly. You looked down to confirm her plate was clean, literally. She had licked her plate so there wasn't any crumbs or spots left. You took her plate and put it in the sink. As you got the ice cream out, you suddenly felt a tongue on the back of your neck, making you shudder. "You taste good, can't i have you for dessert?" Lana giggled at her joke. As you filled up a bowl for her, you could feel her arms around you. You felt really comfortable around her. The two of you went into the living room and sat down on the couch.

"Um, could I . . Uh . ." You started to say. She looked at you, confused.

"Hm? Do you want some?"

"No, it's not that. It's just . . Could I . . .feed you?" You asked and then shut your eyes with embarrassment, you didn't want your new friend to think you were weird. Just when you thought she was going to tell you no, you felt her hands on your cheeks.

"Feed me? That sounds so nice! Please do!" She said excitedly.

"R . . Really?" Lana nodded and opened her mouth. You grabbed her spoon and put some ice cream in her mouth. She swallowed it and moaned.

"Oh . . Please keep going." She said. You could tell she was relaxed. You kept feeding her until you ran out. You started to take the bowl back to the kitchen, but she stopped you. "Bring it here and lay down. I want to do something fun." You were confused, but you listened. She then told you to trust her and take off your shirt. You nodded and did so, you were really curious as to what she had in mind. Lana moved her spoon to the table and held the bowl. Before you knew it, she was pouring the ice cream that had melted onto your belly. It was cold and tickled. Once that step was done, she put the bowl on the table. "Mm, I'm going to enjoy my dessert."

Lana leaned in and started to lick up the ice cream. You private spot got hard from her licking your tummy, and she knew it. Once all of the ice cream was gone, she put her hand on your crotch. It was really sensitive right now.

"Well, it looks like you had fun, I bet you want me to touch you, huh?" She asked, making you embarrassed. Lana . . .
11233222212.title: The hungry girl isn't shy at all

11233222222.content: How about Mipha, from Breath of the Wild?
11233222222.title: Red zora princess?

112332222221.content:
When Mipha steps out of the portal, it closes behind her. You're simply standing there with your mouth open. However, Mipha doesn't seem as flabbergasted. She looked at you up and down. She looked around the room, carefully looking at small details. When Mipha saw the couch, she sat down, she figured it would take a while for this Hylian to start talking.

She simply waited for a response. Meanwhile, a lot of things were going through your head. First of all, you couldn't believe a real live zora was in your home. Second, you couldn't believe it was a zora princess. Another thing you couldn't believe was she was here, alive and breathing (since she died in Breath of the Wild). With all of this thinking, your head started to get dizzy. You tried to get stable, but eventually passed out. You dreamed of Mipha, being close. You remembered Link's memories of her, and how helpful her ability was.

When you woke up, you could see Mipha's face. She had your head in her lap while she was healing some scars that you had from previous years. You struggled to get up.

"Mipha . ." You started to say. She looked at you, a little surprised that you knew her name, but then smiled and pushed you back down.

"Don't speak, please relax. I'm still healing you. I can tell from just looking at your scars that you have had trouble in the past, these aren't normal scars. I'm guessing someone hurt you." She said. You wanted to cry, her theory was correct. It had been your step-mom, whenever she got angry, she would take it out on you. Mipha moved her hand to catch a tear going down your cheek. "It is alright, I too have been hurt in the past. I want to help you. Also, don't worry about explaining anything to me. When you passed out, I helped you onto your couch and looked around. In your world, I wasn't truly real until now. I'm also guessing you aren't a Hylian, are you?" She asked. You shook your head. Mipha brushed your hair. "Maybe later you can teach me about this world, would that be alright?" You nodded.

Mipha finished healing your scars and helped you up. You didn't really understand how she was taking this so well. When you asked her, she smiled and said there were a lot of unusual things in her world, like Calamity Gannon, or the Divine Beasts. She asked if she could get some fresh air. You nodded and led her to the backyard. You noticed that it was daytime. She stepped in the grass. You felt a little awkward talking to her, when you knew her fate.

"Um, Mipha listen, there is something I need to tell you. In your game, you . . " you start to say. Mipha turns around and smiles.

"Don't worry. It's not necessary. I already know, I saw it on your device, the one that looks similar to the sheikah slate." She said, referring to your IPad. "So I may have passed away in Hyrule, but I know Link will save it. To be honest though, I don't remember much before I got here. I remember being trapped in Vah Ruta, then a bright light appeared. I took some steps and appeared in your home." Mipha laid down on her back and stared up at the sky. "Please, come lay next to me." You hesitated, but then listened. When you got comfortable next to her, she held your hand.

"You're beautiful, you know. The girls at my school would be jealous of your looks, and all of the guys would want to be with you." You said, you didn't know if that was a little creepy to say, but she turned her head and smiled at you.

"Thank you for the compliment. You're pretty cute too." She sat up and thought of an idea. "Hey, how about we . . .

112332222222222222.title: The girl who wanted to escape her island

choices: You decide to ask her if she wants to listen some music.
You and her leave the house to go shopping.
1123322222222222221.content:
You recently got the parts to make a Game Boy Color console clone with a raspberry pi and a Game Boy Color cartridge slot and managed to assemble it after a few hours of work on it. You decide to test it out with the Game Boy Color version of The Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening DX. As you were about to place the black cartridge into the device, you hear a strange noise and go to check it out. To your surprise it was Marin from the game. You check on her and notice's only sleeping. You then get an idea. You decide to turn the roles around. In the game, she brings Link from the beach and takes him to her bed to watch over him. You figured you might as well do the same for her.

You bring her to your room and place her in your bed, but decided to stay near while she slept. While you were considering watching her sleep, you figured that might seem too creepy for a first encounter. Just to make it harder for you to walk away from her than your console clone, you instead boot up your PC, sign into the Steam client, and play some Dead By Daylight, which is pretty much a survival horror twist on the game of tag. You decided to go with survivor since finding a game seems easier that way. You pick your character, equip your item and choose your offering before joining a match.

About a minute later, you're playing as Bill from Left 4 Dead and you're at the Hawkins Lab map. You wondered who you were facing. You were thinking it might be the pig at first, but you eventually saw that it was the iconic 1980s horror character that the game refers to as the nightmare. About a few minutes of repairing generators with the other survivors and some close calls, you were able to escape the lab in the game. As the results screen showed up you started to hear yawning from behind you and knew Marin was waking up. You close the game and decide to turn around.

"What a relief! I thought you'd never wake up! My name's Alex," you tell her. You thought it would be interesting to quote a bit of her early dialog from the game to her.

"Alex, why haven't I seen you before? Where am I?" Marin asks.

"I found you in my living room. You arrived asleep. I believe it was a portal of some kind that brought you here, but I'm not sure. As you can guess, you're not where you came from, you're in the United States of America," you tell her. Her response was to hug you in a mixture of emotions. You couldn't tell what she was feeling. She was curious about life beyond her island, so being here and meeting someone new might be exciting for her, but at the same time, there was something bothering you. It was the truth about her island and that she might not be able to go back.

"Since you're here, I'd like to tell you that I'll let you stay with me from now on. I'm not sure if you'll be able to get back to your island, but maybe it's better this way," you tell her.

"Yes, I wanted to explore lands away from that island. I'll accept your offer," Marin replies. You could tell she wasn't aware of the truth of her island. You didn't want to burden her with that knowledge if you didn't have to do so. This was fortunate for you for now.

Thinking about what to do next, you realized that Marin enjoy music. You also realized that she might want to explore a bit.
1123322222222222221.title: Waking up from a dream and surviving a nightmare.

choices: "Actually, can you come sleep with me on your bed?"
11321.content:
"LOOK OUT!!" A voice screamed out loud.

You yelped as a female came flying out of the portal and landed on the floor. You look closely and you were shocked as this woman has blue eyes, dark navy blue hair with yellow hair clips, a white hat with a pokeball symbol on it, a red scarf, a black dress with a tint of white on the top and pink on the skirt part and pink boots with long black socks on. You recognized her as Dawn from the Pokemon series. You were amazed that you're seeing one of your favorite characters right in front of your eyes. You also blushed as you can see her white panties underneath her skirt as you covered your eyes while Dawn gets up.

"Ooohhh. My head hurts." Dawn groaned as she rubs her head before seeing you. "Oh! Hi there!" Dawn greated nicely.

"Hey." You greated back as you still covering your eyes.

"Why are you covering your eyes like that?" Dawn wondered.

You pointed down below her and Dawn looks down to see what your pointed at. Dawn yelped as she covers herself by crossing her legs.

"Yeah. That's why." You said still not looking at her.

Dawn gets up and you peeked to see that it's good to look. You sighed in relief as put your hand down to see again.

"Sorry. I didn't want to give myself a bad name, you know?" You said nervously.

Dawn was surprised to see that you're no where near a pervert after seeing her panties. She can also see the respect, caring and love in your eyes that she smiled nicely.

"You seemed to be a nice guy to a girl like me. I like you. Oh! I'm Dawn, by the way." Dawn introduced herself.

"Nice to meet you. I'm William." You introduced yourself to her.

"So, William? Where, exactly, am I?" Dawn asked.

"You're in my home in Miami, Florida." You answered her question.

"Never heard of that place." Dawn said.

"That explains where you came from at the other sids of that portal." You said.

"Portal? PORTAL?!?!" Dawn yelled as she remebers the portal she came out of, which is no longer in the living room. "It's gone! How am I gonna get home, now?!" Dawn asked in sadness.

"I don't know, but calm down. You can with me if you want to." You suggested as you try to relax the blue haired pokemon trainer.

"Are you sure?" Dawn asked in a relaxing tone.

"Sure." You answered nicely.

"Alright. I'll stay." Dawn said with a soft smile on her face.

"Good. Now, let me see if I have something you can where." You said before going to getting some kind of clothing for Dawn to where.

"Thank you, William. Nice place, by the way." Dawn complimented as she observes the house you live in.

You come back and you give her a long shirt for her.

"You can wear that as a nightgown. It's big. So, it should cover you up. Now, you can sleep in my room, which is on your left, and I'll sleep on the couch here. Is that okay?" You wondered.
