11423111.title: Yep!

114231121.content:
Your eyes and mouth open with shock as you watch the familiar yellow two-tailed fox come out of the portal, casually talking to someone using a handmade radio receiver that was attached to a helmet he's currently wearing. You observe the equipment he is carrying alongside him, seeing that the two-tailed fox is carrying a notepad and pen in his hands.

"So that's where that portal led me!" Tails exclaimed, talking to someone back on his communicator device. He was scribbling down some notes down on the notepad he was holding, oblivious to the fact that you were staring at him the whole time, "Okay, I recorded everything I needed. I'm now preparing to go back into the portal."

Unfortunately, before Tails could even react, the portal roared out a loud vacuum sound before completing vanishing and exploding behind him, leaving most of the furniture and items in the living room destroyed in the process.

"Oh no!" Tails voice turned into pure panic, "I've lost the portal! Sonic, can you hear me!"

You weren't really an expert in whatever technological babble Tails got into to but judging from the sounds of the surrounding situation. you can barely hear the dead static coming out of the receiver. In a state of fear Tails tries to adjust the knob but to no avail.

Apparently giving up, Tails looks around the surrounding area, observing the furniture that was blown out from the portal explosion. As he took a few more seconds looking at the damage, he turned around and the two of you locked eye contact. That's when Tails finally notices you.

"So this is your house right?" Tails asked, with almost absolute certainty of what your response is.

"Well yes," you answer with a hint of anger in your voice, "And I want to ask a question."

"I guess you can," Tails said, scratching the back of his head nervously, "It is your house after all."

What do you ask?
114231121.title: The Two Tailed Genius

1142311211.content:
The twin tailed genius in front of you answers you "I swear I'm not the one who created that portal, it just showed up in my world & my friends & I decided I should go through it to figure out where it lead then this happened." Tails answers as you nod your head saying "Figured as much." in a nonchalant manner Tails then asks "What about you, how'ed the portal end up here?" You shrug "All I was doing was sitting on my back porch until I hear this loud BAM! noise coming from the inside I go check it out & find a portal floating in front of the TV."

You say honestly stating the truth. Tails nods his head understanding the situation as he begins to look at the destroyed furniture spread about the room. He then looks at you with a look of guilt written all over his face, "I'm so sorr-" He's about to say but you cut him off, "Don't worry about it the stuff was insured so I can just replace the stuff tomorrow."

A smile graces Tails' face as he says "Okay, good." while breathing a sigh of relief. You chuckle at this and say "Alright I've got one last question for you." "What's that?" Tails asked..
1142311211.title: "Did you create the portal?"

choices: You're on a budget. No pizza.
11423112111.content:
"Ya hungry?"

Tails smiled, opening his small mouth as if to answer but a grumbling sound from his stomach did that for him already. You snicker at the noise his tummy made.

"That probably answers my own question,"

Tails laughs in embarrassment, a noticeable red slowly forming both of his cheeks, "Yeah, it sure does."

"Fortunately, I do have food stored up,"

The two of you walk to your very own kitchen, where you grab an assorted range of ingredients from your cupboard and fridge. Laying all of the ingredients out on your kitchen table, you watch as Tails thinks about what to eat, occasionally humming to himself. This went on for a few minutes, waiting for the fox to make a decision. You decide to speak up.

"Made up your mind yet?" you questioned, noticing Tails has only chosen the leftover cheese sticks snack yet was still looking at the food.

"Almost," Tails replied back, biting into one of the sticks, "But I'm not really a great chef. I'm more like an inventor and it doesn't always go well for me. Don't you have any take-away food or something?"

"Actually, we do," you said, nodding in response.

'Really? Do you have any chilli-dogs?" Tails asks with curiosity, his two tails slowly starting to spin together

"I don't think so," you reply back shrugging, "But I know a pizza place that we can order from."

"Can we get pizza?" Tails asks almost immediately with enthusiasm, biting into another one of the cheese sticks, "I don't really want to accidentally destroy and burn down the kitchen as well."

You look at Tails, who is trying to guilt you into buying a pizza using his puppy eyes.
11423112111.title: "Ya hungry?"

114231121111.content:
"Ah screw it! Let get some pizza..." you trail off as you take out your cell phone, "What kind ya want?" you ask your twin tailed buddy as he replies "Any kinds fine." "Alright then I'll get this phoned in & by the way your more then welcome to take your shoes off if you want." you say as Tails nods his head.

With that said you go about ordering the pizza after that you go about setting up the projector you had installed into the ceiling for any situation where your TV got destroyed. "Go ahead & cycle through the list till ya find something ya like, We've got about 20 minutes till the pizza guy shows up." you say as you pass Tails the remote.

The twin tailed genius takes a few moments before deciding on...
114231121111.title: Pizza time!

choices: The final episode of Gravity Falls ever
Actually, he just picked up the remote again...
1142311211112.content:
"So,how much will the insurance cover?" you ask in curiosity, holding your cellphone up to your right ear to talk with your insurance company.

It has been five minutes since you called the pizza delivery guy and while you waited for the pizza to come, you called up your insurance dealer to cover for the damage in the living room. Unfortunately, the conversation you were having with them wasn't going so well.

With anger fuming inside you, you look at the projector and you see Tails sitting on the floor, tapping the buttons on the television remote, changing the channel every few seconds, trying to find a channel that can keep him occupied and entertained. Despite having cable television, you could clearly tell that Tails was getting bored just flicking over the various shows.

Finally, after a lot of television surfing, Tails sighs in relief, thankful that he found a good channel, putting down the remote in the process.

As soon as you angrily hang up on your insurance dealer, your phone exits to its home screen, showing the time and an unlock screen.

Oh boy, ten minutes till pizza time...

You walk into the still-damaged living room, and sit down next to Tails, who was now currently watching...
1142311211112.title: Modern Shows

choices: As you & Tails start watching, the pizza guy shows up
As you & Tails start watching, the power goes out!
11423112111123.content:
You raise an eyebrow as you notice your twin tailed buddy has picked up the remote again, "Still can't find anything good?" you ask as Tails passes you the remote with a grunt of frustration. "Yeah that's the thing, when it gets late in the day there's never anything good on." you say with a bemused chuckle. "Let's see there might be a movie I own that we can watch.."

You trail off as you cycle through the list of movies you have, you notice Tails get a curious look on his face as you stop at the "Open Season" trilogy. "What are those movies about?" Tails asks you as you say "just watch & you'll see." you say as you start up the movie.
11423112111123.title: Actually, he just picked up the remote again...

114231121111232.content:
While you & Tails were watching, suddenly, your sight went completely busted. At first, you thought you became a blind person but after a few more seconds of panicking, you realize that the power just went out. You look around your surroundings, your eyes struggling with making anything out of the darkness. This is getting bad for you.

Unfortunately, to make things worse for you, you still remember that the living room floor will be hard to manoeuvre thanks to the mess that Tails has made. Shrugging once again, you put your hands on your pocket, grabbing your phone out and touching the key-pad on it to call the electrician.

As you wait for your local electrician to pick up, you hear a few knocks come from your front door.

"Who was that?" Tails whispered to your ears, a bit jumpy from the sudden knocking.

"It's obviously the pizza guy," you answer, getting up to get the door. You groan in frustration as you're sent to voice-mail. You hang up and turn to Tails (or where you think Tails is, you honestly can't see much in the dark).

"It's been twenty minutes right?"

"It feels more like fifteen," Tails voices his opinion.

You're probably about a foot away from the front door now and the knocking seems to have slowed down, only now knocking every few seconds or so. Maybe you should answer it? But then again, maybe you shouldn't.
114231121111232.title: Power Outage

choices: Find the generator a few seconds later!
Go about trying to calm Tails down
1142311211112321.content:
Trusting your judgement you open the door & find the pizza guy standing there, pizza in hand. "Let's see, I've got a pork & pepperoni pizza & a cheese pizza." "That's our's.." you trail off as you take a 20 out of your wallet "you got here quick." you say trying to strike up conversation, he chuckles at this "Yeah I got here 2 seconds before the storm did." You hand him the 20 as he hands the pizza to you.

"Keep the change, be careful out there & have a wonderful evening sir." you say as the pizza guy turns to leave, "Yeah you too." he replies back as he heads off & you shut the door. "So, who was it?" Tails says from the still dark living room, "Pizza guy, he got here just before a storm did." "Storm??" Tails asks sounding very nervous. "Hang on a second I'm gonna turn on the backup generator so I don't spill this stuff."

As if to answer Tails' question, a huge boom of thunder goes off outside fallowed by a flash of lightning. "AHAHAH!" Tails screams as he jets up & clings himself to the ceiling, much like a cat would do in situations like this. There's no way around this, you've gotta find that generator & fast. After putting the pizza on the kitchen counter you..
1142311211112321.title: Answer the door.

choices: Try another way of calming Tails down.
11423112111123212.content:
You go about trying to calm Tails down. After all, the generator can sorta wait.

The thunder was still booming from the sky with the bright flashes of the lightning to accompany the noise. You look up to the ceiling and see a frightened Tails cling on the edge of your roof, using a combination of his two yellow tails and his genetically modified gloves to stick on.

In fact... you never realized noticed his advanced gloves before. You shrug, brushing that aside for now.

"C'mon Tails," you plead, tilting your head upwards, "The lightning isn't going to hurt you,"

"I kn-now," Tails stammered, still a bit slightly startled.

"Then why are you clinging on the roof? Wouldn't the lightning have a faster time hitting you?"

Tails pondered this for a good short few seconds. As he did, his tails stopped twirling around and as a result, he fell down on the floor with a loud thud.

"You do pose a good point," Tails commented, getting himself back onto his feet, "Besides I don't hear any lightning or thunder."

Tails placed both hands on his hips, smirking at the absence of thunder. However, he probably celebrated his braveness too early when another lightning strike followed by a thunderous boom was seen and heard.

When you blink, you see Tails jump up to the ceiling again. You shake your head in disapproval. You were about to open your mouth again to try another way to calm him down but you also really need to find that generator... urgently.
11423112111123212.title: Calming Tactics: Phase 1

114231121111232121.content:
You look up at your twin tailed buddy who's still clinging to the roof. "Okay Tails, I'm gonna go activate the generator, I'll probably have to flip the breaker so can you let me know if any lights come back on?" You ask as Tails gives you a shaky nod. With that said you head down to the basement.

You find the generator which had been charged earlier just in case it would be needed. After that you find the fuse box & flip the switches off then flip them back to the on position, you then head over to the stairs "Anything on up there?" you shout as Tails responds...
114231121111232121.title: Find the generator.

1142311211112321211.content:
"Yep! We have light!" you hear a reply come up from above, "And I was just starting to get worried."

You sigh in relief as you walk up the stairs and into the living room. You reach the top of the staircase and re-enter the familiar looking living room, seeing Tails right up next to you. Maybe a little too close.

"Thanks buddy!" Tails exclaims before tightly hugging you, with you struggling to breathe in the process.

Tails soon takes notices of this and lets go of his firm grip.

"Sorry," Tails giggled with embarrassment, before calming down, "Just got a little frightened. Besides, I almost fell into a spider web next to me."

Tails pointed to the web in one of the corners of the room with his right hand, using his left hand to wipe the sweat of his forehead.

"Yeah, it could've been much worse," you comment, "But now I got some footprints on my roof."

"Sorry again," Tails apologizes once more. You're beginning to think that bringing Tails wasn't such a great idea to begin with but to be honest, you probably need to company. It does get lonely in here regularly.

"Yeah, I'll just clean it tomorrow," you shrug it off. You look outside the window, watching as the storm passes away from your house.

"So can we eat that pizza now?" Tails asks excitedly.
1142311211112321211.title: The Light Path

choices: You & Tails sleep till the next morning
Tails wakes you up in the middle of the night (Did he have a nightmare?)
11423112111123212111.content:
"Sure." you say with a shrug, "Yippee!!" Tails exclaims doing a flip, you chuckle at his antics running a hand through his hair saying "You're such a kid!" After that you fix a plate of pizza for Tails & yourself as you go back to the movie.

(About an hour later)

The two of you groan in satisfaction as you've gotten your fill of the pizza.

You notice the movie has finished up so you shut the projector off, You look over at your twin tailed buddy & find him sleeping peacefully you look down however & see that his shoes are still on. "Let's get these off.." you think to yourself as you take Tails' shoes off his feet. You smile as Tails' toes wiggle in happiness, "Cute." you think to yourself with a light chuckle.

After that you take him to the guest bedroom & put him to bed after which you go to bed yourself.
11423112111123212111.title: bon appetit

114231121111232121112.content: Not 10 minutes after you went to bed there's a knock at your door, you open the door & see Tails standing there. "Hey little buddy what's wrong?" Tails sniffles a little as he says "I had a nightmare. Can I sleep with you? Please!!" He asks you as he looks like he's about to cry. Now you've got a decision to make, Do you let him sleep with you?
114231121111232121112.title: The wake up call

choices: Eat your breakfast and start the day.
Eat your breakfast and talk to Tails.
1142311211112321211121.content:
"Of course you can little buddy!" you say, motioning your hand on the bed. With a smile on his face, he climbs onto your bed and snuggles you under the covers before almost immediately falling right asleep. You feel the sudden warmth of his fur crawled on your body.

You eventually fall asleep on the thought that you had to help Tails get back to his homeworld.

That night, you had a terrible dream:

-----

You looked around and saw hundreds of FBI soldiers, all surrounding your house with a frightened Tails by your side.

You saw each of soldiers aim their guns at the both of you, with their fingers on the trigger. Before the bullets came through the small holes, you wake up, groggily, alone in your bed.

-----

You look at your clock, seeing the time was eight in the morning. For the most part, you were kinda disturbed about the nightmare that just occurred, and it all seemed so real. At least, that's what you think.

You spend a few minutes of thinking about that dream, trying to figure out what it all meant before you smell a fresh smell of cooked eggs as well as some robot noises. Rubbing your eyes, you get up from your bed and walk to your kitchen to eat some breakfast. As you walk towards your kitchen, you see Tails tampering with an electronic device, configuring it to something. After hearing your footsteps, Tails turns around, watching as you walk down your hallway, dragging your feet along the ground.

Tails waves at you with an enthusiastic smile, "Hey, thanks for letting me sleep in your bed. I made you breakfast!"

He hands you a plate of scrambled eggs along with a glass of milk.
1142311211112321211121.title: Dream

choices: ...try & sneak a peek at you in the shower
11423112111123212111212.content:
"Well this is a surprise, the guest catering the host." You say with a laugh as Tails giggles "I just wanted to do something nice for you, sense you took me into your home & all." You shrug, "Fair enough." "So, do you have any plans for today?" Tails asks you as you both are working on breakfast, "We'll probably go to the store to get a few groceries because we're running low on some things & go shopping for some clothes for you & myself."

Tails raises an eyebrow as he asks "What do I need clothes for?" "Simple, to keep you hidden from the government & yes we will try to find a way to get you back to your world but there's no telling how long that could take. Ya get me?" Tails nods his head understanding what you mean, "I see your point." "Good, good but before we do any of that we gotta get cleaned up."

(10 minutes later)

After you got the breakfast cleaned up you ask Tails if he wants to take a bath first or if you should shower first. "You go ahead & shower first I'll take a bath after." "Alright then." With that said you go about laying a clean set of clothes before starting up your shower. Tails meanwhile is in the living room lost in his thoughts, "Hmm, What was that thing I saw on (your name)'s chest last night? it looked almost like a dragon tattoo, I haven't seen anything like that on him before.." As Tails says this he gets a devious idea to...
11423112111123212111212.title: Eat your breakfast and talk to Tails.

choices: Try to climb through the Bathroom window.
114231121111232121112122.content:
Lost in his various thoughts, a bright yet ominous one struck out to him. Tails tried to ignore the idea to

The feeling of curiosity got the better of him and he tried to sneak a peek at you in the shower. Unfortunately for him, the bathroom door was locked. Being the genius that Tails was, he wasn't ready to give up; instead, his curiosity only grew stronger. It was going to take some quick thinking for the fox to deal with this problem. He considered his choices to overcome the issue but as he went through each choice, he eventually only found two options he could try, but he would know that they still had their elements of risk and disadvantages, but Tails knew that it was the only way to overcome his sudden interest in you.

The first option he could try was to lockpick the door. Tails, who was a genius in comparison to his friends back in his homeworld, figured that he could easily lockpick the door. However, while the task itself was easy, it was finding a lockpick in the house or building one. Either way, it could take a while to even find or create a decent-enough lockpicking device. The fox wasn't even familiar with the whole house, let alone where everything was. By the time he could build/find a lockpicking device, it might be too late to fulfil his mission. Though, out of the two options, it was the far less risky and might be rewarding in the long-run.

The only other option that was worth trying was climbing through the window, high up on the wall. For Tails, it would be much quicker than the former and because of his ability to fly, he can easily reach the opening of the window. Even though it was easy enough to get there, the actual problem was that the size of the window. Tails turned his neck upwards slightly and glanced at the transparent glass pane separating the bathroom from the rest of the house. Mentally taking down notes, he judged the diameter of the window to be an average of 53cm, which is barely enough to sneak through it. There was also the added noise which could set an alert that could easily get him caught.

Time was ticking for Tails. He had to pick one option, fast!
114231121111232121112122.title: Try is the Keyword

choices: Decide to continue the shower like normal till he finds you. (Friends route)
Poke him in the belly to make him giggle a little. (Big/little bro route)
Say that he could have just asked to join you. (Romance route)
1142311211112321211121222.content:
Tails sighs as he makes his decision "Why do I have the feeling that I'm going to regret this?" Tails thinks to himself as he heads out the back door leading to the wall that barricades your bathroom from the outside world. Making sure to take off his gloves & shoes as to try not to make noise or get them wet in the end Tails (now technically naked) begins to ascend up to your bathroom window ever so slowly.

You meanwhile, chuckle a little in your head as you kind of expected this to happen, so you decided before your shower started that if Tails does try to join you in here you'll let him join, you're both boys so there's no harm done. With that thought you get back to your shower. Meanwhile after what felt like an hour when in reality it was only just under a minute, Tails reaches the window.

Trying to be very quiet Tails slowly opens the window & sneaks in, however with all the steam in the bathroom he can't tell if he got in here without you noticing. You..
1142311211112321211121222.title: Move over Snake a new animal has taken your place!

11423112111123212111212221.content:
As you were rubbing shampoo on your hair, your ears picked up the sound of faint footsteps, right next to you. You panicked for a second until you hear another faint whisper, cursing himself, although the voice was very familiar to you. As soon as you heard that familiar tone of voice, you immediately knew it was Tails, which caused all of that worry to disappear.

Meanwhile, a few metres away from your position, Tails was up to the point where he had his bare feet on the bathroom rug next to the shower, brushing off his feet. After wiping off his feet, Tails decided to execute his final stage of his grand plan. He calmly entered the shower, hoping that he wouldn't notice you, Carefully and cautiously, he slowly opened the shower curtain a quarter of the way before slipping in with you. Unfortunately for you, his lack of awareness made him incredibly obvious to spot, even with all the steam coming out of the shower.

"Tails, I already know you're in here," you say in a somewhat firm voice, making him known to you

"Wait how?" Tails asked, in a shocked manner, "I swear I was as quiet as a mouse,"

You chuckled at that statement, "You're not that good at being other animals then huh? You made so much noise out there that you were hardly a mouse."

"Oh," Tails said defeatedly, "I'll just keep on being a fox then. Can I at least join you?"

You contemplate answering Tails question, considering both sides of the hypothetical coin that comes to you. On the one hand, you're almost finished showering, and you'd rather not continue using your water. However, you can't recall if Tails has actually taken a shower or bath. In fact, you don't recall him cleaning himself at all during his stay here. Maybe you can help him?
11423112111123212111212221.title: Decide to continue the shower like normal

choices: Puffed out! Now he looks like a big teddy bear :)
114231121111232121112122211.content:
You nod with a smile at your twin tailed friend and say "Sure Tails, in fact let me help you out. I'll get your hair taken care of while you get the body wash out of the way. That alright with you?" You ask to which Tails nods, afterwards you toss Tails a bottle of body wash & a body sponge which Tails catches.

You smile at that, "Nice catch.." You say trailing off as you put some of the shampoo into your palm, Tails blushes a little at this as he says "Hehe thanks." After that you go about lathering the shampoo into Tails' hair while Your little buddy focuses on getting his body cleaned, while working on your task you notice that Tails' namesakes are wagging happily.

Apparently you've stumbled upon a spot where Tails likes to be petted or scratched, much like a pet dog. You smile and make a mental note of that for later, after a while You & Tails finish up your shower. After shutting off the water you step out and grab a towel, Tails fallows your lead and grabs a towel of his own.

You smile at that because you don't have to worry about Tails doing the 'dog shake' to dry off, which would have gotten water EVERYWHERE! As you finish drying off you look at Tails and see that his fur...
114231121111232121112122211.title: "Okay, sure."

choices: Go grocery and clothes shopping like you had planned
1142311211112321211121222111.content:
You giggle at the sight of him. He's confused until he looks into a mirror. When he sees himself, he starts to become embarrassed. You tell him to not worry, and to sit down. Tails goes over to a chair and listens to you.

"Um, what are you going to do?" He asks curiously. You simply smile and tell him to close his eyes. He does so, giving you time to grab a brush and walk behind him. You start to brush his fur, trying to get every spot. Though he can feel you, he's unsure of what you're doing. Whatever it was though, it felt nice. You brushed the back of his head, his back, and even his chest (which tickled him a little). You're ready to brush his tails, however, you don't want him to panic.

"Tails, don't freak out from what I'm about to do." You tell him.

"Don't worry, I trust you." Tails replied confidently, making you smile. You grab one of his tails, making him flinch a little. You brushed it softly, making your friend smile. Though it felt weird having someone working on his tail, it felt nice and relaxing. Once you were done, you brushed the other tail. It moved a little bit more, but you were eventually able to get it. You told him to open his eyes. When he saw himself in the mirror, he was both surprised and very happy. "Wow! It's like I was never in the shower, yet I'm still clean!" He said. Tails gave you a hug and smiled. "Now, it's my turn." Tails said, catching you off guard.

"Wait, what?"

"You heard me. I'm going to brush your hair, at least just the top of your head. Please, can I?" Tails asked nicely. You thought for a moment.

"Well, if you don't mind, I can't see why I should argue." You said. You sat down and gave Tails the brush. You then closed your eyes like Tails did. You could feel him working, it was weird knowing that a video game/anime character was doing this. It felt like he worked on it forever. When he was done, you were surprised to see your hair was how it was normally done, just the way you like it. You thanked Tails, making him blush. The two of you got dressed and decided to . . .
1142311211112321211121222111.title: Brushing the fur down

choices: Ask Tails where he'd like to go for lunch.
11423112111123212111212221111.content:
As you and Tails head out to the driveway to get in your car Tails asks you "Ok so are going to get groceries first or are we getting clothes first?" You take a moment to start your car before responding, "I was thinking we could go get the clothes first cause the quicker we can keep you from getting caught by the government the better!" Tails raises an eyebrow at this so you continue, "Ya'see with the way you look now people will think you're a guy in costume, but if they see you like that for awhile they'll start to get suspicious.

Tails nods understanding the way your thinking, "I get what your saying but how are we going to cover up the fact that I have 2 tails, a fox nose and fox ears as well as fur?" You chuckle at this as you say "Don't worry buddy you'll see." as you pull your car into the parking lot. After you and Tails get out the first place you go to is a clothes store, after the two of you enter the store you head over to the counter where a girl is stationed.

The girl smiles and beckons you over, you chuckle at her antics and say "Hey Lola. How you doing?" As you reach the counter the girl now known as Lola takes notice of Tails, "I'm doing good who's this little guy?" She asks you as she and Tails share a handshake. "His name is Tails, yes THAT Tails. Anyway we're here to get some clothes for him if you know what I mean." You say giving her a wink.

Lola gets what you're saying and winks back saying "I got ya you 2 come with me.." Trailing off as the two of you fallow her into the back. Lola then hands Tails what looks to be a mask that you'd wear in a masquerade party. "What this mask for?" He asks you as you begin to explain, "Ya see Tails that mask has a very unique ability, it makes it so that anyone that hasn't seen the way you look normally such as Lola & myself will see you as a little human kid."

Tails jumps for joy at this news as he says "That means I can still be with you without causing trouble!" going over to you and hugging you as tight as he can his tails wagging happily in the process. "The great thing about that mask though is when you wear it it turns invisible, so no one that doesn't already know about the mask will know you have it on!" You say excitedly as you hug Tails back.

After the clothes shopping is done, you and Tails go the the grocery store to get a few things.

After the shopping is done you put all the stuff you bought at the store away in your fridge and pantry, after that you take a look at the clock and notice that it's lunch time. You then decide to.."

(A/N I should also point out that the mask that makes tails look like a human also gives him clothes so he can blend in)
11423112111123212111212221111.title: A day out on the town

choices: Kidnapped and taken away from horrible parents
Adopted and taken away from a bad orphanage
114231121111232121112122211112.content:
You decided you had run around enough for the day, so you and Tails stayed home. You told Tails to take off his mask, while you made you started to make something. Though Tails was a little hesitant, he listened and patiently waited. You told him it was going to be a while, so he should find something to do.

"I don't mean to offend you, but how about you go watch TV?" You suggested. Tails nodded and left the room. As you were working in the kitchen, you started to think. It was going to be weird walking around with him in town, even if he did look human to others. You didn't mind, it was just that the thought of it was weird. Within a couple of hours, you made a couple of cheeseburgers and salads. You called Tails and told him it was time to eat. When he came, he was holding something. You put a plate in front of him and looked to see what he was holding. It was a picture book.

"Sorry, I kind of got bored and started looking for something to do upstairs when I found this." Tails said, embarrassed.

"It's ok." You said smiling. "I don't recognize it, so let's open it up after lunch." Tails nodded and excitedly ate his food. He ate it pretty fast, while you took your time. He was very patient though, waiting until you finished as well. Once both of you were done, you went into the living room and opened it up. Inside were pictures of your mother and father. They looked happy together.

"Where are you?" Tails asked.

"I guess I wasn't born yet, or they're on a trip."

"Are you sure? Something doesn't feel right to me. My tails are twitching, and that's never a good sign." Tails looked worried. You simply sighed and took some of the photos out, flipping them over to the other side. Usually, the date of when it was taken was written on the back, so you knew you could stop your friend from worrying. However, when you saw the dates, something was wrong. According to the dates, these were taken a month before you were born. The problem with this was your mom clearly wasn't pregnant. You looked through the others, only to find the same result.

"I don't understand. They're not my real parents?" You asked yourself, your head was starting to hurt.

"What's this?" Tails said, noticing a page. When you opened it, it looked like it once belonged to a diary. Tails started to read. "We've finally done it. We have a kid of our own. We'll move far away so no one will know. He should never find out about what we did, it could tear his life apart. He'll now be safe with us hopefully." The page said. Tails started reading to himself.

"Are you able to find anything that says where I came from?" You asked. Tails hesitated, but then found something.

"Well, it says here that you were . . .
114231121111232121112122211112.title: The truth you never wanted to know

choices: Have Tails pick what you 2 have for dinner.
1142311211112321211121222111122.content:
Your eyes go wide as you process your twin tailed friends words, "No wonder I look nothing like my parents!" You say as you snap your fingers in realization. Tails nods his head in agreement as he says "That makes sense, but there's still something bugging me." He said referring to his still twitching tails, "What would that be?" You ask waiting for him to continue. "Why is it that your mom and dad aren't around now?"

He asks as you let out a sigh, "I think.." You say trailing off as you work to get your shirt off. "..This might have something to do with it." You say as Tails gets a good look at the dragon tattoo on your chest. "Wait what does that have to do with them not being around?" Tails asks you curiously "That has everything to do with them!" You shout startling tails a bit.

"Why?" Tails asks now a bit scared to find out, "Because they're dead!" You shout as you slam your hand onto the table startling tails a bit in the process, you take notice of that and quickly gain control of your nerves. "Sorry buddy I didn't mean to scare you." Tails nods saying "I't's alright you just startled me a bit." before giving you a kind and understanding smile.

"Thanks, hey if you want I can explain the story behind my dragon tattoo." At this Tails nods his head vigorously very interested to find out more. You chuckle at his eagerness, "Okay then, before you learn the story of how I got this you must know the story of the seven deadly sins..." You say as you begin your story. "A long time ago in the time of knights and dragons there existed 7 knights that possessed very unique powers.."

------

"The one knight that was strongest out of all of them though was Meliodus: The dragon's sin of wreath..."

(Time skip)

"..and that's the story of the 7 deadly sins." You say as you finish the story, "I'm guessing that this Meliodus guy is your ancestor right?" Tails asks as you nod. "Yep and because of that I got this tattoo when I was born. My parents had to pay the ultimate price for it.." Tails looks at you sadly as he says "I'm sorry that happened to them." You sigh as you give him a smile. "Can't be helped now sense it already happened."

After that you take a look at the clock and see that it's only four pm so you and Tails decide to watch TV for awhile eventually Tails says "I'm getting a bit hungry could we have something for dinner?" At that you decide to...

(A/N: if you want to see the full story behind the 7 deadly sins I recommend you watch the anime about them known as Nanatsu No Taizai)
1142311211112321211121222111122.title: Every blessing has a curse

choices: You decided to take a walk
11423112111123212111212221111222.content:
After what you just learned, you didn't feel like cooking. You put your shirt on and went for the phone. You decided to order two large pizzas. The first was pepperoni and the other had pineapple on it. You also got bread-sticks and some brownies for dessert. They said it was going to take about twenty minutes, so you and Tails decided to watch TV while you wait. You couldn't help but notice that Tails seemed to be worried about something. You asked him what was wrong.

"Well, it just feels strange. Knowing that you were adopted and that you have that tattoo. Now that we know your history, I wonder . . .if you want me to leave." He says, making you shocked.

"Whoa, hold on. I don't want you to leave. Why would you think that?" You question.

"Well, your ancestor was a great hero, meanwhile I'm not very unique compared to you."

"Says the only guy with two tails, and can use them to fly. Seriously, you're really special in your own way. Besides, it's not about the past. It's about now, and right now you're my friend. Please stay." You smile at him, causing him to smile.

"Well, alright then. If you say so." Suddenly, the doorbell rang, signaling that the pizza was here. You went and paid the employee. You then brought everything back to the living room and sat down. Neither Tails, nor you hesitated and started to eat. While you ate, you decided to put on a movie, it would cheer both of you up. You smiled as Tails ate a lot. After the movie ended, . . .
11423112111123212111212221111222.title: The friendship grows

114231121111232121112122211112221.content:
You chuckle a bit at the sight of the slumbering fox sleeping on your couch, you carefully lift him up being sure not to wake him as you whisper in his ear "Let's put you to bed hmm?" You say not getting a response as you expected, you take him to the guest bedroom and lay him on the bed putting the covers over him as you do so you quietly say "Sleep tight little buddy."

Afterward you lightly kiss his forehead as you leave him to let him sleep heading to your room to do the same before you fully leave the room though you hear Tails talking apparently in his sleep "Oh *your name* you are such a great friend to me, I hope I don't have to leave you and I hope you love me as much as I love you."

He says mumbling with a blush on his face as he said the last part, you blush a little as well but smile nonetheless. After that you head to your room to go to bed, as you lay in bed you can't stop your thoughts from going to one of the classes that you had in school.

The lesson about what makes mammals mammals, specifically. You remember that all mammals have a belly button, you then think back to Tails, "Does he have a belly button?" You think to yourself as you stare at the ceiling, you eventually make up your mind and think "if I want to find out I'll ask him." With that you fall asleep intending to do just that tomorrow.

The next morning you wake up, get a quick shower and go to the living room to watch TV till Tails gets up. Eventually Tails comes into the room and greets you with a good morning mixed with a yawn, "Morning." You reply back as he sits down next to you on the couch, seeing your chance you make your move. "Hey Tails there's something I'm wondering about that I hope you can give an answer to.." Tails gives you his full attention as he asks "What would that be?" "I was wondering if you had a belly button?"

Tails looks confused for a moment before he smiles and says "Yes I do have a belly button." Tails thinks for a moment before he asks "Would you like to see it?" He asks blushing a bit, you blush a bit as well as you say "Yes if you don't mind that is." Tails nods his head at this saying "I don't mind at all. I just need you to stand up for a moment so I can move to the middle of the couch."

You do as he asks as you wait for him to tell you what to do, you bend down to one knee as he says "All you need to do is part the fur in the center of my belly. Just be careful I'm a little ticklish." He says with a small giggle as you nod, you do as he said and part the fur where he said to getting a giggle or two out of him in the process. You eventually find it and see that Tails has a _____ belly button!

(What kind of belly button does he have?)
114231121111232121112122211112221.title: Sleep talking and sleep thinking

choices: Let's celebrate by going somewhere fun
Let's do that again, only this time, I tickle you
1142311211112321211121222111122211.content:
You're interested to see he has an innie. It was small and adorable. You sort of wished you could shrink and hop inside, but alas, it wasn't meant to be. Once you were done looking at it, you decided to mess with Tails a little bit. You started to tickle around his bellybutton. As soon as he felt you, he blushed.

"H-Hey . . Cut that out, it tickles." He said, giggling. He grabbed your arms to try and slow you down, but he was no match for your strength. You kept going, listening to Tails laugh. You decide to try and tickle him somewhere else. You took everything off of his feet and started to tickle the bottom of his foot. As you were doing this, you suddenly realized that taking off his shoes meant you left him naked, basically. You ignored it and kept making him laugh. He immediately noticed where you were tickling and started to blush a lot. "Did you really want to see my bellybutton? Hahaha or did you just want . . He he . . To torture me with tickling?" Tails struggled to get out.

You simply smiled at him and didn't stop. You looked behind him to see his tails. It looked like they were dancing. Tails kept laughing until he pushed you back with his foot. You watched him as he caught his breath.

"That was fun. No one has ever tickled me like that before. So . . . "
1142311211112321211121222111122211.title: The Fox's laugh

choices: ..Your little sister Jamie! (Whom you haven't seen in awhile)
..One of your friends from school! (whom you haven't seen sense graduation)
11423112111123212111212221111222111.content:
You chuckle at his enthusiasm as you notice his tails wagging like crazy, "He must be pretty happy." You think in your head as you then ask "Anywhere you want to go?" At this a thoughtful look crosses Tails' face, "Do you know of anywhere we can go for breakfast?" At that you take a moment to think before you get an idea, "well there's a Waffle House close to here if you want to go and eat there?"

You asked as Tails nods his head vigorously. "Yes please! I'd love to go there!!" He said with a lot more excitement then you were expecting, "Okay then." You say, slightly taken aback. However you quickly recover as you continue "But before we go you'll need to put your shoes & mask back on before we leave." Tails looks at himself as you say this and blushes at his current state of undress, "Oh yeah. I forgot. Hehe." He says with a chuckle as he scratches the back of his neck in embarrassment.

You chuckle a bit as well as you go about getting your shoes and your car keys, as you grab the keys though you think of something. You and Tails haven't come up with a name for him when he's in disguise! You mention that to Tails and he says while he's in his human disguise he'll go by the name of Mark or Marcus. With that taken care of you and Tails head out to the car.

After you & Tails get situated at a booth your waitress comes over to take your orders and to your surprise it's someone you know! it was..

(A/N: Just to make sure no one gets confused Tails happens to love pancakes and waffles second only to chili dogs at least in this story anyway)
11423112111123212111212221111222111.title: Sometime out of the house

114231121111232121112122211112221111.content:
You were surprised to see that out of all people it could have been, it was your own sister. She had long brown hair and was just a little shorter than you. She wore a green outfit except for one thing, she was barefoot. That surprised you because even though you remembered her almost never wearing footwear, her boss apparently didn't mind.

"Well hello big brother. It's been a while hasn't it?" She said smiling.

"Yeah, how long was it? Four months?" You asked. Jamie nodded, though Tails was confused.

"I'm sorry, but do you know her?" He asked

"Oh right, sorry about that. Jamie this is my friend Ta- . . I mean Mark. Mark, this is my sister Jamie." You say. The two of them shake hands.

"It's nice to meet you Mark. Any friend of his is a friend of mine. Maybe later I can come over and get to know you better." She said. Before you could respond, Tails nodded and said that would be great. "Okay, after work I'll come by so be ready. Now, what can I get you?"

Both you and Tails ordered waffles, however, Tails got way more than you did. You weren't worried about your sister coming over later, if she found out who Tails really was, she's good at keeping secrets. The two of you ate and talked. Tails was excited to see what kind of person Jamie was. When the two of you got home, Tails immediately started to get ready, which made you smile.
114231121111232121112122211112221111.title: Interesting reunion

1142311211112321211121222111122211112.content:
After taking a few minutes to get ready you & Tails suddenly hear a knock on the door, "That was fast." Tails said a bit surprised at your sisters timing. "That's Jamie for you, she tends to show up unexpectedly." You say chuckling a bit as you go to answer the door. As soon as you open the door you're wrapped up in a tight hug as Jamie bear hugs you, effectively knocking the both of you onto the floor with a thud.

"Hey sis, the rest of your shift turn out okay?" You groan out as Jamie springs off you in seconds leaving Tails to help you up, "You okay?" He asks you a bit worried, you chuckle at this and take his hand, "I'm fine buddy." You then notice Jamie scratching the back of her neck in embarrassment, "Sorry Bro, guess I just don't know my own strength." "No prob sis. Anyway if your hungry there's pizza in the fridge I'll be out back getting some air." You say as Jamie and Tails start to play a few games.

As you sit on the back porch you ask "What is it Rageidous?" speaking to no one in particular, suddenly a voice speaks in your head "I'm seeing some strange thoughts coming from the people around you." "Okay give me a sec." With that you close your eyes and begin to meditate, after a second you open your eyes and find yourself in a field or meadow of some kind. The real shock about this place though is the giant dragon sitting with a pond in front of him.

"What's this about strange thoughts Rageidous?" You ask as the dragon's mixture of black and red scales reflect beautifully of the pond water's surface, the dragon then responds in a voice with a hint of a growl. "I'm hearing the thoughts of this new fox friend of yours." You raise an eyebrow at the mention of Tails, "What do you mean? what has Tails been thinking about that seems strange?" The dragon now known as Rageidous responds "While you two were sleeping I heard him thinking about you in his dreams."

"Really?" you ask curious, Rageidous nods "Yeah but that's not the strange part! At one point I heard him say he was in love." Your taken aback by that as you say "He's in love, with who??" You ask wanting to hear the details, however what Rageidous says next would be something you were not expecting. "He's in love with.."
1142311211112321211121222111122211112.title: Jamie knocks on the door

11423112111123212111212221111222111121.content:
"Are you saying, like the personal kind of love?" You ask.

"That is correct." Rageideous said. You couldn't believe it, the two tailed fox cared about you that much. Even though the news came completely random, you actually didn't mind. However, you decided it would be best if you waited until Tails said something. You thanked Rageideous for the news and stopped meditating.

When you went back to the others, you noticed that Tails was playing connect four with your sister. As you were looking at Tails, you couldn't stop thinking about the information. It made it even more awkward thinking about some of the memories you had with him.

"Hey, welcome back. Now that you're here, let's all do something together." Tails said. You smiled and decided to . . .
11423112111123212111212221111222111121.title: Unexpected answer

You and Jamie give him odd looks as you ask the question that's on both of your minds, "What do you mean buddy?" You ask, remembering that Tails is still going by the name Mark when Jamie's around.

With that Tails begins to explain, "You see if we're not careful the truths could get a bit too personal and the dares could get really out of hand. Ya know what I mean?" Tails asks his face turning pink at the part about truths being too personal, you blush a bit too as you remember the information Rageidous told you but you smile at Tails never the less. "Don't worry buddy, me and Jamie know to be careful when it comes to truth or dare. We know that all too well."

You say as you and Jamie share an awkward laugh, "That we do big brother, that we do."

With that the three of you sit down on the living room floor to get the game started, "So Who's going to go first?" Jamie asks as Tails decides to be brave, "I'll go first!" Tails says putting on a brave face, Jamie smiled. "Okay then Mark truth or dare?"

"What? You know my real name." Tails said, Jamie smiled.

"I know the two of you have lied to me, after all, he started to say something else before calling you Mark." She pointed to you, making you feel embarrassed.

"I thought we weren't going to go too personal." Tails said.

"Aha, so you do have a different name. Please tell me, I promise I won't tell anyone." She said. You leaned in over by Tails and discussed whether or not you should reveal his name. After a couple of minutes of talking it over, the two of you decided to show her who Tails really was. After all, Jamie was really good at keeping secrets, and Tails didn't mind if it was just her.

"Fine, but you can't tell anyone, please." Tails said.

"Don't worry, my lips are sealed." Jamie said. Tails took off his disguise, revealing his furry true form. Jamie . . .

Jamie let's out a gasp of shock as she takes in Tails true form, "Whoa! That is so cool!!" You chuckle at your sister's enthusiasm, "What's cool the fact that you're talking to Tails the fox or the fact that you're not talking to a teenage geek?" You ask as you & Tails share a laugh, "Both!" She says laughing a bit as well. With that the 3 of you continue the game of truth or dare. Tails looks curiously at the bottle but before he can ask anything you just tell him, "You'll find out.." making him even more curious.

Suddenly Jamie burst out laughing as she says "Oh man! I haven't seen you do that sense the day you busted all the school's windows!" Tails begins to laugh as well as he says "I bet your teacher and the principal weren't happy about that." "You don't know the half of it." You and Jamie both say as you share a laugh. After the laughter dies down Jamie takes a look at the clock and sees that it says 10:30. "Oh shoot! it's that late already?! I gotta get home and get to bed! I've got work tomorrow morning!" She says in a rush to collect her things.

"Sorry I can't stay longer bro! See ya Tails, nice meeting you!" She says not giving either of you a chance to say anything as she's out the door in seconds, Fallowing her lead the two of you start to get ready for bed, before you can head to the bed you notice Tails looks like he wants to ask you something. "Yeah Tails, something on your mind?" Tails then responds "I was wondering if.."

choices: "...I want to tell you something that needs to be said."

1142311211112321211121222111122211112111.content:
"Yeah, sure. Is something up?" You ask. Suddenly, Tails wraps his arms around you.

"I've been having nightmares about Eggman. In them, he… he… oh I can't even say it." Tails said, on the verge of tears. You give a friendly smile and give him a hug.

"Don't worry, I don't mind. Come on." You say and bring Tails to your bedroom. You then take all of your clothes off except your underwear for two reasons. The first is so Tails doesn't get fur on your clothes, and the second is you think he might like it since you know his true feelings about you. You get into bed first and motion Tails to come. He nods and climbs in, wrapping his arms around you. To you, he feels like a puppy or a soft toy. Before you know it, the little fox falls asleep, still holding onto you. Even though you can't really move, you don't mind at all. You give him a kiss on the forehead and fall asleep.

That night, you dreamed about Tails. You were in your underwear and he had you in a cage. He fed you and took care of you like a pet. He took you out of the cage so the two of you could have fun outside and work together. At the end, Tails climbed in the cage with you and curled up next to you.

When you woke up the next morning, Tails was waiting for you to wake up.

"Good, your awake. Thank you for letting me sleep with you, I didn't have any nightmares last night. Anyway . . . "
1142311211112321211121222111122211112111.title: Bedtime together

You ask as you work on getting dressed, Tails meanwhile is sitting upon your bed twiddling his thumbs with a thoughtful look on his face in a nervous manner. You say trailing off as you lean down and kiss his forehead affectionately.

"...I feel the same way." You say in a whisper that sends shivers down Tails' spine, "Anyway now that that's been taken care of I'm gonna go fix us some breakfast.." Tails chuckles at your statement saying "Why did I have a feeling you were going to say that?"

"Am I that predictable?" You say in a joking manner, Tails chuckles at your joke as he says "Don't worry I'm fine if that's what you want to do." Giving you a smile as he says this. You smile as well as you say "The only thing we need to figure out is how I'm going to study your belly button?" Tails then says "Well, I could make a.."
1142311211112321211121222111122211112111.title: Feelings revealed

choices: Explore the inside, causing him to laugh
1142311211112321211121222111122211112111.content:
The two of you agree to make a shrink ray since you didn't want to damage the town, or accidentally reveal Tails to the public. You take Tails to the garage where there is a lot of tools.

"Are there any other parts that can be used?" Tails asked. You nod and go to the backyard shed to grab some. You bring back as much as you can. When you get back, you see Tails quietly working, already a bit dirty. You smile and put the parts down next to him. You observe him for two hours, waiting for something to happen. "No, she has her mark because she loves to learn more. Especially how to fight and use magic. She almost never stops searching for new magic. "No, it's not that she might, it's more that if she does, she will probably want to study you for days, let's also keep silent about the master emerald, she would go absolute nuts, and… may try to take the power for herself."

"I wanted to run around and get fresh air. However, I wanted you to join me just in case I get lost or something happens." Tails explained. You looked at your surroundings. You had made it to the park and the sun going down made everyone go home.

"Okay then, but we need to stop if we see someone." You said. Tails nodded and handed you his hands. You grabbed his gloves and pulled them off, revealing the orange paws. You then took off his shoes and stepped back.

"Oh. It feels wonderful." Tails said and suddenly started to run. His tails moved excitedly as the fox weaved around trees. "I've always wanted to do this, I just didn't have the confidence." Tails got so excited, he suddenly started to take off into the air. You ran, following him. You smiled, it was nice seeing your friend have fun. Tails zoomed around in the fresh air, eventually going down and landing on you. You fell to the ground, as Tails stayed on all fours on your chest.

"Oh my, a mighty creature has captured me, whatever will I do?" You playfully said, making your friend giggle. He leaned in and kissed you on the cheek.

"Hey, how about we play a game." Tails suggested, climbing off of you.

"Tails..." you began after a brief moment, your voice filled with comfort as you continued to watch him deeply relax in your presence. Something clicked deep in your mind as you came to a decision, "Tails, I can do the singing."

"Thanks," Tails replies resting his head on you.

You decide to sing the lullaby that you sang to your sister to soothe her in action. You remember the melody so clearly that you used to sing to her every night when she was scared. This was no different in this situation. The thunder and lightning still persisted yet was dying down. With your quiet voice, you start the melody, letting Tails head fall by the sides of your shoulder, loosely hugging him. You can tell that Tails is getting tired by nodding off slowly into sleep.

"Ohhh someone's getting sleepy I see," you said with a grin,

"Well, it's hard not to when you're hearing an amazing voice like yours," Tails drowsily replied with a yawn.

"How about I sing you another lullaby?" you suggest, not noticing the fox had spread some of his saliva on you, absently drooling, "If you can still stay awake that is."

Is Tails sleeping?

11423112112.content:
"What should we do now?" you ask with concern

The fox put down his notebook and pen and looked at you with a quizzical frown etched on his face, "I'm not sure I follow."

"I mean aren't your friends going to be worried that the portal to their world disappeared?"

Distressed, Tails thought about his homeworld, pondering the dilemma that was presented to him for a few good seconds, "Yeah, We definitely should be concerned about bringing back the portal. I really don't want my friends to worry about this for nothing."

"Then, what are we waiting for?" You grin at him, proceeding to walk forward.

However, before you successfully took one step forward to examine the debris, Tails stopped you in your tracks, holding out his arm in front of you, obviously not in the mood to rush into the situation.

"Wait," Tails frowned, stopping you from proceeding further, "There is a possibility of radiation lingering around the area. We need to be cautious about that for a few more hours."

You take a step back and pull Tails hand away from you. With the radiated space out of the question, you turn to your second choice of investigating, "What about your notes? What do they say? Is there anything that you've written down that might help us?"

The yellow fox grabbed his notebook from the table and started to skim through it, flipping through a few pages before stopping at the intended page, "I can tell you about how we found this portal in the first place but it might be a waste of time."

How do you proceed?

Tails eyes and ears perked up, undoubtedly realizing how badly he actually needed to go.

"Yeah, actually I do... quickly!" Tails the fox exclaims, smiling in relief and secretly glad that you said something about his body language, "You know where it is right?"

You would've been a little insulted and offended by this comment even if he didn't mean to. However, it's hard to be mad at someone so cute.

"Why wouldn't I know where my own bathroom is," you chuckle, teasing the yellow fox a little. You start giving simple directions to the fox, knowing that it is indeed turning into a rather urgent matter.

"Okay, thanks!" he thanks you before he runs (almost sprinting) to the bathroom and closes the door to take a leak. As you hear the sound of running liquid, you start to wonder what the next logical step is. You wait for a while, hoping that Tails comes back sooner but seemingly, he's taking his time there.

Well, it's been a full two minutes and you're still all alone, realizing that he could take a while to relieve himself if he did more than take a leak. So you...

You stood there with awe, as you watched a small orange raccoon with black and green overalls step out of the portal. She was roughly around half your height, just standing in your living room, her eyes darting around the area in a curious and confused manner. However, you had a different emotion stored inside you. How do you respond?

But dad took it far worse then me, While I took care of my little bro like an older brother should, dad started drinking alcohol every night. Eventually dad got sick and after that I couldn't just stand by and do nothing!" You say clenching your fist as Coco carefully asks, "What did you do?"

However shortly there after, my father still died from cardiac arrest. A few years latter after my bro turned 16, I told him how our folks died.."

You trail off a bit as you take a sip of your drink while Coco asks, "What about your brother?" *sigh* "As you can probably guess, he didn't take it too well." You stare at your reflection in your drink for a moment before you continue, "After he found out he ran off too live in his own apartment and I've been living in the house you showed up in ever sense, living my life as the devil's judge and executioner. Knowing in the back of my mind that my bro blames me for mom and dad's deaths."

114233121112111121311.content:
As the two of you get out of your car a concerned expression crosses your face, noticing your brother sitting on the front steps of his apartment with his packed bag next to him, looking forlorn. "Ready to go?" You ask as you offer your brother a hand up. However your brother just nods as he lets out a long sigh. At that moment his eyes fall on Coco, "I take it you're bro's ''girlfriend'' as he put it that he mentioned over the phone?"

Your brother asks taking in Coco's appearance, looking her up and down which (if you didn't know any better) seemed to be making her uncomfortable. "Uh, yeah I'm Coco, it's nice to meat you..." She says trailing off as she offers her hand out awkwardly for a handshake. "Jackson, Jack for short. Likewise." Your brother says accepting her handshake, seeing all the tension in the air you attempt too lighten the mood with a joke.

"awkward.." you say in a sing song tone, as Jack sends you an irritated look. "Shut up." He says bluntly, making you and Coco bust out laughing. *sigh* "I missed you Jack." You say smiling, "Me too Bro.." Jack says trailing off as he turns toward Coco, his expression serious. "Has he told you about his ''power'' " He asks glaring daggers at you for a moment as he says power.

“That reminds me. I've been meaning to ask. Why do you harbor such resentment for your brother?” You notice Jack's eye twitch as she asks this fearing for her safety, you step in front of her to take all of his rage. “Because this DOUCHEBAG sold his soul for unjust reasons!!”

Jack screams poking you in the chest in an accusing manner, “What about it was UNJUST JACK? WHAT?!?” You scream back just as angry (if not angrier) at him. “Oh I don't know how about the fact that you gave up your life for a drunken asshole that was supposed too be OUR FATHER?!” You begin to shake in rage at that as you suddenly grab your brother by the neck.

“DON”T YOU EVER TALK ABOUT DAD LIKE THAT!!!” You shout as steam begins to rise off your body, *choke* “Why shouldn't I??” *sob sob* “Because, the reason why I made that deal in the first place was for YOUR SAKE!!” You say putting your brother back down as you continue to cry, “I-I don't understand...” Jack says extremely confused.

You take a moment to gain control of yourself before you explain. “You see, it began on the day you were born. Mom died holding you in her arms, Dad & I were both devastated. However dad took it far worse then I...” You trail off for a moment to let Jack process the details, before he nods wanting you to continue.

“While I took care of you, dad began to drink every night, to a point that he got sick and I knew if I didn't do something he would die! Seeing no other choice I prayed for help, then the devil showed up with an offer I couldn't refuse: My soul for dad's life. With that I made the deal to keep dad alive so you would still have a parent that could support both you and I..”

You say finishing the story as Jack looks down at his feet, “Do you regret that choice?” “Of coarse I do Jack! Had I known that dad was going to die form cardiac arrest a few years latter. I'd have never made the deal!” You say as you take your brother's hand into your own, “Now come on let's go home, it's cold out.”

You say taking everyone to your car, eventually after you get home you say “Sorry Coco, but now that Jack's here you'll have to...”

“I don't know. I... i cant remember” The creature said as she stubbled around. The realisation that she doesn't know where she is started to kick in. “Where am i!? Why don't i remember anything!?” She said, her voice having panic in it.

At this point your guard was down, you dropped the knife on the table next you her and slowly approached. “hey take it easy, panicking won't help anything”

“This isn't good, why can i remember anything! What has happened to- WOAHH!” She said tripping over as you react quickly jumping forward and catching her. Your eyes locking with hers as she smiled. “Thanks”

“Okay, lets just keep calm and think about this rationally okay. Do you want some tea or some coffee?”

“Yes please”

-Timeskip-

“So, I'm on E... Arf”

“Earth, thats how you pronounce it” You say as you get two mugs. you two have been talking for a while and have come to two decisions. One that she has complete Amnesia, not remembering her name, where she came from and even her interests. Something you think would be absolutely find terrifying. Secondly is that your gonna help her. As much as you can that is, your not really familiar with warp holes or anthro animal people so your gonna give her a home for now.

“Oh can i make it myself” She said as she you welcomed it.

“No it has not” She said with a huge smile as she moved closer to you. It was then you started to notice the height difference. She's a small petite girl compared to a normal human. Barely over 5 foot. Her biggest feature was her blonde hair which you found funny.

You make your mixture of coffee as you watch the Bandicoot start hers, dropping more Coco and more Coco then you believe. She seems satisfied when she filled half of the mug.

“Well since you don't know your name, i feel like Coco would be a good nickname” You say pointing to the mug as she laughed.

“Well I'm sorry, i just like it very strong. More then your small cowards amount”

“Coward! Ill have you know that this is the average human amount. We don't need to feel it with a cupful”

“Yeah yeah” She says as you and her finished making your Coffee’s. You two slowly move to the couch, talking along the way.

“Uh you sure your okay with me living with you... i mean I'm a total stranger”

Stranger doesn't even begin what you think of her. “I mean its not like you have anywhere else to go, and you know if the government finds you, you'll be experimented on. Right.”

“Oh, that doesn't sound too good” She said sitting down. You sit next to her as you take a sip of your mug.

“Plus your not a stranger anymore since I've given you a nickname. Coco” you tell her.

She looks deep in thought for a second before responding with ____________

You see the animatronic look around the room. You have played 5 Nights at Freddy's so you were a bit scared that she would attack. When she saw you, she started walking towards you. The noises coming from her feet were a bit loud. You backed up to a wall and closed your eyes.

"Are you alright?" Toy Chica asked in a robotic voice. You opened your eyes, she looked worried.

"Aren't you going to hurt me . . . And stuff me into a fazbear suit?" You asked. She shook her head.

"No, you do not look like the night guard, therefore, I have no reason to attack. Please tell me, where am I?" Still a bit nervous, you explain that she was no longer at the pizzeria, or possibly on her own planet anymore. She asked if she could stay here until the portal opened again.

"Sure, but please don't hurt me, okay?" You ask. She nods and shakes your hand in agreement. She then turns and walks around your home. You follow, unsure of what to do. "This is where I'll be during the day, since I'm unable to walk around during that time. Well, that was the situation at the pizzeria, maybe it's different for here. We will see soon, it is 5:58 AM." She said. You were amazed, there wasn't a clock in the basement which meant she could tell time without a clock or looking up at the sky. The two of you waited to see what would happen.

1143321222.content:
This Samus hails from the Captain N comics.

Her personality differs from the canon one as she is willing to listen to Mother Brain offer a very large bribe for Samus to leave her alone and for Samus to leave behind Captain N and Lana. While Samus did accept that one time, Samus did it on her own terms, keeping Captain N with her and secretly rescuing Lana.

She also has a strong desire for romance, going by her actions towards Captain N. but her longing for friends prevents her from playing dirty with Princess Lana for Captain N's heart.

This Samus still has a number of traits with the video game version, like a predilection for drinking and celebrating after a mission. Going by the cheers of the other bounty hunters in that comic, she is quite popular because of her skills and number of victories.

As a bounty hunter, she likes to keep trophies of her victories.

However, that did lead Lana to think that Samus had kidnapped the King because Samus had a trophy that was to be rewarded to whoever kidnapped the king. A fight broke out between them, as Samus couldn't recall if she did or not. That was due to Kraid and Ridley capturing Samus and trying to hypnotize her to kidnap the king. They eventually sorted it out, but Samus worries she kidnapped the king.

She didn't, but the only one that knows is the sentient trophy.

Because this Samus is friends with Captain N and Princess Lana, she knows about other worlds and even the real world.

Chances are she'd be both impressed and unimpressed by 2017's tech. unimpressed with the graphic power of Computers, TV, and smartphones, but impressed with how small they can get and the multiple functions of them. Probably because she's from what the 80's thought the future might be.

You nodded.

Then you felt a hand firmly grab your ass. Your eyes immediately widened a blush spreading across Shantae's face. It only deepened as you heard a girl's voice whisper in your ear.

"Come on, you're too pretty to be straight." you turned to face her. Her lips mere inches from yours. You were about to tell her to leave you alone. But then she planted both ands on the sides of your cheeks, and immediately closed the gap between you two.

She eventually released you, a trai of drool connecting your mouths. One of her hands reaching down your shirt.

"Please," you begged, "Just leave me alone. The girl opened her mouth, but stopped, smirking.

"Fine, I should have known what a slut you were when I saw your hair." you winced, "I bet the curtains match the drapes as well." she said, walking back to her table, just as Shantae returned.
