114332222212231211.content:
As you reached the living room of your home you expected to find a monster or creature of some kind, however much to your shock your gaze fell upon but a small child. (How'd this kid get in here?) You thought to yourself as you began to take note of the child's appearance & attire. The child seemed to be wearing a blue sweater with a pink stripe in the middle, a pair of shorts and shoes and socks respectively. "She seems to be knocked out..."

You said to yourself as you carefully pick the kid up off the floor, within seconds the kid responds mumbling to herself as she noticed where she was. "Wha? Who are yo-!" She tried to ask before cutting herself off flinching as she began to clasp her side in pain! "Hey! hey kid, are you hurt?!"

You asked before getting your answer as you notice what seemed to be blood coming from where the child was clenching, "Oh God! Don't worry kid, I know what to do. I'll get you patched up!!" You said before running to your bedroom and placing the kid on your bed as carefully as you can without hurting her, making sure to grab the first-aid kit out of the hall closet beforehand as well.

"Okay, let's see how bad this is.." You trailed off as you pulled the sweater over the child's head noticing that she was wearing a t-shirt underneath it which was blotched with blood like her sweater but to a much higher degree. You blushed a bit as you processed this muttering "*groan* I wish I didn't have to do this but.." a little embarrassed, before you pull the shirt over her head much like her sweater moments before leaving her naked from the waist up.

Quickly taking action you quickly warn her "This may sting a bit." before attempting to stop the bleeding, in an instant the girl began to cry a bit from the pain. Seeing this you attempt to comfort her, your eyes not ounce leaving your current task."Don't worry kid. You're going to be just fine, I promise."

Seemingly being encouraged by your kind words she manages to give you a shaky nod of thanks.

After a few more minutes you finish your work, "*Sigh* Well I've stopped the bleeding and sealed your wound, right now you need to rest and be careful so you can recover." You said mostly speaking to yourself not realizing your little guest had been listening, You were just about out the door when she suddenly spoke startling you. "Hey mister? I wanted to thank you for taking care of me like this." You just shrugged saying " 's no big deal kid I was just doing what was right.."

At that moment she realized "Oh I never told you my name did I? I'm Frisk. What's your name sir?" You chuckled at her politeness before responding "I'm Jack, it's nice to meet you Frisk. Now then, go ahead and rest, I'll be sleeping in the guest bedroom tonight across the hall if you need me sleep well." Frisk smiled as you began to head for the door, the last thing you heard her say was "Good night." before she fell asleep instantly.

You smiled at that on the other side of the door (Maybe having her around will be a good thing. Maybe she'll think of me as a dad someday..) With that final thought you went to bed.
114332222212231211.title: Frisk: The Pacifist Child

choices: The next morning you check on Frisk and she's still sound asleep.
The next morning you check on Frisk and she's not in her room.
1143322222122312112.content:
You awake with a start--a terrified scream chills your bones. Then you remember your injured visitor in the room across the hall. You jump up to check on her.

"Frisk! What's wrong? It's me, Jack! Are you okay?" You begin calling out before even leaving your room, but as you enter hers, you see her sitting up in bed in tears. You realize she probably had a nightmare. You relax a little, grateful that it's nothing more.

You sit on the edge of her bed and put a protective arm around her.

"Frisk, it's okay. It's just a nightmare. I'm here. You're safe."

"No! It wasn't a nightmare!"

"It's okay, sweetie. You're awake now."

"But it couldn't have been a nightmare. It was so real!" She pulls up her shirt and you see that her wound has started bleeding again.

"Let me take care of that. Would you like something to drink?" You get up to retrieve your first aid kit for the second time in only a few hours. She doesn't answer, only continuing to sob softly.

When you return, you still see fear in Frisk's eyes. "How about I tell you a story while I work on this? I know a story about a beautiful and brave princess. Her name is very similar to yours. Her name is Brisk."

You proceed to create an elaborate story about a princess who, in many ways, resembles Frisk. She is wounded, she has nightmares, but she's very brave and in the end she triumphs over her troubles. You hope Frisk is able to take comfort in this story you weave. She seems calmer when you are done. Her breathing is slower and softer and she's shut her eyes again. You get up quietly.

"I'll be in the next room if you need me, Frisk. Good night." You pause at the door, a smile on your face. You feel so warm toward this helpless little child you just met a few hours before. You know you'd make a good father one day. You turn and head back to your bed.
1143322222122312112.title: Frisk suddenly woke in the middle of the night ...

choices: If she wanted to play a game?
If she wanted to go to the park with you?
(You wanted to ask her something else.)
11433222221223121121.content:
You woke up early the next morning to get a quick shower, after which you got changed prepared to take on the day. You carefully approached the door to Frisk's room and opened it quietly, not wanting to startle her. You can't help but smile as you notice your friend attempting to snuggle deeper into the covers mumbling into the pillow as she did, you leaned down and whispered in her ear. "Frisk, sweetie it's time to wake up.." however all that did was get more mumbling out of her.

You then began to scratch at your chin trying to think of a way to wake her, until an idea struck! You smiled to yourself as you left the room leaving the door open on purpose as you head into the kitchen, if you couldn't get her up by talking to her you'll just use the next best thing, food. As you got started the smell of cooking food filled the air, quickly traveling throughout the house. Within moments you could hear Frisk mumbling again as she came out of her room rallying on her nose to lead her too the food instead of her eyes.

You couldn't help but chuckle at her, "Morning sleepyhead." you said receiving a sleepy "Good morning." from her in return as she rubbed her eyes. You just finished up the cooking and were going about fixing a plate of food for Frisk & yourself before going over and grabbing two glasses out of a cabinet. "What do you want to drink?" Frisk thought it over before asking "Do you have any milk?" "Chocolate or regular?" You asked as you went to grab the milk and chocolate syrup out of the fridge.

You then turned to face her, before having to clamp a hand over your mouth at what you just saw. Frisk noticed this and asked "What's so funny Jack?" You stifled a laugh muttering "Uh, you might want to look in a mirror." She did so, and suddenly burst out laughing at the state her hair was in. She had such a bad case of bedhead that her hair looked like Marge Simpson or the bride of Frankenstein! "*giggle* I think I better go fix this.."

She said as you nodded wiping a tear out of your eye, after a second you quickly said "Wait! what kind of milk do you want!?" She quickly said "Chocolate please!" not looking back as she headed into the bathroom to fix her hair. You nodded and went about fixing a glass of it for her & yourself, after a few minutes Frisk came back, taking a seat at the kitchen table. "Much better." You said making Frisk nod in agreement.

The rest of the breakfast was uneventful till you were cleaning up the dishes in the sink with Frisk helping you, "You didn't have to help me you know." You said smiling down at her as she shook her head, "I don't mind helping at all." After you finished you and Frisk were watching tv until you asked "Hey Frisk, can I ask you something?" She nodded saying "Sure what is it Jack?" You thought it over before deciding to ask...

11433222221223222111.content:
You gasp in shock momentarily, as you notice the iconic orange haired, inkling girl standing in your living room, looking around curiously. Quickly taking action, you introduce yourself. "Uh, hello there little girl. I'm *Your Name* Would you like to introduce yourself?" You ask holding out your hand for a handshake, which the inkling eyes curiously and cautiously before reaching for her weapon, about to use it on you! Seeing this you put your hands out in a defensive manner

"Whoa, Whoa!! Easy there kid! I'm not an enemy, I mean you no harm!" You say as the inkling girl realizes your telling the truth, lowering her blaster and guard as she reaches out to return the handshake you offered earlier. "Nice to meet you mister, my name's Jamie! I'm sorry about not trusting you earlier, I tend to have a hard time trusting people, be they inklings or otherwise. *Giggle*" The inkling girl now known as Jamie says giggling a bit in English, shocking you.

Jamie takes notice of your reaction and giggles ounce more, "Sorry again. I should have warned you beforehand." However, you quickly recover and shrug saying "Don't worry about it.." You say trailing off as you head into the kitchen to get a drink. "Anything you need Jamie?" You ask as you notice your inkling friend thinking about something, "Actually yeah! I could go for.."

(Choice A: Some food! Jamie says as her stomach growls in hunger.)
(Choice B: A bath! Jamie says as you now notice she's covered in what seems to be ink.)
11433222221223222111.title: Squids On Land?

choices: To get his day started, intrigued.
1143322222122322221.content:
Jake sat inside his home, still a little bit worn out from doing some running earlier in the day. He was closing his bay window curtains as dusk was coming near, continuing to lock his two doors for tonight. Continuing he'd cook just an omelet & tear into it, adding some salt to finish. Walking into his living room he decided to watch a movie, not really having anything else to do but not knowing what movie to choose.
So opening up the entertainment centers bottom cabinets he was offput seeing a blank brown CD-Case fall out, plopping on the birch hardwood. 'Do not open! Danger disc!' A crudely drawn old sticky note was on it, case wrapped by scotch tape. For a few seconds he contemplated wether or not to open it.. a bit freaked about how it just appeared. Like a creepypasta.

He decides to just do it to get over curiosity, walking to the kitchen to get scissors. Snipping it open he found there to be a Wii-Fit game disc, nothing more in it but white scratches on the casing. He hasn't touched a Wii since he was a kid, a bit nostalgic with seeing it. As he grabbed the disc's side to pull it out he got cut- he bled a little, the sharpness of the disc astounding & worrying him. So he closed the case & would set it on his couchstand once back in the living room, going to bring it up to Bestbuy or something tomorrow to check legitimacy. Sucking the blood off his wound he'd head to his room now, the whole disc-finding thing discouraging staying up later, for some reason..
Closing his door & going on to drop into his underwear Jake was a tad bit annoyed with the pain in his index finger, laying down & just ignoring it. So he gradually went to sleep.


..."Are you awake yet?" Groggy, Jake heard a womens voice. "Should we stretch?" He got a rush of fear as he woke up to see her- the Wii Fit trainer, eyes a cold grey, skin white, grey hair groomed perfectly & slick, just infront of his door. She wore her gaming attire- a low, tight croptop & tight grey pants.. Jake didn't know how to react, sitting up slowly. "You.. Lost? I don't know you, why are you here?"
She had a constant grin on her face, arms behind her back, he a bit scared. "Im your personal trainer. You opened my case." He felt his stomach flutter like it was trying to tell him something, or he was just hungry. Seeing how she seems subservient- but heavily suspicious & out of place, he sat his legs off the bed, how a case pertaining to her release puzzling. "I don't.. Why were you.. In a case?" The Wii womans flat-nippled breasts seemed to poke through her top but he ignored it, more concerned with her. "Faulty programming. Im a defunct model." He questioned what 'defunct' was if 'she' was able to manifest physically, at this point he was rolling with it, he had.. Now has weird.. fascinations with game characters again, what what the chances this happens, he thought? Despite her being very vauge he judged..

You decide sit in the recliner next to the couch and read something while you wait, as you read you can't help but notice this person's appearance you note that he seems to be covered in black and white fur as well as their long ears and outfit noting his blue shirt and pants as well as the blue cap with pac-man on it, and lastly their red shoes. 12.title: An anime/cartoon character

choices: You wake up to the sight of Tigress looking at you
You wake up to the sound of loud crashing
122.content:
As you got to the portal, fist comes out and punches you into the wall followed by the sound of a tiger roaring as an anthropomorphic tigress comes out. Before you could respond, she grabbed you by the throat and pins you to the wall. You get a close look at the feline to see it was Tigress from Kung Fu Panda, glaring darkly at you. 'Oh crap, I'm dead!' You thought as she tighten's her grip.

"Alright! Who are you and what are you?! And where am I?!" She pulled back her claw as the sound of her claws coming out enters your ears.

"I'm Jackson! And I'm a human, and this is my house and please don't kill me Tigress!" You choked out as she loosen's her grip on your throat, only to smash you into your wall.

"How do you know my name?" She asked growling.

"If you could release your grip on my neck!?" You whimper out as she drops you on the ground, you take in deep breaths from the sudden assault on your chest. You walk over to the TV and pick up a DVD from the stacks of it. "Okay, promise not to freak out."

"No promises." She stated as seriously as she could.

"At least, promise not to choke me when I show you." You pleaded, as she gives a soft nod. You show her the DVD of Kung Fu Panda Legends Of Awesomeness Vol.1.

"What is this?" She snatches it from your hand.

"It's Kung Fu Panda your world." She looks to you as you say her world. Soon you started to explain all of the movies to her, as her expression changes from anger to shock a bit.

"So you're saying my world is a car-toon in this world?" Tigress questioned as you give her a nod. "How do I get back to my world?"

"I don't know but you're welcomed to stay, I need to rest after being slammed into a wall. Twice." You joke, as she gives you an apologetic look.

"I'm sorry about earlier." She looks away, only for you to put a hand on her shoulder.

"I was going to bed anyway." You walk off and into your bedroom, and plop onto your bed not bothering to change out of your street clothes.
122.title: Tigress from Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness

choices: Skip to later with you giving her a tour
1221.content:
You woke up to the site of Tigress looking at you through your door. She does knock before entering. "You may enter," you tell her. Tigress asks, "Are you feeling better?" "Yes, a good night's rest helped," you tell her. It then occurs to you that maybe she is getting hungry, “If you want, I can fix breakfast for both of us, but I do think I should get cleaned up first”. You go to the laundry room and get some cloths to change into, then go into the bathroom and take a shower, then dry off and change your cloths as you get step out of the shower.

As you head to the kitchen, Tigress was a bit curious about the food you were fixing. As it cooked, you and Tigress did have a bit of a conversation. "So how was the night for you?" you asked. "I actually enjoyed that bed. It was comfortable," Tigress said. "I take it you found the guest room fine on your own,” you say. “Yes, what was it? I've never experienced anything like that?” She says. "As I said last night, you're welcome to stay. If you want, I can give you a tour of the place later. Being in a strange place, I can imagine you might want to know more about some of the stuff here," you offered.

She then explains, “Before I arrived here, Po went missing. I was tasked with finding him. When I found him, he was locked up. I managed to free him, but I think I passed out. Next thing I know I ended up here,” Tigress explained.
1221.title: You wake up to the sight of Tigress looking at you

choices: You and Tigress enjoy the movie together.
Someone else that Tigress knows up via another portal.
12211.content:
You decide to fix some cinnamon rolls, homemade french toast, and bacon. You also pour a couple cups of orange juice for the two of you. Tigress watches as you pour maple syrup on the french toast. You could tell Tigress had never used a fork before as she picks hers up. You show her how to use it. After she takes her first bite, Tigress swallows it and then asks, "Do you have a girlfriend?"

"No, why?" you asked.

"Since I might be stuck here, you're the first person I met here, and you're letting me stay with you, I was thinking maybe I should be your girlfriend," Tigress suggested before taking a bite of a cinnamon roll.

"I'm willing to be your boyfriend, but let's try to put last night behind us and try to avoid a repeat of it," you say.

"Are you still upset about that?" Tigress asked before taking a bite of the bacon. You could tell she was interested in trying everything.

"I'm not upset. Truth is I think I can understand it. You're in a strange land and decided to use your skills to defend yourself. I just don't want to experience that again," you explain as she takes a drink of the orange juice.

"Don't worry, I won't," Tigress says.

A few minutes later, you finish eating. Tigress thanks you and then kisses you. "Since you weren't able to give me a proper tour last night, maybe you could give me one now." She suggests.

You take her around the house and show her various objects and how they're used such as a phone, the bathroom and shower, your computer, and TV. Of course, you get to thinking about how she reacted to Po when she believed he was the Midnight Stranger, and realize that maybe she might enjoy a super hero movie.
You look through your DVD and Blue-ray collection. While you did have a few of them, you picked out Spider-Man, Captain America, Iron Man, and Guardians of the Galaxy.

"So what are these about?" Tigress asks.

"These stories are works of fiction. Spider-man is about a boy who was is about to be an adult getting powers because of an accident. He then uses them to fight crime. Captain America is about a young man who volunteers for an experiment during a time of crisis for the sake of his country. Iron Man is about a rich guy getting a wake up call when he sees something he created used for evil and almost gets killed. He ends up making a powerful suit of armor that keeps him alive and uses it to try to fix his mistake. Guardians of the Galaxy is about a group of intergalactic outlaws who become heroes," you explained.

"Hmm... these do sound like interesting stories. I wouldn't mind watching them all," she says.

"We might not have time to today, but we could watch them later," you suggested.

"Well, I guess we could start with Iron Man," Tigress says.

You take the movie out of the case, turn on the both Blue-Ray player and TV, open the Blue-ray player, insert the disc into the drive, and then close it.
12211.title: Breakfast with Tigress

As you walk closely to the portal, suddenly you accidentally get tackled by A pale yellow dog girl with three black eyes lined by dark indigo markings. She wears an orange kimono with red and yellow accenting, along with a blue necklace. She has a tiny, pale orange button nose. You look shocked by this, and as you look at her she begins to speak.

"You are wondering what I am, and what is this portal doing here?" She questioned, as you look at her confusingly. "You are now wondering if I can read your mind. And I can. My name is Espy, and I am a Yo-Kai." You are about to ask what the heck is a Yo-Kai, only for her to answer it. "A Yo-Kai is a spirit that inspirits anyone it meets."

"Can I at least speak? Also am I going mad because, a floating Dog woman with three eyes, is not something you see everyday." You snap at her annoyed by the fact she was reading your every thought.

"You are not insane. But you're living arrangements, are very spacious for someone living alone." Espy floated around doing a few backflips. "And no, I can not leave because the portal just." You look behind you to see the portal just closed shut.

"Well, get comfortable than. Help yourself to whatever's in the fridge." You replied about to show her, only to watch as she just floats into the kitchen with ease. You then remember she read your mind so, you then go to your bedroom and went to sleep.

The Next Morning~

"All right. I'm all ears darlin'. How may I be of service?" I fixed her with the coldest stare I could muster and folded my arms over the wet t-shirt trying to suppress the cold shivers.

"I'm sorry I had to resort to this... but I badly need your help." Korra hung her head in shame and stroked the bridge of her nose trying to gather her thoughts together.

You smile a bit as you notice the girl is also missing her two front teeth, which in your opinion makes her look even cuter. You notice the girl is trying to figure out where she is as she's looking around curiously, you decide to get her attention.

As you clear your throat you notice the girl jump a bit as she turns to look at you with a startled look on her face, you chose your next move carefully not wanting to scare the girl any more then necessary if at all. You decide to introduce yourself getting down onto one knee as to show the young girl you mean her no harm, "Hi there little girl. I'm sure you're wondering who I am and where you are right?" The girl nods at this as you continue.

"Well, I'm (your name here) and you're in my house. Now if you don't mind me asking could you tell me your name?" The girl quickly nods saying "I'm Lana Loud! Future plumber and mechanic extraordinaire of the Loud family! Nice to meet you mister!" The girl now known as Lana says excitedly as she holds her hand out for a handshake, which you return. "Now Lana I've got a few question's I want to ask you but I can save them for later. For now there's one thing I want to know." "What's that?" Lana asks curiously..
1253323221222222221.title: Meeting the 6-year old handy woman

choices: She lets you give her a bath
She wants to take one herself
12533232212222222211.content:
"Yes, quite a bit actually." She says. You take her to the kitchen. "Do you have any dog food?" She asks. You're quite surprised.

"Actually, yes. I was going to get a dog, so I bought some cans, but then I never did go get one." You said. You pulled out a can of dog food. "You sure you want to eat this?" She nods. You're still confused, but you open the can and put it on a plate. She eats all of it. Not only can you believe she finds it edible, but how much she eats is also unexpected. You got her another can, you only had one more after this. This time, however, she didn't eat it. Instead she threw some at you, hitting you in a head.

"Food fight!" She yelled, and started to throw more. You weren't mad, instead, you were excited. You had never been in a food fight before.

"Alright, let's do it!" You yelled and started to grab the milk. You launched some milk at her, making her dodge. The two of you continue to throw food at each other, not caring what happened. It finally ended when you had no more food. Both of you were very messy.

"Haha, that was fun! You sure are good!" She said, and laughed. You giggled a bit too.

"Yeah, but I think we need to clean up. Here, let me give you a bath." You say, wiping some food off of you.
12533232212222222211.title: Immaturity is contagious

125332322122222222111.content:
She follows you to the bathroom upstairs. You start running warm water in the tub. As you do this, you ask if you can take her clothes off. She told you yes but only if you don't laugh. You nodded and took everything off of her. When you reached for her hat, she grabbed it and made sure you didn't take it off.

"No, this is my hat! I'm not taking it off." She said. You tried to argue, but eventually gave up. The tub was soon full of water. You put her in and got the soap. When you turned around to grab it, she splashed some water on you,

"Hey!" You said, but she just laughed. You put soap on a brush and started to clean her. She kept splashing and got your clothes all wet. You finished the soap and rinsed her off. She laughed and spit water on you like a fountain. "Alright, enough games. Time for you to get dry." You said and went to grab her. She refused to move though.

"I can finish up, why don't you go get changed, after all, you're messier than I am." She giggled, you looked at yourself. You were still dirty and now your clothes were soaked. You went into your bedroom and took a shower in your own bathroom. Once you got done, you changed into some nice clothes. Just as you left your bedroom, you heard a loud noise from downstairs. You quickly went to go check it when Lana jumped on you from behind. "Yay! I want a ride!" She said. You smiled and lifted her up. As you did, you saw that the loud noise was from a frying pan that she found. You gave her a ride through the house, even though your back started to hurt. You eventually look up at Lana to see
125332322122222222111.title: Bath time little one

choices: She jumped on you from behind
125332322122222222112.content:
"I can take care of it, just show me where the bathroom is." She said. You nodded and led her to the one on the main floor. You gave her some towels and temporary clothes to wear afterwards. You told her to call you if she needs anything. You left and went to your computer.

"I wonder if I can learn anything about her." You said quietly to yourself. You looked up the name "Lana Loud". You saw many different things, but the one that caught your eye was about the show called "The Loud House", when you opened it up, you saw a picture of the exact same girl that was in your bathroom at the moment. You were able to find what she liked and didn't like. One thing you found was she like chicken noodle soup. You knew you had some, so you decided to give it to her for dinner tonight. Hopefully, she didn't start another food fight.

You shut the computer off, and called your friend. You knew that they love cartoons, so there would be a good chance that they knew about "Loud House." When you asked them about it, they got really excited, and started spitting out many facts. You asked for advice about Lana.

"Well even though she is a kid, she can be very responsible. However, make sure you don't call her cute, she really doesn't like that." They said.

"Ok, got it, thanks." You replied. You went to check on Lana, she might be done by now. However, when you knocked on the door, it started to creak open. You looked in to see she was gone. You didn't panic, instead, you looked around the house until you found her on your bed. She had fallen asleep, still wearing her hat. It looked pretty wet, but you didn't think about it. You left her alone and went downstairs to turn the TV on. After a couple of hours, you were about to go check on her when . . .

12533232221.content:
You were shocked as you see someone came out of the portal and it was Misaki Tokura from the Cardfight! Vanguard anime series. You have always been a card fighter when you first start watching the show. Now, the lavender haired fighter from team Q4 is standing in your living room right now. Misaki feels dizzy when she came out and you went to see if she's alright.

"Oh. My aching head." Misaki complained as she rubs her head.

"Are you okay, Misaki?" You wondered as you keep her up while the portal closes.

Misaki then looks at you and was surprised that she sees you in front of her. She was also surprised that you even know her name.

"Yeah. I'll be fine. I just need to rest." Misaki said.

You set her on the couch and go to get her some food. Misaki ate the food and she was pleased that you helped her.

"Thank you so much, uhh?" Misaki asked to get your name.

"It's Joseph." You introduced.

"Thank you, Joseph. So, how do you know my name?" Misaki wondered.

"Damn it! I should've done that. Well, I'll show you. Be right back." You said as you got up and went to your room.

You come back and you showed her a copy of a Vanguard DVD that shocked her.

"Wha-What is this?" Misaki asked.

You go and tell Misaki that she's a fictional character created by Japan as well as the cards used to play here. Misaki was in disbelief at what she just heard from you. But, she was then glad that you told her that she's your favorite female character. You even told her about Q4, tournaments, and saving the world. It felt nice to her to know that.

"I guess that it doesn't seem so bad. Which reminds me, where exactly am I?" Misaki wondered.

"You're in Orlando, FL in my house. It's nice and hot around here." You explained.

"I can see that. Say, you said that you're a card fighter too, right?" Misaki wondered.

"Yes I am." You answered.

"Well, how about a cardfight? You and me?" Misaki suggested.

"Sure. Let me just grab my deck." You said.

You go to grab your deck and came back with two play mats. You give her a natural and you two shuffle your decks. Once that's done, you two rolled a die to see who gets to you first. Misaki won so she gets first move. You two got your five cards in hand and got the game started.

"Now stand up, Vangaurd!" You and Misaki said at the same time.

You looked and see that's she's using her Oracle Think Tank deck and Misaki sees that you're using the
12533232221.title: Stand up Vanguard!

125332322211.content:
"Imperial Shrine Guard, Hahiki!" Misaki declared.

"Knight of Early Dawn, Coel!" You declared.

"Gold Paladins." Misaki thought as she looks at the card on the mat.

Misaki draws her card to begin her turn.

"I ride Imperial Shrine Guard, Sumiyoshi! Hahiki moves back with skill. You're turn." Misaki said.

You begin your turn as you draw your first card.

"I ride Knight of Morning Sun, Horsa! Coel moves back with skill and he'll boost Horse as he attacks your Vanguard!" You said as you begin your attack.

"I don't guard." Misaki declared.

"Drive trigger check." You said as you got no trigger on the check.

"Damage trigger check." Misaki said as she got no trigger too.

You: 0 damage

Misaki: 1 damage

Misaki draws her card to begin her move.

"I ride Imperial Shrine Guard, Akari! Attack!" Misaki said as she attacks the Vanguard.

"No guard." You said.

"Drive trigger check." Misaki said as she got no trigger.

"Damage trigger check." You said as you got no trigger on the damage check.

You: 1 damage

Misaki: 1 damage

"Stand and draw." You said as you turned your cards and draw one from your deck.

"I ride Knight of the Remaining Sun, Henrinus! Attack!" You said as you attack now.

"No guard." Misaki said.

"Drive trigger check." You said as you picked up a trigger card.

"Heal trigger. Power to the Vanguard and I recover one damage." You said as you recover your damage.

"Damage check." Misaki said and got no trigger.

You: 0 damage

Misaki: 2 damage

"Doing good, Joseph. I'll admit. But, you know what? I'm not someone to be taken as a pushover! Stand and Draw!" Misaki declared as she draws her card.

"Great noble deity, show my future predictions to my rival as they were a reality! I ride Supreme Heavenly Battle Deity, Susanoo!" Misaki declared.

"Susanoo, Huh? Things are about to get even hotter here." You thought.

"Hope you're ready, Joseph." Misaki said.
125332322211.title: Gurguit vs Susanoo part 1

1253323222111.content:
The card fight was doing well so far. You're winning ahead by 2 damage against Misaki with your Gold Paladin deck. However, she's got Supreme Heavenly Battle Deity, Susanoo out as her vanguard. You are prepared to take this sort of beat down when she attacks.

"I call Silent Tom and Weather Girl, Milk to rear guard. Susanoo will go first on the vanguard." Misaki declared as her vanguard attacks yours.

"I'm not gonna guard that one." You said.

"Twin Drive Check." Misaki said as she got no trigger on the first check. But, did got one on the second.

"Critical Trigger. I give the power to Silent Tom and the critical to Susanoo." Misaki said.

You took the 2 damage and you're tied with her now.

"Silent Tom will attack with the boost from Milk. Tom's skill. When attacking, you won't be using a Grade 0 from your hand to guard." Misaki said.

"Then I won't." You said.

You took the damage and Misaki took the lead.

You: 3 damage

Misaki: 2 damage.

"Not bad. I can see how you're a National champion. However, I've got this. Warrior of the Sun, bring unity with your flames of passion. I ride Sunrise Ray Knight, Gurguit. Generation Stride! Golden Dragon, Scourge Point Dragon! Gurguit's Stride Skill! I look at the top 4 cards from my deck and Superior Call one unit amongst them. Superior Call, Henrinus! And I give him 2000 power. Scourge Point Dragon's Skill! When I call a unit from the deck, I give him and the unit is called an additional 5000 power. Henrinus's Skill! When I called him to rear guard, I Counter Blast and Soul Blast and I look at the top three cards of my deck and select one unit to Superior Call. I choose Scared Face Lion! The other two cards go to the bottom of the deck and since Gurguit is my vanguard, Henrinus gives himself and the unit i called with his skill and additional 3000 power. My Dragon's skill is on again, giving him and my lion 5000 power. Now, I activated Coel's Unite! I put him in the soul and take a look at the top 3 cards of my deck and Superior Call one unit. Superior Call, Henrinus! Add 2000 power while I shuffle my deck. Scourge Point Dragon's Skill! 5000 power to both units! Henrinus's skill! I Superior Call Sunshine Knight, Jeffery! Add 3000 power to Henrinus and Jeffery! Scourge Point Dragon's skill again! 5000 power to both! Then I call Player of the Holy Pipe, Gerrie! With his Unite, I give him 3000 power and a new skill!" You finished your skills.

Misaki was in shock to see you power up not only your vanguard, but your rear guards to a new level. Taking on this sort of deck is gonna be harder than she thought.

"My first Henrinus will attack Silent Tom with a boost from Scared Face Lion!" You said.

"No gaurd!" Misaki said as Silent Tom is now destroyed.

"Gerrie will boost Scourge Point Dragon as he attack Susanoo! Using Scared Face Lion's skill! Send to the soul, draw a card and give my vanguard 5000 power!" You said.

"By discarding a card from my hand, Arbitrator, Ame-no-Sagiri will nullify your attack!" Misaki said as your attack is now blocked.

"Okay then. Triple Drive!" You declared as the first you got a trigger.

"Critical Trigger! All effects to my stand up Henrinus!" You said.

Your second check gives you nothing and you got a trigger on the third.

"Heal trigger! Power to Henrinus and I recover one damage! Now, Gerrie's additional skill! After the battle in which he attacks or he boosts another unit for an attack, I sent him to the soul and I Counter Charge. Now, Jeffrey will boost my second Henrinus on your vanguard!" You said.

"Not gonna guard!" Misaki said as she took the 2 damage.

"Jeffrey's Unite! After he boosted another unit for an attack, I sent him to the soul and I draw one card from my deck. That's my turn." You said.

You: 2 damage

Misaki: 4 damage

Misaki finds herself in a big situation with that big onslaught you just did. She need to figure something out and quick.

"I stand and draw. Generation Stride! Soaring Auspicious Beast, Kirin! Susanoo's Stride Sill! I look at the top two cards of my deck and picked one to add to my hand while the other goes to the bottom of the deck. I activate Hahiki's Oracle. Send her to the soul and look at the top two cards of my deck and choose one to add to my hand while the other goes to the bottom of my deck. I call Lozenge Magus and Rigid Crane. Crane's Skill! Add 2000 power and a new skill! Then I call Psychic Bird! It's Skill! I send him to the soul and I draw. Then I call Imperial Shrine Guard, Akagi. With Akagi's Skill, I look at the top two cards of my deck and choose on to add to my hand while the other goes to the bottom of my deck and give her an additional 2000 power. Then I call Weather Girl, Milk and Divine Sword, Kusanagi. With a boost from Kusanagi, Akagi attacks the Henrinus on the left." Misaki declared.

"I guard!" You said to stop the attack.

"With a boost from Milk, Kirin Attacks! Using Kusanagi's Skill! I send her to the soul and I draw one card then give my vanguard an additional 5000 power. Milk's Skill! Since she's boosting my vanguard while I have four or more cards in my hand, give it 4000 extra power!" Misaki declared.

"No guard." You said.

"Triple Drive!" Misaki said as she goes throw her checks.

"Double Critical Trigger! Giving power to Crane and I give Kirin the 2 critical!" Misaki said.

You took the damage and you got a trigger on it and give the power to your vanguard.

"Using Kirin's Skill, I look at the top two cards of my deck and put one in my hand and the other in the bottom of the deck. Time to finish this! With support from Magus, Rigid Crane will attack your vanguard! With Magus skill, I give the boosted unit 3000 power!" Misaki said.

"Generation Guard! Sacred Heavenly Prayer Master, Reid! With her skill, since I have 2 or more rear guards, I give her an additional 5000 power to her shield!" You said.

"I end my turn! Using Lozenge Magus's Skill to shuffle her back to the deck." Misaki said as she shuffles her deck.

"I'm impressed of how you're doing, Misaki. Really, I am. Still, Final Turn!" You declared.

Misaki is getting nervous if what you just said is true.

"Generation Stride! Sunrise Ray Radiant Sword, Gurguit! Using Stride Skill, look at the top four cards of my deck and Superior Call one unit. I Superior Call Knight of Morning Knight, Horsa! Add 2000 power! Then I call Sunshine Knight, Jeffrey and Flame of Victory. Using Horsa's Unite! Whenever I call a unit to rear guard, I can give 2000 power to him and the unit that's in the same column as him. Since I call two units, that's 4000 power to him and Henrinus. Using Flame of Victory's Skill, I send him to the soul and give 3000 power to the unit of my choice. I give it to the Henrinus that has Jeffrey as his boosted unit. Then, I call Gerrie. Using Horsa's Unite again to give 2000 power to him and Henrinus. Gerrie's Unite! Add 3000 power and a new skill. Here's the best part. Sunrise Ray Radiant Sword, Gurguit's Unite! Counter Blast one and Soul Blast two! For every rear guard that I have, he gains 5000 power. So that's 25000 power to Gurguit! That's not all! He gives his allies 5000 power for themselves. Guess what? I can use his Generation Break as many times as I want. So, I'll do it again." You said.

Misaki was both surprised and impressed of how your playing. This is the kind of skills that's something of a legend. She looks at you and she might think that this is over.

"Here we go! Boosted by Jeffrey, my first Henrinus attacks the vanguard!" You declared.

"Generation Guard! Sunrise-on-high Godhawk, Ichibyoshi! With its skill, since I have three or more cards in my hand, I add 5000 power to the shield and I guard with a Grade 0!" Misaki said.

"Then, I'll use Jeffrey's Unite! I send him to the soul and I draw. Now, with a boost from Gerrie, Gurguit attacks the vanguard!" You said.

"I nullify your attack!" Misaki said as your attack is stopped.

The first is nothing, but, you got one on the second.

"Heal Trigger! Power to Henrinus and I recover one!" You said.

Now for the third check.

"Critical Trigger! All effects to Henrinus!" You said.

Misaki looks at you and she was astonished by your course of the game. She forms a smile that you were having a good time.

"Here we go, Henrinus! Attack!" You declared.

The attack went through and the damage is now 6, giving you the victory.

"That was fun. Don't you think, Misaki?" You asked.

You then hear her clapping at you as she was impressed by your skills.

"That was amazing! You really gave everything you had." Misaki said with a smile.

"Thank you. You did better, though." You said with a smile.

Misaki smiled at you when you said that.

"So, what should we do now?" Misaki said.

12533232222111.content:
You have to repeatedly rub your eyes as the figure who came out of that swirling vortex was no other than the self-claimed Princess of the Moon herself-Sailor Moon from the Japanese anime show of the same name: (https://www.google.com/imgres?imgurl=htt...)

At first you're a bit timid and actually scared to approach her as she's somehow still conscious after falling through that portal right into your living room and as one might expect she's looking around bewildered.

"What sort of place is this? This isn't my room! Nor does it look like any part of Tokyo." She's muttering to herself as you approaching her from the back notice she's wearing her usual Sailor Moon superhero get-up-the original one not the updated version.

"Er excuse me Miss but..." You say as she quickly spun around looking startled but instead of attacking you,she merely blinked.

"Huh? Who are you and where am I?" Serena-her real Earth name asks.

"Yeah about that you're actually in my living room or should I say my parents' living room! My name is..." You try to introduce yourself but she interrupts.

"Wait your living room? Hold it y-you're not from Tokyo...you're a American aren't you?" She blurted out.

"Well yes I am. Anyway my name is...." But she interrupted again looking around your folks' living room with awe.

"Ohh I heard so much about the United States from all my friends but never actually got to go there. Ohh sorry I should have let you introduce yourself!" She apologized quickly.

"Er yeah no worries about that. My name is Willy and this must be a bit confusing for you but you haven't been kidnapped or anything like that."

"I know I haven't been kidnapped because otherwise you would have gagged me or tied me up besides no kidnapper would be this nice." Serena said smiling at you. "So this is your living room huh? And you said your name is Willy? Pleased to meet you." As she holds out her hand and you nervously shake it as you're unable to take your eyes off just how cute and pretty she is even in anime form from her huge solid blue eyes to her long blonde hair in pig tails to her short blue skirt with those long slender legs and stylish high heel red boots on top of that she was close to your own age.

"Yeah like I said I don't plan on hurting you or anything and you must a bit confused about how all this happened."

"How what happened?" She asked turning back around to stare at you after getting a eyeful of your house.

"You know you suddenly falling into my house unexpectedly." You replied.

"Oh yeah that,it was the oddest thing one minute I'm fighting the latest Negaverse creep with my friends in Tokyo,next thing I know I'm suddenly falling through some weird portal thing that opened up beneath my feet! Ohhh sorry here I am prattling along like crazy and never even introduced myself to you Willy, I'm always been a chatterbox I'm Serena Tsukino(I'm of course going with the English dub version) but to those who really know me,I'm also Sailor Moon,Champion of Justice since you look like a trust worthy person,I'm allowing you to know my treasured secret." She says before wandering around looking at your TV mounted on the wall.

"Strange I never seen a television like this one before and how did you get it put up on the wall like that?" She asked

"I'll explain in a bit but first are you hungry by any chance Miss....Miss Moon?" You said looking more at her back side or more precisely her skirt covered rear end luckily she was so engrossed in staring at your widescreen she didn't take notice at all before she turned back around with a smile.

"Now that you mention it....."

You just chuckled again shrugging it off, "Don't worry about it Serena. Now then what are you hungry for? I can fix us up some sandwiches or burger-" You said beginning to list all the food you could fix up for you and your quote unquote guest, before being cut off by said guest whom looked to be drooling for a moment before gaining control of her self again.

"Could you just show me where the fridge is Willy?" She asked you sweetly using the puppy dog eye trick to make herself look even cuter.

You just shrugged, chuckling a bit.

"Sure it's right over-" You try to say before being cut off again and being knocked off your feet as Serena zooms past you opens the fridge and begins to devour all the food in it, looking akin to a ravenous wild animal.

All you could was look on in shock as the normally thin and skinny super heroine had begun to get chubbier and fatter as she continued to eat in the way you would see Shaggy & Scooby the dog do in their shows.

After another few minutes Serena finally stopped eating now looking like a giant beach ball as she was now rubbing he large belly in content.

"WOW and I thought my family and I were big eaters.." You said scratching the back of your neck.

"*groan* Oh sorry Willy I hope I didn't eat you out of house and home!" Your friend said worried.

However you quickly shoot down her worries saying "Don't worry about it! Like I said my family and I are big eaters as well so we're always prepared for situations like this.." You said trailing off as you go over to the now empty fridge and push a button on the side of it making more food appear in the fridge.

Serena smiled at that "Okay good!"

"Well Serena if you still feel hungry you can keep eating if you like..."

Serena thought about it before shaking her head. "No thank you I'm good."

However before you could respond Serena let out a massive belch before beginning to deflate similar to a balloon and in the process..

1253323222222111.title: Talespin

12533232222221111.content:
You were playing Crash Bandicoot on your computer while you were waiting for a number of games you purchased off Steam during the recent Christmas sale on Steam to download and install. Among them were Spyro, Sonic Mania, Yooka-Laylee, and the Disney Afternoon Collection. You had pretty much had a huge collection of games between your retro console games and what you had on Steam and GOG. You had managed to beat the first bosses in the first two Crash Bandicoot games in the trilogy, which allowed you the option to play as Coco before getting a confirmation that The Disney Afternoon Collection was done installing. You decide to take a break when you hear a strange noise coming from your living room.

You decide to go check it out and notice it was Rebecca Cunningham and her daughter Molly. Both seemed to be passed out. Thinking things through, you don't believe you'd be able to move both of them to your room at the same time and that moving one of them at a time might be a bad idea if the other were to wake up while you were doing so. You decide to set them on couches on opposite sides of the room. This way, if one of them wakes up, you'd You were lucky enough to have the TV in your living room set up for remote play game streaming as this allowed you a chance to continue playing various games while you waited for them to wake up. You decide to boot up Spyro with one of your wireless controllers when you hear a yawn.
12533232222221111.title: Rebecca Cunningham and Molly

choices: Rebecca wakes up as you turn the system on.
Rebecca wakes up later and sees you getting along with Molly.
125332322222211112.content:
You noticed it was Molly that was waking up. The bear cub walked over to her mother and shouted, "Mommy! Mommy! Wake up!" It didn't seem to work.

Realizing she might be a little concerned, you say in a kind voice, "I think it's best to let her rest. In the mean time, I can offer you something to keep you entertained," you offered.

You picked up Rebecca and carried her in your arms. "Follow me, please. There's something I'd like to show you," you requested.

"Where are we going and what is it you want to show me," Molly asked as she followed you.

"Growing up, I didn't play with dolls and toy vehicles you had," you explained as you kept leading her down the hall way.

"Do you have board games?" Molly asked as she started to think about it was you might have.

"You're close, but it's best that I show you what it is," you said as you got into your bed room.

"Can you tell me what is? Molly asked.

"It's in my closet, give me a minute and I'll get it out," you answer her question without spoiling the surprise as you gently place Rebecca on your bed.

You dig through your closet and bring out some of your video game consoles. You had an HDMI compatible NES console clone, an SNES, a Sega Genesis, a Nintendo 64, a PlayStation 2, a PlayStation 3, a Nintendo Wii, and a Wii U. You also had a Game Boy Advance SP, a DSlite, and a 3DS. You had switched to PC gaming recently for newer games, though.

"What are these?" Molly asked.

"When I was younger, I played games on these devices. Some of these games were for one player only, some for two or more, some adventure games, some were competitions," you explained.

As you look through the hardware, you realized didn't have the controllers that came with many of these, but in a number of cases it's because you upgraded to newer ones. Example, the NES and SNES, you had bluetooth SNES controllers with wireless receivers for the consoles. For the Genesis you had done the same, but the controllers were the 6 button variant. For the N64, you had aftermarket controllers with a better analog stick and were designed to be more two handed than the original ones. For the Wii, you the upgraded Wii remote plus versions. You also had HDMI cords for the system. Molly was going to experience a bit of your childhood and something that would be considered futuristic from where she came from.

"Before we decide which one of these devices to set up, we need to figure out which games might be the best options. Not all games are appropriate for someone your age," you tell her as you show her the different games you have.

"What's that one?" Molly asks as she points to Mario Party.

"That one is a 4 player board game. Players take turns rolling dice for a number value between 1 and 10 while trying to get coins to buy stars. After each player has a turn, little games are played where coins can be earned. The color of the spaces that each player lands determine's what kind of game is played. This one should be fine for you to play. I'll set it up," you explained.

"How do you know which ones are okay for me to play?" Molly asked.

"Most of these games have a box with some letters and numbers on them. For your age, we're looking for anything labeled GA, K-A, or E," you tell her as you hook up the Nintendo 64.

"And what about the ones that don't have a box like that?" Molly asked.

"I can make a judgement call based for the games that I do own, but for things I don't I'll try to research it to see what I can find out about it," you answer as you plug in the controllers. You then leave an extra controller out in the event that Rebecca wakes up so you can offer her a chance to join in the game with you and Molly, but you do make sure to put what you don't need.
125332322222211112.title: Taking Molly's mind off her mother.

choices: "I would love a drink, thank you!"
"I don't need a drink, thank you though!"
"I'd actually love to join you and Molly in your game!"

As the system booted up you and Molly heard a groan behind you "Goodness, what in the world happened? Are you okay pumpkin?" Rebecca asked (mostly to herself) in confusion, not wanting her to worry you wordlessly motion for Molly to go over to her mother which she does saying "I'm fine Mommy I'm just playing with a new friend I met!" Hearing that Molly already thought of you as a friend made you happy inside.

"That's nice honey.." Rebecca said trailing off as she attempted to clear her head, before her eyes widened in shock as she took in her new surroundings.

"Where are we and Who are you?" She asked as her eyes settled on you.

You quickly respond in what you hope is a calm and kind manner, "I'm (Your Name) ma'am. As for where you are your in my home.."
You held out a hand for her to shake which she cautiously returns "I'm Rebecca Cunningham.." She trailed off as she placed her free hand on Molly's shoulder "...and this is my daughter Molly." She said smiling down at her daughter whom was waiting for you to come back to your game with her, before her mother sent a grateful smile your way.

"It's very nice to meet you."

You nodded, "Likewise."

The two of you were interrupted by Molly saying "Come on, (your Name)! let's play!" The young bear cub said getting impatient at having to wait for you. Rebecca looked unhappy as she said "Pumpkin, you should know better where are your manners?" She asked/scolded making her daughter look down at the floor "Sorry Mommy. (Your Name) can we play now please?"

You nodded as you tell her "Sure Molly first though.." You trailed off glancing over to Rebecca as you respond "I'm sure you have a lot of questions and I'll answer what I can, in the meantime though, do you need anything Rebecca? maybe a glass of sweat tea?" You said trying to be polite, Rebecca thought it over for a moment before she said...

(before she could speak Molly woke up from a nightmare)
12533232222221111211.content:
At first Rebecca seemed unsure about this saying "I don't think I need anything right now-" However before she could finish you spoke up "Rebecca I insist! You and your wonderful daughter are guests in my home, least I can do is try and make you feel welcome.." You then trailed off as you turned to Molly and squatted down next to her, giving her a kind smile.

"How about you Molly, Would you like anything?"

Molly thought it over for about two seconds before she asked "Do you have any hot chocolate?"

You chuckled, a little caught off guard saying "I don't know if your mom would approve of you having that.." You then looked to Rebecca wanting her opinion on the matter, "I'm okay with that. Just try not to spill it okay pumpkin?" Molly nodded. With that you stood up muttering "Okay then, I'll be back in a moment." You then headed into the kitchen, grabbing 2 mugs for your friends and one for yourself.

After a minute or two you returned to your guests with mugs of hot chocolate in tow, "Here you two are, Careful though it's hot!"

"Thank you (Your Name)." Rebecca said grateful for your hospitality, "Yeah! thanks (Your Name)!" Molly said as she quickly snagged her mug and began drinking it You couldn't help but chuckle at your friend's eagerness, "Not a problem you two.." You said taking a sip of your drink with Rebecca doing the same. Eventually you put your mug on the coffee table and picked back up your controller, "How about we get back to our game?" Molly quickly nodded and fallowed your lead.

With that you and Molly spent the next hour playing Mario party (with Rebecca joining in on the fun on occasion) Eventually Molly let out a long yawn. "I think it's time for a curtain bear cub to go to bed.." You said making said bear cub retort "But I'm not- *yawn* tired yet!"

You and Rebecca giggle at that, "Sure you are.." You said going over to Molly to take her hand, "Come along, I'll take you to the guest bedroom." You said kindly as you took her to the bedroom to put her to bed. After you finished with that you came back into the living room and found Rebecca looking thoughtful.

"Something on your mind?" You asked as you took a seat in the armchair near the couch.
Rebecca thought to herself a moment before she said..

125332322222211112113.content:
Molly woke up and screamed loudly, “Lucy! LUCY!”

“She’s concerned about her doll. Did you happen to find one that is a bear wearing a
blue dress?” Rebecca asked.

“No, but I have an idea. There’s a place that allows shoppers to create their own
stuffed animal toys. I’ll be happy to take her there tomorrow. For now, you should go
comfort her. I might have something that I could offer her for now,” you suggested.

Rebecca leaves to comfort Molly. You go back to your room and reach up to your shelves.
While you had some Funko Pop figures, you figured you might show them to Molly some time
in the future. Of the ones you were thinking about giving her, you picked Coco Bandicoot
and made a note to pick up another while shopping online. As for the stuff toys you had,
noticed Sonic the Hedgehog and Toriel from Undertale. You decided to offer her both. You
figured it might help Molly sleep better if she had some music that was calming, so you
put some on an MP3 player you have lying around and bring it with you to the guest room.

“Sorry I’m late, I had to get a few things,” you say as you enter the room. Molly
seemed a bit calmer now. “First is Sonic the Hedgehog. He is a hero who uses his speed
to save trapped animals and the world around him,” you tell her as you give her the
first stuffed animal. “Next is Toriel. She is a motherly character that acts as guardian
and a protector,” you tell her as you give her the stuffed white goat toy. “Third is a
collectible toy. This one is Coco Bandicoot. She’s helped her brother Crash save the world
from an evil scientist several times,” you tell her as you give her the toy in the box.
She takes a look at it and notices that what Coco’s wearing looks a little bit like what
she is, but it’s a white shirt instead of pink.

Are you giving me this one because it looks like me?” Molly asks.

You’ve noticed that too, but it’s not just her. Toriel is supposed to represent
your mother and how she cares for you. Sonic is supposed to represent me. I might not be
family, but I am willing to do what I can to protect you,” you tell her.

“Thank you,” Molly says as she puts Coco on the nightstand.

“There is one more thing I have to offer you. I figured some calming music might help
you relax, so I brought this for you,” you say as you start up a playlist of calming
music on the MP3 player and then place it on the nightstand next to the toy. Molly yawns
and goes back to sleep.

“You seem to get along real well with Molly,” Rebecca comments on your parenting
skills, then asks, “Do you have a girlfriend?”

“No,” you answer.

“I was thinking, maybe after you take Molly to get a new toy, maybe the three of us
could go out to eat. Something similar to a date,” Rebecca suggests.

You shrug, "I guess we can do that. There is one thing though.." You said trailing off as you went over to the couch and began to search under it before pulling out a small dust covered box, "What's in there?" Rebecca asked as she had to fan away some of the dust that came up from the box when it had been moved. "Something that will allow you & your daughter too walk around in town without raising suspicion.."

"What do you mean?" Rebecca asked curious.

"*sigh* Most people aren't as welcoming or trusting as I am to you and Molly Rebecca.." Rebecca looked too the side sadly muttering "I figured as much.." You nodded continuing, "If someone other then me catches sight of you two they'll call the authorities and have the two of you put in a cage at the zoo or something worse." You finished giving Rebecca a Grimm look. Knowing what that look meant made your friend shudder, "Goodness.." You nodded again, "Your daughter especially doesn't need to go through something like that at her age so it would be best if we tried to avoid that."

Rebecca nodded asking "How do we do that?"

You smiled and opened the box, "With these.." You said as you pulled out the contents of the box which turned out to be 2 blank white masks, "What can those do?" "These two masks have a power to alter a person's appearance that way the person who wears them can fit into the world without problems."

"What'll happen to me?" You chuckled, "Put it on and find out."

Rebecca glanced down at the mask you held out in front of her before she slowly took hold of it and put it on, the moment it made contact her entire body glowed white before it faded just a fast as it had shown up revealing Rebecca rubbing her head in confusion, "What happened?" "Look at your hand." She did so but instead of finding her fur covered paw she found a human hand, she glanced at her other hand and found the same result. She glanced at the rest of her body and found that she now had the appearance of a human woman!"

"Amazing.." She said in shock before a thought came too her "How do I change back?" "Easy, just take the mask off and you'll return to normal." "Okay." Rebecca did as you instructed and her body glowed white again before returning to it's normal state. "At least now Molly and I'll be safe if we go out of the house with you.."

You nodded and said "Yeah, but we''ll worry about it in the morning right now we should get some sleep." Rebecca nodded saying "I can take the couch if you want." However you quickly stopped her saying "No, it'd be better for you to take my bed for the night sense my room's next too the room Molly's sleeping in. Better for you to be close just in case she has another bad dream right?"

Rebecca blinked in surprise muttering "I suppose your right." You nodded as you went about grabbing blankets before climbing in them and laying down on the couch. "Goodnight then and thank you again." Rebecca said before heading off to bed.

*The Next Morning*

You woke up fairly early to start cooking breakfast knowing that you had guests to feed after all.

Deciding on making pancakes, bacon and eggs you go about grabbing everything needed. As you were working on the pancakes a voice spoke up, "Do you need a hand?" You looked over your shoulder and found Rebecca standing a few feet away. "Your up early." Rebecca laughed as she came up next to you "I could say the same for you." You chuckled at that as you went over to the eye on the stove the bacon was cooking on and turned it off sliding the bacon off the pan and onto a plate, then putting that on the kitchen table.

"Well I just finished cooking the bacon, You wanna help with the pancakes while I work on the eggs?" Rebecca nodded and went right too work, after a few minutes the food was all cooked and ready. Rebecca went to go and wake up Molly while you went about setting out plates of food for your friends and yourself, as Rebecca and her daughter came in you greeted the bear cub with a smile. Morning Molly, Did you sleep well?"

Molly nodded, "Good, you want some breakfast?" Without answering she ran over to her seat and glanced down at her food before she began to giggle, "What's so funny pumpkin?" Rebecca asked her daughter in amusement "*giggle* (Your Name) made my food in the shape of a smiley face!" You chuckled "I figured you'd like it." Other then the occasional joke from Molly, breakfast was uneventful. After that you helped Rebecca explain about the mask you had given her the night prior that turned her into a human woman as well as one for Molly that turn her into a normal little girl.

After that The 3 of you went to the store to have Molly make her own stuffed bear, she had just finished putting a blue dress on it as she said "I missed you Lucy, Make sure I don't lose you again okay?" After that you paid for the toy and headed off to the cafe to decide where to go next, After helping the girls pick out some new clothes you went to the park to let Molly play for a while As that was going on you were sitting on a bench looking at the sky as the sun was beginning to set, you noticed Rebecca coming over to you so you scooted over to give her a spot to sit. "You ready to head out to get some dinner?"

Rebecca nodded, "Sure, Do you know of any good places we can eat?"

You smirked and said "You'll have to wait and see." You then called out "Molly! it's time to go!" A moment later she came and jumped onto your back wanting a piggyback ride, Rebecca giggled at the sight as the 3 of you went back to your car.

1253323222222112221221.content:
You woke up, happy and with a pep in your step. You figuratively and literally jumped out of your bed with a big smile on your face. You went and brushed your teeth, just thinking about the great day your gonna have.

Let's lay down the events leading up. First off its Saturday, which is always good. Secondly your parents are out of town for the next week, which means uncensored fun. Thirdly it's blazing hot outside, which means you better stay in the house the entire day. Or go outside and get fried like an egg

In short terms, you've got a whole to do nothing but sit on your butt, watch TV and play games.

You walk out of your room still in your underwear, knowing there's no reason to get dressed. Your underwear consisted of a pair of heart boxers and a white plain shirt, with a couple of stains on it. You start to prepare for your extended stay on the couch. Cooking some popcorn in the microwave and grabbing some fresh soda cans from the fridge. You also disconnected the phone line, making sure you wouldn't get interrupted on your perfect day

Now that you were all prepared, you turn on the TV and . . . Nothing happened. You keep pressing the remote hoping something would change. You checked the cords to the Tv, the remote's battery. You couldn't understand what happened to the Tv.

You however understood less when a blue circular portal opened. You jump back a bit in surprise, you then watch as a girl fell out of the portal. Needless to say she was beautiful, with a beautiful face and a beautiful body. She had old timey clothes and looked around your age, if not slightly older. To be honest she kind of looked like Kim Possible, more then an uncanny resemblance.

The portal disappeared and then ______________
1253323222222112221221.title: Mim Shows Up

12533232222221122212212.content:

125332322222222222222332311.content:
(In an AU with no Tatsumaki)
The day was nice, so I thought. A killer thunderstorm had rolled in during the morning, luckily resources are plentiful. I sit now infront of my fireplace with some Ginseng, watching out the window as the rain pours down heavily.. Look back on how I got here like I do sometimes, im one of the best martial artists- just chop. That's it, a kick or a chop defeats almost anything instantly. Monsters near God level I've defeated, but never got with the Hero Association just because it is not my cup of tea. My cozy log cabin is nuzzled near MO-City in the mountains, easy access to supplies after im done gold panning in the river.

Lightning is awfully strong, flashes are often happening outside now. It's entrancing to watch.. Then a very loud cracking sound with a green flash, there's a slam into the ground- I quickly jump up from my recliner & swoop toward the door, disregarding boots or a coat. I open it & look out, about half a mile away the forest sears with fire even as it rains. Rarely anything bad happens near my house- im not taking chances. Jumping far & fast, my body is weightless & I can glide like a eagle- then I see a crater with a girl in it, fire searing the forest & ground around.
Her hair is green & she is passed out- also almost nude, her black clothes are ripped & barely together. She looks like a young teen.. Breathing in gaps, it is not my focus immediately. I land & begin to clap at the fire, putting it out by shooting the rain at it.

Easily done, I look at her- why today? Looks like life decided to throw a problem my way.. But she is injured! I see some scrapes around her chest & a very bare bruise on her forehead, yeah, time to go. Not really focusing on her soft body, ass & such as I pick her up I'd quickly jump back toward my home. The landing was smooth despite the mud, I quickly made way in as the lightning got worse again..
Would walk to my recliner & set her on it- though it now was wet, it was warm, the fire kept it like that. This lady grunted in pain, definitely not well, breathing steady now.

.....
Figure she'll be ok. Should wait for her to wake up, & if not soon, bring her to MO-City. Would grab my tea from the coffee table infront of the recliner, taking a drink of it as I made way into my bedroom.
Would grab one of my shirts- im a 6'4" man, lady barely reaches my nipples to, so this will do well to cover her. Made way back into the main room to see she's slouched over & out still, atleast comfortably. Throwing the big shirt on her & finishing my tea, I set that down & would sit infront of the fire, closing my eyes & holding my hands together...

Blackness.. For long.
...................................
Calming it is, hearing the tapping of the rainfall & booms in the sky. "HEY!" There's a high-pitched yell behind me- she is awake. See she is holding my shirt around her front, her feet tuck it in as she puts them on the recliner. Angry looking.

"Awake? Sorry- you ok?" There's a few seconds silence. "No im not ok! Where am I!? Who are you!" Really confusing me here.. "Samo Felork, nice to meet.. You? We're near MO-City, found you in a crater near my house."
Her face contorts like she is taking in something bad, she seems to shive a bit. "So I lost.." She lost?

"Tatsumaki. I take it A-City is okay?" A-City? There's only AO-City.. "AO-City is okay, has been for two months." Her expression seems a mix of anger, confusion & submission.. The storm has also calmed. How long was I focusing on the blackness? "IM NOT EVEN IN MY WORLD!?" Her yelling was like a shriek, very annoying. "...Dunno.. Uh, just found you, Tatsumaki. Want me to get out of here so you can properly dress? Your not hurt to bad?" Feeling like a young schoolboy, I see her expression drop near expressionless for a few seconds. Also feel stupid not acknowledging her world shift.

"Shit.. YES! GO!" Sheesh..

I walk back in my room & sit on the bed, closing the door fully. See her eyeing me down as I leave, figure she didn't like me seeing her tiny nude body.. Goodness teen's & mortal danger don't get me going..

12533232222222222222233232111.content:
You bought an episode of the classic Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles cartoon series and just finished downloading it. You decided for it would be interesting to watch it in New Retro Arcade: Neon’s theater. While you didn’t have a VR headset to make the most of the virtual arcade and theater environment, you did have an excellent PC, which was good enough for you. You configure the game’s files and added the file into the game as a VHS tape. You also got a chiptune version of the show’s theme song, which you added as a tape for the game’s radio.

After configuring it, you boot the game up on Steam, access the Neon Arcade from the menu, then pick up the radio in the game and put it in the theater. You then went back for tape with the song and put it in the radio, then pick up video tape and insert it into the VCR connected to the projector in the game. A second later, you heard a loud crash coming from your living room. You decided to pause the video and check it out. and noticed a woman in a yellow jumpsuit. She looked like she was worn out. “Oh, sorry about showing up unannounced. My name is April O’Neil. I’m with a reporter for Channel 6 news,” she says. “I’m Alex Mason. If you don’t mind me asking, how did you get here?” you told her. “Well, I was out with Irma investigating a portal and got too close. It sucked me in. I wonder she escaped,” April says. “You’re welcome to stay here. There’s a guest room. It’s the first one on the right down the hall,” you tell her.

12533232222222222222233232213.content:
As a blonde woman dressed in a red-and-beige jumpsuit walked through the portal, you gasped as you noticed the mechanical thing on her left arm.

"Better anywhere but here!" The woman said, looking back. When the portal closed with another BAM!, she said, "Woah! Talk about low tech! I must be miles away from Dr. Light!"

"Who are you?" you asked, making the woman jump a little.

Putting something in one of her pockets, she turned to face you, holding out her left arm as if it were a weapon. As her hand retracted into the mechanical device, she said, "I could ask the same thing about you!"

Holding your hands up you said, "I'm (NAME) and I'm a human. Who are you and why are you here?"

The woman let out a sigh as her left hand returned. She answered, "My name is Roll. My brother and I were visiting a private technology show. I'd say more, but I doubt you're cleared for it. Got a phone?"

"Sure, but I think you're not in your home dimension any more..." You said, pointing at your home phone.

"Why?" Roll asked as she picked up the phone and dialed. After a few moments, she looked puzzled and tried dialing again. A few more attempts got her mad enough to put the phone down roughly. She asked, "I can't reach him. The operator said the number is not in service! Why do you think I'm not in my home dimension?"

You picked up a few Mega man games and the DVD of the TV show. "This is why, Ms. Roll."

Looking at the games and DVD, Roll muttered, "Sizzling circuits! Dr. Gates said his teleporter might sent anyone to another dimension! I guess there's no harm in telling you how I got here..."

She sat down and so did you. She began, "So the Technology show was about a prototype teleporter. Somehow, Dr. Wily found out about it and attacked. Mega gave me the teleporter and told me to run. However, Wily's saucer fired some weird missiles that caused gaps to appear in the floor. I fell into a cave that was underneath the place. When the cave I was stuck in began to collapse, I decided to use the device, even though the coordinates were... weird... Now I know it sent me to another dimension."

"Is there anyway to get you home?" You asked as she brought out the teleporter from her pockets. It looked like a TV remote with a screen built in.

"Yeah... I think. I need to recharge it and check to see if it needs repairs. Thankfully, it can recharge with solar power, it just needs a week or two," Roll answered as she looked the teleporter. "I can do repairs in the morning. Do you have a spare room I can stay in?"

"Yeah, but I gotta ask. Why are you so calm?" You asked.

"I'm a robot and I'm on an adventure that Mega never went on! I'm too excited to be scared!" Roll answered with a thumbs up and a wink.

You smiled, hoping she really felt as she looked.

After you showed Roll to her room, you went to your room and fell asleep.

In the morning, you...

"Oh! Those.I thought they were pretty neat. I just wish they were more accurate to the stuff that me and Mega do on a daily basis," Roll answered with small smile. "And do the video game versions look like kids to you?"

"Well, it's not my decision, but as time does on, the artwork for each does seem to suggest that Rock and Roll were slowly modified to look older as the games went on," You answered with a shrug. "So... After I finish eating, shall we go look for the parts? Or should we go walk around or even see some movies?"

And so the two of you headed out. Roll asked, "So where are we going?"

With both of them in your grip, you give them a look that's a mix of absolutely livid and very displeased. Suddenly Ryuko speaks up, "Sheesh! What's with you Man!? Me & my sister were just having fun.."

Ryuko says as brash and blunt as you remember from the show despite her child like voice & appearance, however your eye begins to twitch as the word fun leaves her lips. "You... Call... THIS... FUN??!!" You say growling out the last bit as your head looks like it could catch fire at any moment. You then bark out, "YOU TURNED MY HOME INTO A GOD DAMN WAR ZONE!!" At that moment Ryuko's sister, Satsuki speaks defending her sister. "We're sorry mister, we promise this won't happen again. WON'T IT SISTER?!?" Satsuki says through gritted teeth as she sends a glare her sister's way.

Looking irritated Ryuko retaliates with "What do you mean WE?-" Ryuko tries to say before Satsuki kicks her in the shin to shut her up. You then place both of them on your couch and put one finger in front of each of their foreheads letting out an exasperated sigh before you speak, "Now listen here, BOTH OF YOU! You are sisters and you will act like it, You will treat each other with Respect and Kindness until I say otherwise. Am I understood? You say, poking each of the girls in the forehead as you say each word to make sure they get the point. Satsuki nods and say's "Yes sir."

However Ryuko just says "Don't make make me use this on you." Trying to sound and look threatening while holding her scissor blade. You just chuckle, and take the blade out of her hand, and dangle it in front of her. "You think this is a weapon?" You ask trailing off as you toss the blade aside. "No.. THESE ARE WEAPONS!!" You say as a blue scythe appears in your left hand and a red one in your right. However too the girl's shock you aren't done as your skin suddenly burns away leaving your skeleton being engulfed by orange flames on your right and blue on your left to compliment the blades respectfully.

After you transform back to normal you snap your fingers to get all the damaged stuff fixed in seconds. You chuckle as you notice the girls staring at you at a loss for words, "Shocked girls?" You ask with a smirk. The girls just nod. "Okay. Now are you going too do as I said and be nice to each other?" yet another nod. You smile and ask "Okay then how about I..."
