131311.content:
"Look,Hermione to put it nice and simple you went through a portal and ended up in my world. I'll explain the rest later for now; How about I show you around town? The portal you came through is gone. so if your going to be in my world for an unknown amount of time you may as well get accustomed to it. Don't you think?"

You ask with a shrug as you hold out your hand for the witch girl to grab, Hermione (Albeit regrettably) sees the point and logic behind your reasoning as she let's out a sigh and holds out her hand to you. "I see your point. I think I'll take you up on your offer mister... I'm sorry I never got your name." She says, a little embarrassed.

You smile and say "That's quite alright call me Jack." With that the two of you seal the deal with a handshake after which the two of you head out to your car as you get in the driver's seat and your witch friend gets in the passenger's seat. "So, Where do you want to go first?" You ask with a smile.

"How about we go to the amusement park?" She asks as you nod, "Now Hermione there's something I should probably explain..." You say trailing off as you start the car and head out of the driveway. "About what?" She asks curious, You sigh as you say "Ya see Hermione in this world magic and it's users are rather...scarce." Hermione nods as she asks "So your world is largely inhabited by muggles then?"

You nod as you continue "That's right and because of that we had to figure out a different way to live in this world so we created machines such as vehicles for transportation and weapons for self defense among other things.." You smile as you see that you've arrived. "Ah! Look we're here!" Hermione says as she notices as well while you pull into a parking spot.

After you two head in you start the fun off by going on the roller coaster almost 4 times, going on the bumper cars and (after constant begging from your witch friend) the tunnel of love. After a long day of having fun as well as wining Hermione a big stuffed teddy bear you begin to notice the sun going down, your attention gets brought back to Hermione as you hear her stomach growling.

"Hungry?" You ask with a chuckle as Hermione says "Yes actually." blushing in embarrassment before asking "Do you have an idea on what we could do for food?" At this you begin to think "Let's see..."

"I was wondering if you have a girlfriend." Hermione asked

"Huh? What?" You are literally taken back by this unexpected question

"I said do you have a girlfriend Jack? That is someone you like?" She asked again without hesitation

"Er to tell the truth no in fact I never even worked up the nerve to talk to a girl much less ask one out." You admitted truthfully and she frowned

"Well that's....that's not right is it? You're talking to one now and doing a very good job of it I should add! You mean you never even walked up to a girl just to say Hi?" She asked arching a thin brown eyebrow in surprise

"No as I said I'm particularly shy and nervous when it comes to girls normally if one approaches me,I'd be more likely to head in the opposite direction." You replied Hermione stared questionably at you for the longest while as if she could hardly believe what she just heard then she stood to her full height.

"Alright stand up!" She ordered a bit too bossily

"Why what are you going to do....." You ask

"Just stand up Jack." She said again

"Are you going to use magic on me....." You nervously asked

"No not right now we're going to practice a bit...you're going to introduce yourself properly to me and I'll show you how to present yourself correctly in front of a girl so you won't be so nervous next time." Hermione stated firmly

"Er...okay." You said as you stood up shakingly

"No need to be that way Jack we're only practicing now what do you do first?" She asked

"Er...." Was all you could say as you're shivering beads of sweat

"Goodness! You really don't know how to present yourself in front of a girl do you?" She giggled then covered her mouth ashamed "Sorry but it's a bit funny and sad at the same time now first you hold out your hand to me and introduce yourself go on....." She urged you

"Ok...okay hello there my name is Jack....." You started but she stopped you

"No,no you don't say Hello there not like that! And you must face me properly staring at my eyes when you do and please don't twiddle your fingers like that keep them stiffly at your side! Alright go on try again!" She urged you

"Alright hello Miss my name is Jack...." You said as you hold out your hand to her

"Very good! That was nearly perfect but you could have done a better job presenting yourself to me....Hello Jack my name's Hermione Granger pleased to meet you." As she shook your hand beaming "Alright what's next?"

"Er I ask you out or something?" You ask but she shakes her head

"No at least not yet first you tell me a bit about yourself." She pressed you despite her having a serious fits of the giggles

"Okay I like playing video games,exercising,things like that. And you what do you like to do?"

"Well magical circumstances aside I mostly like to read,do homework among other things! Very good job Jack you're getting the hang out of it!" Hermione said happily as she put a hand on your shoulder "Alright how do you feel? Do you feel a little more confidence that you'll be able to walk up and speak to a girl now?" She asked

"Yeah I definitely feel a lot more confidence now." You said truthfully and she beamed even more

"Good! Okay so I'll ask again so do you have a girlfriend?"

"No not really." You replied and to your utter surprise she took a hold of your left hand smiling sweetly at you as she did

"Well then would you like to have me as your girlfriend?"

"You're serious? You're joking right?" You are taken back more than ever and actually step back in shock but she shakes her head

"No I'm not! I mean it do you want me as your girlfriend? Say yes or no." She requested and you began shivering and sweating more than ever

"Er yes if you want then yes I do-I mean I will." You choke out and she beamed even more

"Then we're officially boyfriend and girlfriend then! Very,very good Jack!" As she granted you a passionate hug you were surprised at this different more affective side of Hermione Granger then again there was a lot more to her besides being a magical expert and boarder line genius

"Alright so what's next?" You asked a bit excitedly

"This....." Hermione said as she.........

13131113.content:
"So what do you like to do in your free time?" She asked. You told her you typically hanged out at home. You like to play sports like golf or baseball. In fact once, you got into a golf tournament and won second place. You then told her you liked to draw. You were very good at drawing, and had drawn people before. "Can you draw me?" She asked.

"Sure, but you'll have to stay still." She nodded, so you went to get a pencil and your drawing book. Once you got back, you told her to get into a position that was most comfortable for her. She sat on the couch and put her hands in her lap. Once she smiled, you started drawing. You worked for three hours, making sure it was good. Though she was struggling and getting tired, she didn't move from her spot. Once you were done, you told her she could move. She immediately collapsed on the couch.

"I didn't realize it would take that long." She said. You simply smiled. She got up and walked over to see what you drew. When she saw it, she thought it was amazing. From head to toe, it was very detailed. Without warning, she kissed you on the cheek and thanked you.

"Here, take it. You can keep it." You said.

"Are you sure?" She said, looking at some of the other pictures. There were pictures of animals, birds, plants. You nodded and told her you could always draw more. She hugged you again and sat down on a different position from before. Her next question was if you traveled. You told her you went to one place outside of the country: Paris, France. You saw the Eiffel Tower. Unfortunately, you didn't have anyone to travel with so it was a little lonely. You told her you didn't have many friends. "Well at least you have me." She said. To cheer you up, she decided to . . .

131311131.content:
You were thinking hard to what type of game you wanted to try out with Hogwarts' smartest witch as you thought any game she had in mind involved her using magic on you and you weren't sure you wanted to be turned into a frog,crow etc

"Are you alright?" Hermione asked concernedly you nodded and stared at the brown bushy haired 13th year old British girl for a while then it dawned on you

"Hey I have a idea for a game!" You announced suddenly

"Ohh what is it then?" She asked eagerly you had to think about this for a few minutes you recalled just how intelligence Hermione Granger really was when it came to stuff in the Wizarding World surely she was just as smart in the nonmagical world you had to test her knowledge

"Okay here's the game: I'm going to give you a series of trivia questions that only a highly logical smart person like yourself can possibly answer." You said walking over to the book shelf and picking out a book on 'Really Advanced Brain Teasers'

"A test on how intelligence I am? Oy how dumb do you think I am?" She asked hands on her hips

"Huh? Excuse me?" You asked flipping through the pages trying to decide

"You believe just because I'm a magical witch from a different world from your own that I wouldn't be able to figure out any of your average nonmagical Muggle-No-Magi science-mathematics things! You seem to forget both of my parents are nonmagic and I happen to know a lot of stuff about both your Muggle American World and the British version(sigh) but nonetheless if you insist I'll-what's the-word- you American boys use? Humor you! Go ahead and ask me anything!" She said smirking a bit

"Okay I'll give her two out of three!" You thought

"If you win,manage to answer most of the questions I ask I.....I'll let you do whatever you want to me,you're free to use your magic on me anyway you'd like I won't complain!" You said truthfully

"I...I really don't think...that's a good idea....." Hermione frowned heavily

"It's no problem you were going to erase my memory eventually right? Anyway let's get started......" You began

The first test was a find-it-word which she had to find the hidden letter in a small box of blue polkadots ranging from LEFT to which she correctly guessed

"T that's obliviously as its right there." Hermione said

The second test was another find-it to which she had to find a series of smiley faces in a small box of red polkadots

"Again obvious it's the frowning face!" She said bored

"Wow! You're good at this!" You muttered amazed

"It's honestly not that hard to figure out Willy!" She said folding her arms "Anyway next one!"

The next ones involved more find-its in small boxes filled with yellow and pink polkadots to which Hermione effortlessly found the answers without much difficulty at all

"The heart for the pink one and the correct number is 275 for the yellow box! Again this is considered a little too simple for me!" She expressed truthfully "Come on give me some hard ones you said you want to know how smart I am!" She insisted a bit impatiently

"Okay you asked for it!" You said

"A athlete is able to jump FOREVER. However,everytime that she jumps she gets a bit more tired,and every jump goes 1/2 as far as her prior jump.

Now for her first jump,she goes 1/2 of a foot. On her second jump,she goes 1/4 of a foot and so on and so forth. How many jumps does it take for her to travel one foot?" You asked hoping to stump her on a really complicated math problem even the top genius nerds in your school couldn't answer

"Hmmmmmm well you're right this does require a bit of logical thinking....." Hermione said her hand on her chin finally she came to a conclusion

"Well the answer's simple she'll won't be able to get to the first mark if you continue to add the smaller amounts step by step."

"Huh? How did you come to that?" You asked antonished

"It's not hard if you think about it from a mathematic view of point Willy. I told you this type of stuff isn't that hard for me to figure out." Hermione said a broad smile on her face "Here let me show you how to figure it out....." And she brought out her wand and muttered a inaudible word and a lifelike illusion of a stick figure jumping over a series of hurdles appeared in midair

"See how long it takes for them to make it? It's simple to figure out." She showed you as with another wave of her wand the illusion vanished and she stowed the stick back into her jeans pocket "Now are there anymore you want to ask me?" She smiled

"You're actually enjoying this?" You asked stunned "I thought it might be a bit boring or something....."

"Oh no it's actually quite exciting Willy! Go on ask me some more!" She pressed you

"Okay and for the final test maybe she'll like a murder mystery puzzle after all she'll eventually help Harry and Ron defeat He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named aka Lord Voldemort!" You thought surely she won't be able to figure out this one

"Okay here's one,a good one." You said

"Okay this takes place at a bar or what you would call it a pub("I'm sure they're the same thing Willy." She pointed out)the man lying on the floor was a gangster or criminal called Three-Fingers Jim when the police arrived on the scene Jim was lying unconsciously on the floor of the bar,the autopsy result showed that a bullet had went through Jim's left ear,the bullet was defined to be the same kind of the gun that Marco,a close partner of Jim owned both of them used to have a lot of arguments as they often went to the same bar.

Even at that very moment of the murder there were only Marco and two waiters and when the police asked he(Marco answered) "There was no customer in the bar at the time. And I was the first person to enter and a moment later Jim walked in with a knife in his hand and yelled angrily "Marco will be the last day of your life!" Then he held the knife and came at me so I pulled out the gun in self-defense and opened fire." You continued as Hermione listened carefully

"The only eyewitnesses were the waiters there,they confirmed Marco's story to be true. When the police officer in charge heard this he placed him under arrest and took him to jail. So the question is how did the police officer know Marco was lying?" You finished and turned to the 13th year old witch thinking this would stump her

"Ohhh! A murder mystery hmmmmmm! Well this requires a bit of thinking more than usual if I was a ordinary average person but I believe the correct answer is when the other bandit Marco said Jim came upon him with the knife if that was true then they should have been facing one another then the bullet would have never went into Jim's left ear apparently the police officer figured that out as easily as I just did so that's that. Do you have anymore brain teasers for me?" Hermione gave you a solid sweet smile obliviously she was enjoying this a little too much

"Er no....." You gave up and tossed the book aside in defeat "It's oblivious not only are you the world's smartest witch in your magical world,you could just as well be the most intelligent person on the planet! I mean these are puzzles,riddles only guys like Sherlock Holmes can answer.....you know who he is right?" You asked

"Of course I do! He's that fictional detective person who lived in the Victorian era and solved all sorts of mysteries!" Hermione pointed out

"Wow! You really are Smart!" You gibbered breathlessly but she shook her head smiling

"No I'm just highly logical Willy! I happen to notice a lot of stuff most people would easily overlook but that was very fun! Thank you I rather enjoyed it!" As she put her hand on your shoulder affectingly

"So I guess you won after all,anything you want to do to me you're perfectly free to! I won't complain!" You said but she shook her head

"Ohhhh I couldn't......." Hermione looked horrified

"It's alright I don't care what you do to me!" You said truthfully but she still looked unsure and wary to do it she hesitated to pull her wand out of her back jeans pocket

"Are...are you certain....because I must warn you I'm rather good at most spells,a little too good and if I wind up hurting you or worse......." She stuttered

"I have complete confidence in you Hermione! If you wanted to hurt me you already would have the moment you met me!"

In the meantime, are you hungry?" You nodded. She left you on the couch and went to go get you something to eat. Though it felt weird being a furry creature, you had to admit, she was right. It felt nice having her take care of you like that. She came back with a nice juicy carrot. When she sat down, you climbed onto her lap.

"As long as I don't have to sleep in a cage, I'm fine with this." You said and started to eat your carrot. She smiled and petted you again.

"I was thinking about turning you into a dog, then you could sleep with me." She said. "Or I could transform myself. Would you like that?" Once you finished, you snuggled against her. She hugged you. "Hey, how about we . . .

"Stop picking on him and leave us. Or else!" She demanded. The three guys laughed. The leader (the one with the most muscles) stepped up to her.

"What exactly are you going to do about it? You can't possibly challenge me. If I say that you're going with me, you are going to listen." He said. Hermione pushed him back. His breath smelled really bad.

"I'm warning you!" She said. You weren't sure about what to do. Before you could react though, the leader grabbed Hermione and kissed her. He held her close to him, Hermione accidentally dropped her wand.

"Such a cute mouse. I'm going to take you home. We'll have some real fun." Although she struggled, the bully wouldn't let go. After he kissed her again, you ran up to him and punched him as hard as you could. He let go of Hermione and put his hand to where you hit him. "You brat! I'll show you what happens when you mess with me." He took a step forward and pushed you to the ground. You scraped your arm on the sidewalk. Luckily, Hermione had time to grab her wand.

"I warned you, now it's time to punish you!" The angry girl said. She waved her wand and spoke some words. Before they knew it, the three bullies turned into geese. Unlike when you were transformed however, the three bullies couldn't speak English. The leader honked at her, shocked. "Leave, before I turn you into bugs and step on you!" She said. The leader backed up. All scared and confused, the three flew away with their new wings.

"Thank you." You told her. Hermione fell onto her knees, terrified of what just happened.

"I don't even . . . want to know . . . what he was going to do with me. What if he treated me like a slave! Or something worse." You went over to her and held her close.

"I wasn't going to let that happen. I would have fought him with my bare fists until one of us collapsed if I had to. Don't worry about getting into trouble, look around. No one even noticed." It was true, it was as if nobody noticed, or cared. Hermione smiled, she liked having a friend by her. "Please, let me do something to make you feel better. Tell me what to do, I'll do anything." You meant it as well. She thought for a minute.

"A hotdog might be nice." She said. You nodded and helped her get back on her feet. You took her to a hotdog stand. She got a nice hotdog with ketchup and mustard on it. The two of you sat down at a table to eat. Hermione was feeling more comfortable now. Once she was done, she looked over to you. She thought about the fact that you said you would do anything for her. She smiled, and decided . . .

"How about we go to the zoo? I bet there is some cute animals there." You nodded and took her. You were also excited because you knew they got a new animal, the panda. You took her around. She gave the happiest smile you had ever seen. She loved the animals, and absolutely adored the petting zoo. When it started to get late, you suggested that it was time for the two of you to go home. However, she had another idea. She suggested that the two of you hide until night time.

"Why would we do that?" You asked, afraid to know. She gave a mischievous grin.

"So we can become zoo animals for a day. I'll use my magic to keep us hidden, we wait until night, go for one of the animals, then with my magic, we turn into the same kind. Then we can hang out until tomorrow night. Come on, please?" She begged. Although you feared something bad would happen, you agreed to it.

"Ok, fine. What animal will we turn into?" She pulled you close and whispered.

"You'll just have to wait and see." You nodded. As she said, she used her magic to hide the two of you. You waited until everyone left and it was pure silent. She then took you to a cage.

"Really?" You said looking at the cage she chose. She picked the sea turtles. They had an island in the middle and lots of water to swim in. "How are we going to tell which one we are?"

"Simple, with my magic, we'll communicate through thought. Then at the end of tomorrow, I'll call you and change us back." Hermione was confident. She then teleported both of you in the cage. You struggled to keep your head above the water. You didn't need to worry for long, as she then transformed both of you into turtles. Hermione's wand fell to the bottom. "Don't worry, I'll hold my wand with my mouth when I need it. I'll keep it in my shell so they don't think it's a normal stick." She told you.

The next day, people came to see you. You were surprised how many people liked turtles. You looked over at Hermione who was floating around, doing tricks. You could easily tell it was her because her she'll had a weird symbol that the others didn't have. The day went pretty smoothly, until . . .

"He may not be physically stronger, but he is much nicer than you elf lips!" She said. That pissed the bully off.

"Oh so you want to touch me huh? Well, I'll touch you, a lot!" She then started to slap his face hard. The other two bullies took a step back. They couldn't believe what they were seeing. Hermione kept slapping him, making sure he learned his lesson. Once she was done, Hermione glared at the others. The two bullies shuddered and ran away. The angry girl got off of the last bully and grabbed his arm. Though she was smaller than him, she was pretty strong. She spun around and let go, making him go flying. He landed right in the water. The bully got up, screamed and ran away.

You looked around to see some people looking. They waited for a moment before returning to whatever they were doing. You looked over at Hermione. She looked back at you smiling, as if nothing happened.

"Well that was fun!" She said and helped you get back on your feet.

"I thought you were going to use magic on him." You said.

"I don't need to use magic for every situation. Anyway, I'm tired. Let's go home." Hermione said, yawning. You got her home and into bed so she could take a nap. As she slept, you wanted to do something nice for her. You decided . . .

She then grinned at you looking horrorstruck "Oh but you don't have to worry about that right now let's just relax and enjoy this peaceful day together." As once again she took your hand into her free one but you still were concerned about the whole "Obliviate" mind altering thing remembering if she wasn't careful she could wind up damaging your brain completely but this was highly intelligent Hermione Granger we were talking about here so the chances of any of that happening was.... "Are you alright? You look really pale!" She said concernedly you shook your head

"How about a cold treat?" She asked. You nodded and took her into the kitchen, setting her down at the table. You luckily remembered that you had ice cream in your freezer. It hadn't been opened yet so it was completely fresh. You took the ice cream and a spoon out and set it in front of Hermione. "Wait. Are you saying . . . Do I get all of this?" She asked. You nodded.

"Take as much as you like. Just try to not make yourself sick." You said. She nodded, then didn't hesitate. She started to eat it all away. You couldn't believe how fast she was eating. "Whoa hold on! You'll get a brain freeze!" You warned her. She stopped when she heard you, but still got a brain freeze. She put her hand to her head.

"Ow ow. Well at least you warned me before I ate everything." She said. Once it was gone, she continued, but slower. She soon had a few more bites left. Instead of eating them right away, she asked a strange request. "Can I put this on your stomach?"

"Hm? What do you mean?" You heard what she said, but you weren't sure why.

"I want to tickle you, so I want to put this ice cream on your bare belly. Then I'll use my tongue to lick it away. Unless you're scared to have a girl get that close." She said and giggled. You told her you would do it, but not in the kitchen. Instead, you took her out to the backyard. You took off her shirt so she had easy access to your belly. Once you laid down on your back, she sat right next to you. Hermione started to put the remaining bits of ice cream on your stomach, licking her lips. You couldn't believe you agreed to this.

"I have one request before you do this. Can you act like you have kidnapped me? I know it's weird, but I like the feeling of you having complete control over me." Though it was a weird request, you wanted her to have as much fun as she could. She smiled and cover your mouth with her hand.

"Silence boy. You're all mine to use. In fact . . ." She started to say and pulled out her wand. With her magic, she made rope appear on your legs and arms. You could no longer get up without her help. She finished putting the ice cream on you. She leaned down to your ear and whispered. "You look tasty, my sweet treat. Don't think about escaping, none of your friends are coming to rescue you in time." Hermione licked up the ice cream. Her tongue tickled you a lot. You started giggling, and begged her to stop. She simply giggled. "You can't escape me. Once I'm done here, I have something else planned." She said. Hermione loved this game, she liked feeling powerful, plus her friend was technically willing. Hermione licked it up until it was gone. You couldn't stop laughing. You couldn't help it, your belly was sensitive. "I'm done there. Now it's time to meet your fate." Hermione . . . .

1313111322212.content:
"If it's alright, can I have some candy?" She asked. You nodded and told her there was a candy store pretty close by. The two of you walk down the street, it took about five minutes to get there. The store was pretty big, and you knew it had tons of candy inside. Hermione stepped in first, when she did, something happened.

When Hermione entered, confetti came down from the ceiling, and there was a noise.

"CONGRATULATIONS! You are are out 1,000 visitor. As a reward, you get to eat as much candy as you want FOR FREE!" The female owner said happily. Hermione was caught off guard.

"You mean . . Me?" She asked. The owner nodded and told her it was alright. Hermione looked at all of it, she was very hungry. She licked her lips and didn't hesitate anymore. She ran over and started filling her mouth with candy. Luckily, there wasn't any other customers in the building right now. The jellybeans were the first to go. She went through them like they were going out of style. She was basically Godzilla to this city of candy.

She went for gummy bears next. She ate every last one of them. Both you and the owner giggled while watching her. You saw her belly was getting very round.

"Hey, maybe you should stop before you get sick." You said, however, Hermione ignored you. She didn't stop until everything was gone. You didn't know it, but she put a spell on her so that she could eat a lot without getting sick, despite not knowing she was going to be the 1,000 visitor. Hermione's belly was really big now, her clothes couldn't hide her bellybutton. The owner smiled and walked over to her.

"You're finally done. Your belly is amazing. Though you are the 1,000 visitor, that's not why I let you eat all of that. I did it so I could see a large belly, they're my fetish. Yours though, it's bigger than any I have ever seen." The woman said. She climbed on Hermione's belly and started to rub it. Hermione didn't mind, she was happy she got to eat all of it. "With a belly like yours, you could eat a person.In fact . . " She looked over at you. You were still watching, unsure if this was real. The woman grinned and told you to follow her. You nodded, unsure of what she was planning. You walked over to Hermione first.

"I'll be back, just rest for now." You told her, she nodded and smiled. You gave her one final kiss before following the woman.

She took you to a back room. Before you could ask why she brought you here, so wing suddenly hit you, making you pass out. When you wake up, you feel weird. You can see a mirror. You look in it to see you were covered in sweetness. From head to toe, there was sugar. As for your outfit, you were only in your underwear. Your mouth was covered and your arms and legs were tied up.

"Don't you look tasty. You're perfect for her." The owner said, stepping into view. You struggled, causing her to laugh. "Don't try to escape, it's useless. I want to see her belly get bigger, so you'll have to do. Even if she recognizes you, I made sure you were irresistible. A human jellybean." She said. She grabbed you and brought you out to the main room where your friend was. When you saw her, you were very surprised. Even though her belly had not gotten smaller, she managed to stand up. Hermione was surprised to see you. "My faithful customer. I have brought you another piece of candy. Remember, it's free, so enjoy." She said.

Hermione slowly got over to you. She grabbed you and pulled you up over her belly to her face. You closed your eyes, worried of what she was about to do.

"Don't worry, do you really think I would harm you?" She whispered. You opened your eyes to see her sweet smile. "I have magic, remember? If I eat you, I can just teleport you out. I don't want to scare you though, so I may only taste you." She thinks for a minute. You trusted her no matter what decision she made.

You got out a recipe book and started the cake. It was a family recipe, so you knew that she never had this kind before. You put in all of the ingredients, including one special ingredient: broken bits of Oreo. You put it in the oven and waited for it to be done. You couldn't wait for her to try it.

As you waited, you got out a piece of paper and folded it. With your artistic ability, you made the front really beautiful. On the inside, on the right side, you drew a Beagle dog. You made sure that it was detailed. By the time you got done with the drawing, the cake was ready to be pulled out. You turned the oven off and set it on the table. You then frosted it and put the toppings on. You wrote in frosting on the top "Thanks for being my friend". You hoped she would love it. You went back to the card while it cooled down. You wrote a special message inside:

Dear Hermione,
Thank you for being there when I needed you. You are such a great friend and I was lucky to meet you. You're really beautiful and I want to return your kindness. I'm not sure how long you will be here, but while you are here, I want to treat you like a princess. Just ask for anything and I will listen and serve you. I'll be happy to do anything for you.

Though it may have sounded like you were exaggerating, you really weren't. You really did want to make her happy for helping you. You quietly went up to the bedroom she was in and set the cake down on the table. You set the card and utensils down next to it and left her quietly. You went downstairs and looked outside. You didn't know when your parents would be home from their vacation, but they probably wouldn't approve of you serving Hermione like how you have. For instance, your mother would probably be a little upset that you were her pet at one point.

You didn't care, as long as Hermione was happy. You also knew that Hermione might have to erase your memory because of what you have seen. That didn't matter to you though, if that was what she was most comfortable with, you would go along with it willing. You eventually got tired from watching outside, and fell asleep. When you woke up . . .

One woman even offered to buy you from her. Hermione declined. Though you didn't know it, it wasn't because you could talk or because you were human. She had another reason for keeping you.

Hermione walked through a forest. Though you were getting a little dirty, you didn't mind. If anything, you were falling asleep, her feet were that comfortable to you. You knew no one else was around you you told her you were sleepy.

"Go ahead and take a nap, I'll wake you when we get back. Don't be surprised if you wake up as a necklace or something." She said, and giggled. You eventually couldn't stay awake anymore. However, with everything that had happened, she wasn't sure she could do it anymore. You had been so nice to her, and you made her feel at home. Heck, you rarely complained about her actions, for instance she knew you liked being her shoes. Theoretically speaking, she didn't have to tell anyone about this, there might have been a chance that you could keep your memories. She decided to worry about it later.

She got back to the house and set you on the table. With a few magic words, she turned you into a human again, but the size of a toy. She picked you up and set you in her lap to sleep. Though you were older, she felt like your guardian. After an hour, you woke up to see . . .

13131211.content: Without a second thought(or as long as it normally took for Hermione to make a difficult decision)the giant magical witch slowly stood up and took one step forward as expected nearly everything from cars,mailboxes people's fences etc flew up into the air and crashed violently down "Oops!" Was all Hermione could whisper too bad her wand didn't grow with her otherwise she would have fixed this mess in a heatbeat though she still would have to bear the wraith of the entire Ministry of Magic later on "Okay,okay I can do this just small steps Hermione that's all nothing to it just imagine all of this is simply like taking a test in History of Magic or something...." She said to herself as she took another step forward then another each one causing far more destruction than the last but the third year simply closed her eyes blocking out the wrecked smushed Muggle cars,mailboxes even a few people's front lawns she crashed under her feet soon she came within inches of the nearby bustling Muggle city which one she had no idea there as she read were so many in America she hestitated for nearly a half hour having never been so nervous about anything in her life before noticing the tiny whirling Muggle helicopters hovering about in the outline of the unnamed city she knew by close observation and keen eyesight that they happen to be news copters no doubt a gigantic young girl from the Wizarding World was soon going to be splashed upon the newspapers of the world the Ministry of Magic has probably already gotten wind of her overuse of magic in a nonmagical suburban but it was too late to worry about that now she thought "Let what will happen later on go ahead and happen...besides once and if I get back to normal I can always erase everyone's mermories of this including the boy I befriended( she paused and looked towarded the bright neon lights of the tiny city below her most buildings reaching her waistline)now comes the ultimate test as long as I don't give away my true identity everything should be fine." As she took her first baby steps into the city at first the people going about their daily lives thought the small tremors were sonic booms from passing jets nothing to worry about but soon they grew louder and louder and once cars started to roll helplessly across the roads/streets,department store windows shattered or rattled and a few people fell over then the citizens realized this was no random quake nor was it a sonic boom as there were no jets or jet streamers in the sky to be seen "Hey what's going on?" One man cried out as the sky above suddenly grew pitch black then the huge shadow or silhouette of a human of some kind appeared several people screamed out loud as Hermione's pretty face and bushy hair appeared around one of the taller buildings for a while no one said anything to the monstrous young Hogwarts witch just stood there like fish out of bowls then Hermione managed a small smile whispering "Umm hello." As expected the crowds erupted into a full blown panic as people started racing down the street screaming and running while Hermione folded her arms grunted "Oh really? You try to be polite and as kind as you possibly can to the nonmagical popluation and this is the response I get? How rude......" Then she declared loudly "Mu.....I mean people please don't panic I won't hurt you please stop running!" "But no one of course paid any attention to her as anyway the sound of her voice was causing mere destruction windows would unexpectedly shatter even if she was nowhere near them and cars exploded into flames for no apparent reason "I SAID PLEASE STOP RUNNING!" She commanded getting a little annoyed but that only increased the fear and one woman screamed "Ahhhhhhh the monster's now even more angrier Run For Your Lives!" Hermione fumed once more "Monster? How dare they call me that! I may have grown quite a bit but that's no reason to...wait what was those series of old black and white films from the 1950s about gigantic creatures attacking the Muggle World...oh yeah Monster Movies or something...I could just say I was affected by that scientific radioactive stuff and no one would know the difference...." She was so busy within her own thoughts Hermione didn't see the traffic jam in front of her and accidentally tripped and fell backwards slipping on one of the fleeing cars KA-BOOOM! the impact of Hermione falling on her rear end might have been hilarious if Harry,Ron or Draco Malfoy had been there to witness it but for Hermione and the tiny people below it was horrifying fortunately she still had some control over her magic despite not in possession of her wand and maintained her balance and at least no one was seriously injured "Oh No Sorry!" She called down miserably from above "Are you all alright?" As people in their cars panicked as they saw a enormous hand slowly coming for them several tried fleeing but a few were gently scooped up by the giant witch "Sorry about that." She whispered "Are you all alright?" People didn't know what to say as most avoided looking into her soft brown eyes of grief,fear and sadness "They still don't trust me!" She thought more frustrated and annoyed than ever and in her moment of frustration Hermione didn't realize without her wand and her nerves shot her magic was getting a little out of control more cars would explode on the spot and things like office buildings and mailboxes would start leviating by themselves for no apparent reason "Great now my magic's out of control this day possibly couldn't get any worse!" She thought as she began carefully setting down cars and trucks on the undamaged parts of the road along with a few screaming people as she slowly stood up again

Hermione gets stars in her eyes as she notices all the fast food joints in front of her, "Wow.. I've never seen so much food!" She says with a sigh as she begins to drool. However as this happens some of it drops down on to the ground, "Hey watch where your drooling!" One of the bystanders shouts up at her.

This causes her to get back to her senses, "I'm sorry about that! I mean you no harm I'm just very hungry!" She shouts back as most of the bystanders do an anime face plant, The man that shouted before then says "How about we cut a deal, We feed you & in return you cause us no harm!"

She nods in response before she says "By the way, while I am able can I ask where my friend is?" The man responds back "Was he with you earlier?" Hermione nods as she says "Yes, I was with him before my magic went out of control & I grew to this size." The man nods as he says "We'll find your friend after we feed you okay?"

He asks as you step out of the crowd & make yourself known, "No need for that sir, I'm the friend she's looking for." You say as the man smiles, "Okay good! Now, let's get this girl something to eat!" The man declares as the crowd cheers before beginning to get food for your giant friend.

In the span of about 20 minutes the town is now out of food in fast food joints, Hermione however, now looks like a giant stuffed turkey as she rubs her tummy happily. Suddenly without warning your friend let's out a massive burp that shatters windows for miles, "Excuse me!" She says in embarrassment.

How does the crowd react?
1313121112.title: I've heard of stuffed turkey but stuffed witch?

131312112.content:
Three news helicopters flew around Hermione's head. The cameras scanned her entire body. One of them got closer and demanded to know why she was doing this.

"I didn't mean to hurt anyone. I'm just trying to get out of the way of everyone." She said. The helicopter kept asking questions and Hermione kept answering them. "I'm going to be here a while. I can already tell." She said, carefully not moving so she didn't harm anyone.

Meanwhile, you drove and followed the path of destruction, trying to catch up to her. You had an idea for her, but it would cause a little bit more destruction. When you got to her, she was standing as tall as ever. You could see the helicopters around her. You needed to get up to her ear, luckily, there was a building next to her that wasn't destroyed. You rode the elevator up to the top. When you stepped outside, her ear was close enough.

"For the last time, I didn't mean to hurt anyone!" Hermione said, getting frustrated. You yelled out her name. She turned and saw you. Her eyes widened, she couldn't believe that you were there next to her. She held out her hand, and you got on. When the helicopters questioned, you lied and said you were part of a secret military service, and that they needed to leave now so you could fix this mess. Without questioning, they flew away. They didn't leave completely, but they were far enough that you felt safe talking to Hermione. "Thank you. I'm sorry for everything." She said.

"Don't worry, but you asked me to give you your wand. However, I have a better idea." You pointed to a large light post and told her to pick it up. Hesitant at first, she picked it up with her other hand. You asked if that would work as a wand. She concentrated for a minute and confirmed.

"This will work for now. But where are we going to go?" She asked. You also thought of this.

"For now I'll tell you where to go. We'll head towards . . .
131312112.title: Getting Hermione under control

choices: They did back off, giving you a warning
They didn't leave, they didn't trust you
13131212.content:
Hermione decided to wait, she didn't want to cause trouble. She kept waiting and waiting, until it was finally night-time. It was pretty dark and you still hadn't returned. Hermione couldn't stand it anymore, she was really hungry. She decided that if you couldn't return, she might as well go off and find some food for herself.

She got up, and carefully walked towards the city. It was a good thing she waited so long, there was hardly anyone in the streets. She kneeled down and looked in a couple of houses to see sleeping people. She smiled.

"Perfect! Since Everyone is asleep, I'm sure they won't mind if I 'borrow' some food." She whispered. She quietly lifted up some roofs and started taking food. She took so much food, including entire fridges. At a couple of houses, some dogs started to bark at her. Although a little embarrassed, she was too hungry to stop. She ate everything she collected. Since it didn't fill up her belly, she kept searching.

Meanwhile, you finally got back to where your house used to be. It took you forever to find someone willing to give you a phone to use. You had made a couple of calls to your friends who said they would try to help if they could. When you got to your house, you noticed Hermione wasn't there.

"Oh no" was all you could say. You started running towards the city, hoping to catch up. You assumed it wouldn't be hard to find her, after all, she was the size of the building, you should be able to see her easily. However, that also meant others should be able to see her easily.

As predicted, the mayor had been taking a midnight walk and saw Hermione. He called the military and asked for help with the giantess. He explained everyone was asleep and pleaded that they take care of her quickly and quietly.

Hermione was laying on her side starting to chew on a tree. Though it wasn't human food, she had wondered if it would taste like a veggie to her, probably like a piece of broccoli. She didn't like the taste at all, she learned that her magic hadn't changed her taste buds much. She started to eat the human food she had collected, when soldiers arrived. Most of them were surprised that she was a young girl, just huge. The commander was out sick, so a regular soldier had been put in charge. Though he was a little frightened of her size, he was sure he could stop a child.

"You! Miss! We demand that you leave this place or else!" He commanded. Hermione dropped some bottles of soda into her mouth. She swallowed and frowned.

"I'm sorry, but am I doing something wrong? I'm not hurting anyone, am I?" She asked.

"Well no, but-" Suddenly, Hermione burped pretty loud. It shattered some windows, and caused a few people to wake up. Most people thought it was just a thunderstorm, despite the fact that there was broken glass now. Hermione burped again, making her embarrassed.

"Oh, I'm sorry! I couldn't help it." Suddenly, Hermione burped louder. This one traveled and hit neighboring cities, scaring a lot of people. She started getting so embarrassed, she started losing control of her magic again. The tanks that the army brought started floating in the air. Hermione and the others could hear the drivers yelling. Hermione tried focusing and getting control. When she concentrated, a few of the tanks floating fell back down.

"Alright, that's enough! We demand that you leave monster!" Hermione frowned. Not because she was causing trouble, but because she had just been called a monster. She roughly grabbed him and brought him to her face.

"Oh, so I'm a monster for making some mistakes, huh? So when a baby or a student makes a mistake, do you call them a monster?" She said. The soldier wasn't sure what to do. However, despite the fact that Hermione was annoyed, she put him down softly. Just when she thought the men would just leave her alone, they aimed their guns at her.

The soldier was about to give the signal, when you came out of nowhere and jumped on him. All of the soldiers stepped back, confused.

"Don't hurt her! Despite her size she's just a dumb child! She didn't mean harm!" You started yelling. Hermione was about to complain, but then kept her mouth closed for the time being. You got off the soldier, who looked pissed off, and apologized for the rough entrance.

"She's my . . . Daughter. I have been working on a machine to make food bigger to end world hunger, but then I accidentally hit her, she's my responsibility." You lied. You really hoped they would back off.
13131212.title: Patience doesn't last forever

choices: Asked her if she wanted to play a game
Asked her if she was ready for dessert
131312121.content:
"Very well, we'll let you fix this. However, if this happens again, we will have to take her away." He said. You nodded as they backed up. Unfortunately they didn't leave completely, they wanted to see what would happen. You looked at Hermione with a worried look, you weren't sure how to get her back to normal. However, though you didn't know it, as soon as you showed up, Hermione had been concentrating. After a moment of looking at her, Hermione shrunk down to her normal size.

She knew you still had her wand and asked for it back. When you gave it to her, the leader soldier stepped closer.

"Thank you for stopping her. However, I am curious as to what the device you mentioned looks like, can we see it?" He asked. You weren't sure what to do, but Hermione was already prepared for this.

"He can show you, but it's not very big, can all of you come closer?" Hermione asked. Without thinking, they all stepped up to the two of you. "Obliviate!" she said, waving her wand. From your perspective, it looked like they all suddenly became dizzy. However, once the leader got his balance back, he looked confused.

"Wait, where are we? What were we doing?" He asked. Hermione told him they had been sent to make sure everything was alright because someone reported an alien sighting. She also told them they did a fantastic job, and that they should go back now. They nodded and left. You couldn't believe that worked.

"Nicely done Hermione. I think everything will be alright now." You said, however, she wasn't very happy.

"What were you thinking? Calling me a dumb girl!? I could beat you in every written test given! Also, how dare you call me your daughter! Do you think I would have a parent like you? It would have been best just to call me your friend!" She stomped her foot. You were embarrassed.

"Well, I was just trying to help, and I didn't know what to say. I'm sorry." You started to back up, when she grabbed you and pulled you in. Without warning, she hugged you and kissed you on the lips. Now you were really confused. "Wait, aren't you mad at me?"

"Well I'm not happy that you called me your daughter or that you said I was dumb. However, I am happy that you did stop them. They were pretty scary." She kissed you again. You weren't sure what to say. She let go of you and smiled. "So hero, where shall we go? After all, I sort of destroyed your home by accident." She asked. You thought for a minute.

"Well I know of a winter home. Since it's Spring, no one should be there. It'll be perfect for now." You said.

"So . . . We'll be alone . . . Together?" She asked in a strange way. You nodded. You rode the bus to the building. When you got there, she saw that it was pretty big. You got the key from under the mat and allowed her inside. You showed her where everything was, including the bedroom she was going to use. You was happy and got comfortable in bed. You went to make dinner for the two of you. Though there wasn't much food now, there was enough to get you through the night. You would be able to buy more tomorrow.

Once you finished, you were called by Hermione. You went to check on her to see she seemed to be struggling with something.

"I can't get my shoe off, can you help me?" You were a little confused, you thought she would be able to do it. Despite this, you helped her. Unfortunately it was a trap! When you went for her foot, she pulled you in again. She rubbed your head. "Mm, you smell nice. Can you believe it though? We get to be alone for a while." She said. You had a feeling you knew where this was going. You told her that dinner was ready. You gave her a ride to the kitchen, she was having fun. The two of you sat down and started to eat.

You couldn't help but notice, Hermione kept looking at you. When she thought you couldn't see her, she looked at you and licked her lips.

"This food is really good! It tastes pretty sweet, but you know, this isn't the only thing that's sweet." You weren't sure what she meant, until she winked at you. Once the two of you were done, you . . .
131312121.title: A reward for helping her?

choices: Said she knew what it was
1313121211.content:
"So did you want to play a game or something Hermione?" You shyly asked but she shook her head

"Well I'd but I have thought I had...." She said with a grin you looked bewildered

"You did when?" Her grin grew wider

"Just now silly of course! When you were carrying me to the kichten riding piggyback!" You were a bit bewildered yourself

""Oh that it doesn't really count as a game though it was more of a fun task...." You said not sure what you were saying but the young witch frowned

"Well it was to me! To tell you the truth I haven't felt this way in quite a while it's a bit odd me of all people having fun like this! Normally I would be stuck at the library poring over thousands of books or doing homework(she was of course referring to her daily routine at Hogwarts which was basically true she spent so much time studying like a maniac one wondered how anyone with a pretty face and brains like hers could even manage to have any sense of fun but she was certainly having the time of her life now) but if you insist then I do have a game in mind I want to play...."

"Yeah? What is it? Hide and seek,Tag?" You suggested she shook her head

"Those are very good suggestions but no I have something else in mind and yes I'm going to use magic but just a bit I'm still ever careful in case I get a bit too out of control now I won't be doing anything that will cause you harm.....okay? I already think I caused enough trouble for that alright now are you ready?" She asked raising her wand as you nodded you went to eat another handful of chips and immediately felt a sharp throbbing pain in the left side of your mouth

"Owwwww!" You moaned grabbing your cheekbone Hermione froze instantly

"Oh are you alright? What's wrong?" You struggled to speak despite the burning pain in your mouth

"I-I'm not sure my mouth or rather I think one of my teeth is loose or else....oh yeah that's it.....Owwwwwwwww whatever it is it hurts like crazy!" You groan holding your mouth Hermione leaned closer as she gently grabbed hold of your face

"Let me see the inside of your mouth say Ahhhhhhhhhhh!" She instructed you did as she ordered and to your surprise she pointed her wand towards the inside of your mouth and muttered under her breath "Lumos!!" At once a bright light burst from the wand's tip(although she could get into further trouble with the Ministry for this Hermione was more concerned for her new friend's mouth pains than her own worries) and she shined it deep inside your mouth looking around until she spotted the root of the problem (no pun intended) "Hmmmmm well judging from my own experiences of watching my parents at their ordinary nonmagical job,they're dentists by the way I'd say you have a cavity and a rather big one at that!" She looked a bit alarmed but she wasn't the only one

"A cavity?" You choked out "That's highly unlikely I take extra care of my teeth I never had a cavity or problems with my teeth in all my life.....oh well I guess there's a first time for everything....I'll just go ahead and schedule a appointment with the dentist in the morning....." But the 13 year old witch shook her head

"Nonsense! You keep forgetting I'm a witch and can do magic and in gratitude for all the kindness you shown to me I'll do you the favor of ridding yourself of this cavity!" Once more you were shocked

"You...you think that's a good idea...." She shook her head again leaning ever closer you could practically see every single curl on her brown bushy hair and the dark oak brown of her eyes

"What the Ministry doesn't know won't hurt them and besides you're my new friend I can't stand seeing you in such distress pain! Luckily I think I know the correct spell to mend a broken tooth or at least I hope I do..... Hang on for a bit while I think about it I didn't bring any books with me." As you waited the throbbing in your mouth got ever more painful you kind of wished she'd hurry up and find the blasted spell already finally she turned back to you and.....
1313121211.title: Asked her if she wanted to play a game

She rolled over and told you to get to her bellybutton
1313122.content:
Hermione's body towers over you. If you wanted to, you could have walked under her robe to see her underwear. You're not a pervert though, so you wait to see what she does. She's surprised to see how small she made you, but then smiles. She carefully grabs you and sits down.

I didn't mean to do this, but this works out great! Now you have to speak, if you don't, I can't guarantee that you'll be safe." She said, ready to twist your arm. "Tell me, how do you know who I am?" You knew she had complete control over the situation. You decided to tell her the truth. You pointed over to your desk. On it was a Harry Potter book. Still holding onto you, she walked over and opened the book. She skimmed through it. You tried to explain the real truth, afraid that she would think you're lying. You were surprised when she didn't say anything.

"Aren't you going to hurt me? You must think I'm lying." You said. She shook her head.

"No, I can see you're telling the truth. The evidence is here in this book, but that still doesn't explain how I got here." You tried to tell her about the portal. After a minute of thinking, Hermione had an idea. "I think I know what this 'portal' was. What I learned in class was a mysterious portal opens in different places in the world. It's rare and said to be caused by a deity. Besides that, not much is known about it, and few have witnessed it, or returned from it."

"But why did it grab you?"

"Well maybe it was like a sacrifice. After all, in stories, some gods need offerings, right?"

"So they chose a beautiful lady like you?" You said, causing Hermione to blush. "Well now that we have that figured out, how about you change me back." She shook her head.

"I also need an offering. You can offer me your service." You started to struggle. "Look, you can either be willing and be treated like a pet and be rewarded, or be unwilling and be treated like a slave and get punishments. What will it be?" She made a valid argument. You stopped struggling, making her happy. "Good, don't worry, we can learn to be friends. But for now, my butt needs to be rubbed."

She took off her robe revealing her underwear layer. Hermione laid down on the couch and chucked you behind her. You landed on your butt. You were a little confused, you couldn't believe she was asking you to get this close this fast. You eagerly started to rub and lick her. She could feel you and laughed.

"Told you you would have fun!" You continue to work hard until . . .

13131222.content:
Hermione suddenly rolled over. Since you weren't expecting this, you were crushed under her butt. You struggled to get out. After a few minutes, you managed to get onto her belly. She told you to hop inside her bellybutton. As soon as you followed instructions, Hermione used her magic to seal you inside. The opening of her bellybutton closed up, making the only doorway disappear.

"If you want out, you'll have to work for it. Tickle me as much as you can, if you don't, you are probably going to be in there for a very long time." Hermione told you. You decided to get to work. You start rubbing the ground, trying to make her laugh. After a minute, Hermione started to get impatient. "Is that the best you got? Try harder? Or is it that you want to live in by bellybutton forever? I can keep you there for all eternity, is that what you want?" You didn't see that as a bad idea. Still, you wanted to please her, so you went to the walls and tickled as hard as you could.

You tried using both your hands and your feet. Hermione started to laugh. She couldn't contain it and laughed as loud as she could. Some people outside looked in, a little confused. To tickle her even more, you started to lick her. To her, you were now a tickling machine. However, Hermione was starting to lose control of more than just her laugh. Objects on shells started to fall off. In the kitchen, the cupboards flung open. Hermione didn't realize her magic was doing this. She just kept laughing as if nothing ever happened.

After tickling her for a while, you started to get tired. You fell down, unable to really tickle her. Her laugh soon came to a stop, but she didn't care. She had lots of fun. As her bellybutton opened, she suddenly noticed the destruction that she caused. Her face turned red, and was worried about what you would say if you saw it. She grabbed you, rolled over and made it so you couldn't see your house.

"Hey, how would you like to take a nap?" She asked. You shook your head and struggled to get free. Without warning, you became loose and fell to the floor. You looked around to see the house was a mess. "PLEASE DON'T BE MAD AT ME," she pleaded. She started to cry, she didn't mean for this to happen. You climbed up and told her it was alright. The place always gets this messy somehow. She wipe the tears away and lifted you up. "Really? You . . Forgive me?" She asked. You nodded.

"However, I think you can do something to make it up." You said. She was all ears. You told her . . .

1431212.content:
You arced your left eyebrow in confusion. “Charlie, what are you-”

“*BBBEELLLLLCCCHHHHH!*” Without even sucking down air, Charlie unleashed a burp powerful enough to ripple her lips. It lasted two seconds, but its loudness drowned out the show on TV. You flinch as the scent of Big Macs, French Fries, and Diet Coke ejected from her gob and into your nostrils, at which the 8-year old giggled.

“Excuse me!” Charlie apologized sarcastically. “Sorry Willy, I just couldn't resist!”

You attempt to fan away the smelly smog. “It’s alright. I’m surprised that you could do that, though.”

“Girls can burp too, you know,” Charlie smirked and folded her arms. “But I doubt many of them can do this.”

Now, Charlene began to swallow air. She took exaggerated gasps to fill her belly with as much oxygen as possible. After several seconds, she stop inhaling and concaved her stomach, forcing out an expectedly epic eructation. However, Charlie added a twist to make it even more so.

“*BBBUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPP!*”{/ size} A plume of orange flame roared out of her mouth like a small dragon. Thankfully, though only a foot away, you are not met with a burning burp to the face, but you can still feel the heat of it. This belch possessed the same loudness, length, and smell, though now the aroma of incinerated oxygen filled the air around you two as well. Even Charlie pinched her nose along with you, but her satisfied grin implied that she was still enjoying it.

“Ew, that stunk.” She chuckled. “I can’t believe that I did that!”

“Me neither.” You deadpan.

Charlie put her hands on her hips. “I think I can top it, though, but I’ll need some help first.” Seeking fuel for her fire, she walked over to a table and grabbed an untouched cup of Pepsi. The pyrokinetic slurped the cold bubbly liquid through the straw, laughing as it splashed on her tongue and tickled her taste buds. Eventually, Charlie drained the plastic cup of its content and rubbed her even fuller tummy, which pressed out against her dark blue leotard. She walked out to the back porch of your house and motioned for you to follow her. You complied readily, wishing to avoid setting the house’s interior afire. Once you were both outside, her face contorted into an expression of concentration as she proceeded to repeat the process of swallowing precious oxygen to aid in stoking the literal/proverbial fire in her belly. A minute passed and Charlie smiled, indicating that it was time.

The little girl relaxed her throat, straightened her back, caved in her abdomen, cranked her head upward, and forced out her third blazing belch for the evening. “*HHHHHHHHHHOOOOOOOOOOOUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPP PPPPPPPPPP!*” For seven suspenseful seconds, Charlie’s charring burp exited her mouth as a crimson stream of plasma, similar to Godzilla’s atomic breath. The inferno shot into the air, illuminating part of the ebony night sky. Her burp’s loudness forced you to cover your ears and the odor was somehow even fouler than her previous eruptions. Despite this, you look on with widened eyes at the mesmerizing sight of her fiery blast. When the eructation ended, Charlie took a few seconds to catch her breath. “Phew! Even I was sure that I could do it.”

“Wow…” You said with a slacked jaw.

Charlie took notice of this and giggled. “Thanks. I’m glad that you liked it.”

‘Aw, look at her. She’s acting so happy just because she can burp like a cow,’ You thought. ‘I suppose some immature behavior is understandable, given everything that she went through.’ You soon regained your composure and spoke to her appropriately. “You seem to have a lid on your powers.”

“I guess so.”

“So, what do you want to do, now?” You asked.

Charlie pondered her next choice and made her decision.

Charlie turned to go find more food. Before she started moving, you quickly jumped on her foot. It didn't smell great, but it would have to do. Charlie kept stomping through until she saw a beautiful sight: a farmer's market. Everyone screamed and ran away. It didn't matter to her, it just meant she would get more food. She started grabbing everything and threw it in her mouth. You jumped off and ran in front of her.

"Charlie stop!" You yelled. You didn't want her to eat everything in the city, that would make people mad. You stopped next to some carrots and waved at her. You got excited when she turned towards you. At first, you thought she heard you, but then noticed that her face said otherwise. Her giant hand grabbed you and the carrots. You got terrified, she was about to chew you up without realizing it.

You watched her other hand drop tomatoes in her mouth. She grinded them up and swallowed. You were next. She raised you above her mouth and opened wide. Though you yelled, she was oblivious of your presence. She let go, making you and the carrots fall towards her mouth. You got a great look at where you were headed. You closed your eyes, fearing the worst. Thankfully, luck was on your side this time. You hit her lip and fell down her shirt.

You quickly grabbed her shirt to stop the fall. After a moment of calming down, you looked around to see where you landed. You were right at her exposed belly button, hanging on to the edge of the shirt where you had cut previously. You could feel the vibrations of her chewing up her food. Charlie's stomach was also growling from all of the food it was getting. You shuddered to think about how close you were to being on the other side, whether in pieces or whole.

Charlie kept searching for food after she cleared the farmers market. You shook with every step she took. You looked down to see her giant feet moving and leaving bus sized craters. You could try to climb down when she stopped, but you really didn't want to get that close to her mouth again without her knowing. You could try going up, but it may be harder. After a few minutes, you decide to risk going up. You took a deep breath and started to climb.

As you were doing this, Charlie sat down to take a breather. Eating all of that food had made her tired. She went to rub her satisfied stomach, when she accidentally put her hand on you. Charlie jerked her hand back immediately, and looked down. When she saw you, she was both happy and a little upset. She grabbed you and brought you up to her face.

"May I ask why you're trying to climb my body without telling me?" She said. You explained how she almost ate you and that you were trying to get her attention.

"I wasn't trying to invade your personal space. Honestly!" You say.

"Very well, but you better make it up to me" She said.

You started to rub her feet. It wasn't as bad as you thought it would be. Yes her feet didn't smell good, but they were soft. After a couple of hours of rubbing her feet, she finally forgave you. Charlie gave a big yawn. Today had been a long day so you told her to get some sleep. Charlie nodded and stretched her arms. Charlie laid her back down on the soft grass. As soon as the sun disappeared, she fell fast asleep. You found a cozy spot yourself and also went to bed.

That night, you had a nightmare. Charlie held onto you like a banana and licked her lips. You begged her to let you go, however she simply rubbed her belly. You couldn't tell if it was because she couldn't hear you or didn't care. Charlie shoved you in her mouth. The light was quickly fading. Before you could yell, she chomped your legs off. Charlie swallowed, causing you to end up in her stomach, but one problem. It wasn't her stomach. You landed on some sort of conveyor belt in some sort of realm. You looked ahead to see a crusher. As the conveyor belt moved, metal was crushed into pancake sized, and soon you would be next. You also saw Charlie with an evil grin. You screamed, wishing you could move. The crusher was now over you. It came down, ready to claim it's victim when . . .

You woke up. The sun was starting to come up. You looked over at Charlie to see she was still calmly asleep. You took a deep breath, there wasn't anything to worry about. She was your friend, she wouldn't harm you on purpose. You climbed on her belly. It was scary to think how close you were to being inside it. You crawled up to her innocent face. You sat there, just watching her. You thought everything was fine, until Charlie started to make a noise.

"Ah . . Ah . . " she said. You were confused a little. "ACHOO," Charlie sneezed, causing you to fly back. You fell into her shirt and rolled down her chest. You tried to stop yourself, but you were just moving too fast. As you rolled, you wondered where you were about to end up. When you finally stop, there isn't much room to move. Your body was on something soft. As you felt it, trying to identify it, you heard Charlie moan. After thinking for a second, your face suddenly gets bright red. With her moaning, there was only one place you could possibly be.

There was no doubt about it, you were next to her vagina. Considering how she felt after she found you on her belly, you didn't want to know how she would react if she found you. Despite this, you struggled and screamed, trying to get her attention. Being shamed was better than being crushed in a lady's private spot. The good news was that Charlie woke up. The bad news was that she had no idea you were there. The worst news was you were only tickling her.

Charlie put her hands down between her legs. She started to laugh and squirm. Charlie knew it was coming from her most secret spot, but she didn't know what was going on. Some of the buildings collapsed from her laughing. She was so busy having fun, she didn't realize the military came. However, they couldn't hit her because they couldn't stay still long enough. Tanks were moving slowly. A lot of the guns were fen crushed under the wheels. However, the worst was yet to come.

You were basically fueling her power. Charlie begged to stop, despite the fact she didn't know who she was talking to, making her lose more control over herself. Fire started to light up around the giantess. When the general saw this, he immediately ordered all troops to fall back. Just as the last one ran away, the fire caused the tanks to explode. There was fire everywhere, and Charlie didn't even know it yet.

You eventually gave up and waited. When you did this, Charlie was able to reach down and grab you. She pulled you out and looked at you. Suddenly, fear consumed her face.

"What! What Why were you there!" She said, turning red. Believe it or not, you were the one who burst into tears first. You told her about your nightmare and that you just wanted to get closer to her for safety when you flew back down there. You didn't mean to invade her personal space, but no matter what, things kept ending up that way. Charlie looked around to see all of the fire she started. Despite being afraid of her power, she decided to try and fix things instead of hating herself for what she did.

She calmly set you down and told you she would be back. Charlie walked over to the lake and filled her mouth with water. She got up and sprayed it over all of the fire, putting it all out. Once that was done, all that remained was you. She walked back over to you and picked you up. You were terrified that she didn't want to be your friend anymore. However, Charlie brought you closer to her and hugged you.

"I'm sorry I scared you. Please don't cry, I forgive you. It was an accident. Besides, you have helped me also." You looked up, a little confused. "Look around. I was able to fix my mistakes, . . . In a way. I'm not as afraid of my powers as I used to be." She said, trying to calm you down. "Tell you what . . .

Jasmine looks at the mirror and fixes it a little to see the back window. She then looks at the other mirrors outside of the car and seems fine to her.

Jasmine nodded and pulled the handle to R for a reverse.

Jasmine kisses and rubs you. For the final move, her hair wraps around you. It keeps wrapping you until you're basically in a cocoon. Jasmine steps out of the cage with you still in her hair. "You'll be with me forever. You will never escape." Jasmine said and returned into the darkness.

You suddenly woke up. You look around to see Jasmine still asleep. The clock says it's 9:10 in the morning. You head for the kitchen so that you can make breakfast for Jasmine. With the tools you have, you make waffles for her. You bring it up with syrup to her. You quietly wake her up, hoping she'll enjoy it. When she opens her eyes, she sees you with the plate.

"Is . . This for me?" She asks.

"Of course. Go ahead and enjoy it." You say. She takes it and Puts syrup on it. The princess then slowly tries a piece. You watch her chew it up and swallow. "Well? Is it good?" Suddenly, her eyes light up.

"It's so good! I must have more!" She says and eats quicker. Once she ate one waffle, you stop her because you have an idea.

"Hey princess, if you want, I can feed you. I know you're an adult, but maybe it'll be fun." You say. Princess Jasmine decides . . .
1441322212212222.title: A nice morning for the princess

144132222.content:
You quietly listen when she stops talking. You wait for a moment until the door suddenly swings open and Jasmine jumps into you. You're caught off guard by this and fall down, leaving the princess on you.

"Were you spying on me?" She asked, smiling. You quickly shook her head, causing her to giggle. "I've decided to stay with you even if the portal comes back. I have much more freedom, plus someone who is willing to help me learn about the world."

"Are you sure?" You ask. She nods and helps you up. "Well, if that's what you want, then I can't stop you. Anyway, is there anything you want to do right now, or can I get you something?"

"Right now, I just want some sleep, but can you bring me a big glass of warm milk?" She asks. You nod and head for the kitchen. You quickly warm up some milk and bring it to her. Once you get to the bedroom, you notice she's only wearing a bra and panties.

"Wow, you look. . . Amazing." You say. She giggles and takes the glass.

"Thanks, I bet you look nice underneath those clothes too." She says, making you embarrassed. She laughs when she sees your reaction and starts drinking the milk. She keeps drinking until there isn't any left. You're surprised at how much she drank without stopping. Princess Jasmine lays down and yawns. "Thank you, but can you leave me for now? I want some sleep, and I don't want to be disturbed." She says quietly and closes her eyes. You nod and leave the room, silently closing the door. You head to your bedroom and climb in bed. You had a feeling your parents might return tomorrow afternoon, so you would need to get the princess ready by then.

The next morning, you wake up slowly. You look in your bedroom to see . . .
