144311211.content:
The woman, who you recognize as Chell immediately, collapses onto the floor. As the portal stays open, you quickly go to help her when you notice a strange necklace on her. You're not sure why, but it's as if some force is telling you to grab it. Your hand gets closer to it when Chell starts to stir.

You start to help her up when she suddenly grabs you tightly. Her eyes open to reveal them glowing, Chell doesn't look happy either. Chell pins you down, and it looks like she's about to hurt you. You struggle until you notice her necklace is glowing the same color as her eyes. You have a hard time reaching for it. When your fingers wrap around it, Chell immediately looks scared.

"NO! WHAT ARE YOU DOING HUMAN?!" Chell yells in a twisted voice. You pull on the necklace until it snaps off, causing Chell to fall backwards. She looks more terrified than ever. "Please . . Help . . .me" Chell weakly says in her normal voice. You're determined to help her, and you can tell it has something to do with this necklace. It has a shining emerald in the middle. You take into your garage. Chell follows behind, trying to get it back. You quickly throw the necklace on a table and grab a hammer. You smash the emerald as hard as you can. "NOOOO! MY VESSEL!" Chell yells in her twisted voice. A puff of smoke exits Chell's mouth and rises into the air. Suddenly, you can hear a high pitch noise. It's so loud it shatters all of the windows in the surrounding area. A bright light appears where the smoke was, filling the whole room. Then, both the light and the smoke vanish completely. The pieces of the emerald have turned dark.

You look over at Chell who has passed out on the ground. You walk over to her and pick her up. You take her upstairs to your bedroom and get her cozy. She looks tired so you leave her to get some rest. While she does that, you take the pieces of the gem and drive straight to the dump. You get out and chuck the fragments into a pile of garbage. They would never hurt anyone again, you knew it too since something was connected to it. You drive home and check on Chell. You get to her just in time to see her wake up. This time however, her eyes were normal.

"Where . . Am. . . I? What . . Is . ." She starts to say, however, you walk up to her and told her to just get some rest, she was safe now. "So . . . That demon . . . Is gone . . For good?" She asked. You nodded. "Thank you." Chell was starting to tear up now. You got her to lay back down and told her to get sleep, the two of you would talk in the morning.

You went and slept on the couch. Though you weren't used to it, you knew Chell deserved her bed more. You put a hand to your neck. To think she almost chocked you tonight, it scared you a little. You decided not to worry and go to sleep. When you wake up, . . .
144311211.title: A girl in need of help

choices: Skip to when you've gotten back home
1443112111.content:
When you woke up, you saw Chell waiting for you. "I want to thank you again for stopping that monster," she says before kissing you. "Are you..." she begins to ask... "I'm only human," you answered. She then looks around with a bit of curiosity and asks, "What is all this stuff?" "I could give you a tour of the place later, but there's a few things I need to do first," you explained. "Like what?" she asks. "Well, I only have that one bed, so I might have to look into another one for you. You also only have those clothes on your back, so we probably should get you some stuff while we're out. I'll let you borrow some of mine while we're out as wearing those might not be the best idea," you explained. "Okay, so when can we go?" Chell asks. "I was going to fix something to eat first, then I'll help you pick out some clothes to wear, then let you get dressed,"

You fix some pancakes for breakfast. Chell was a bit curious about what you were fixing at first, but you told her to simply have a seat at the table so you could talk while you fixed breakfast. "I don't think I've properly introduced myself yet. My name's Alex," you tell her. "I'm Chell," she replies. "Will I enjoy what you're fixing, Alex?" she asks. "I'm hoping so," you answer. "If I enjoy this, will you teach me how to fix it?" Chell asks. "If I get a chance, sure," you answer. About a few minutes later, you had a few pancakes done for both of you. You put them on a couple of plates, then pour syrup on them and get you both some silverware. It turns out you were right. Chell did enjoy them.

Afterwards, you clean up and take Chell up to your room. You made sure to get your wallet, car key, and phone. "What exactly were those things you picked up?" Chell asked. "How I'm going to pay for everything, how we're going to travel, and something I keep around that can be very useful," you tell her. You then open your dresser and pick out some clothes for you and her. "I'll get dressed elsewhere and let you change your clothes in here," You tell her. You then take your clothes to the bathroom and get dressed in there. You decide to brush your teeth while you were in there. Afterwards, you head back to your room and knock on the door. Chell has changed her clothes. "Hold on, I've one more thing I should probably do before we go," you tell her. You then take the laundry down to the laundry room so you'll remember to clean them later.

As you got back to your room, you take Chell to your car and help her buckle up her seatbelt and explained why it was important. You then got into the driver's seat yourself and started up the engine.

144312122222222222222211.content:
A pink object about the size of your hand came flying out of a portal, landing a few metres/feet from you. Honestly, due to its size, it was pretty hard to tell what exactly came out of the floating portal, especially when you compare the magnitude in area of the portal to that tiny thing.

You were intrigued for a moment and decided to step closer, taking a better look. You stared at the object on the ground, making it out to be a pink female Troll doll except slightly cuter and... somewhat alive? You swore you saw it breathing a second ago!

Rubbing your eyes, hopefully hallucinating it, you proceed to pick her up gently but the moment the doll was on your hand, you felt the warmness of the object, almost dropping it on the ground out of shock and fear. She was definitely alive and real; sleeping soundly after likely being knocked out into unconsciousness from the portal. You look at her sweet innocent smile,

You slowly walk up the stairs to your room, where you place her in your bedroom, on a soft pillow.

An hour has passed since the portal spewed her out and within that time, you know that she looked a lot similar to Poppy from the Trolls movie you saw a few days ago with your friend. Making preparations, you brought some rainbow candy strips with you, in case she woke up hungry.

144321121.content:
You jump for a moment as you hear a thud coming from the living room, "What could that be?" You ask yourself as you go to investigate, however what you find is something you would never have expected. You gasp in shock as you notice a young girl who in your opinion looks too be about 16 laying at the foot of the couch! You decide to see if you can get a response out of this girl. "Hey are you okay?" You ask as you shake her a little, however all this gets out of her is a mixture of a groan and a moan of what you would assume to be pain!

Seeing this, you spring in to action, picking the girl up after you warn her to hold still. You lay her down on your bed as carefully as you can as to not cause more harm to her before going to the hall bathroom to grab the first aid kit. As you work on getting the girl's green princess like dress off you notice that her back and arms are covered in scratches and what (if you had to guess) seems to be claw marks, and some of them seem fresh!

(Man! Did this girl get into a fight with a bear?) You ask yourself in your head as you begin working on patching the girl up, at that moment the girl suddenly regains consciousness and on instinct begins to scream in to one of the pillows on your bed! She kept it up for about 10 minutes til she passed out and you could finish up. After that you drape the covers over the girl and leave her to her sleep. As you go into the living room one of your pet wolves/dogs goes over to you and begins nuzzling you.

*giggle* "I love you too Ammy.." You say trailing off as you head into the kitchen, "So where's your brother?" You ask Ammy as you grab a can of food for her and her brother, she barks in response as she glances at the door leading to the front porch. "Oh he's still guarding the house huh? Well let him know he can come in for dinner. Then we'll go to bed." You say as you pour some food into Ammy's bowl and her brother's Ammy barks in response as she goes to get her brother.

As you grab a pillow for yourself and the quilt off of the couch you think to yourself (Wait a second the girl I found is princess Merida from the movie Brave! Hmm, I wonder how she ended up here? I'll have to ask her tomorrow.) With that you fall asleep. The next morning...

(A/N: Before anyone asks yes the Ammy in this story is supposed to be Amaterasu from Okami and her brother is my own character he's named Amateraku and he has black fur and blue tattoo's and is the opposite of Amaterasu so if Amaterasu is the sun wolf, Amateraku or Raku for short is the wolf of the moon)
144321121.title: Meeting a very brave Scottish princess

1443211211.content:
As you wake up the next morning you glance around and find yourself in the living room of your house, (What am I doing sleeping on the couch?) You think to yourself for a moment before you happen to remember just what happened and who it was that showed up last night, "Oh yeah I wonder if she's doing any better?" You ask yourself as you glance down the hall where your bedroom is and notice the door still shut, your about to go check on her, but you remember the state you found her in last night and think (Better not she needs time to rest and recover)

Having made up your mind you decide to fix the quilt and put in back on top of the couch, After that you go ahead and start making breakfast, dog food & water for Ammy and Raku and bacon, eggs(Scrambled) sausage, grits and milk for yourself and Merida if she comes to. As your working on breakfast you hear a familiar groan from outside the kitchen, *Groan* "Where the heck is this place and Who are you??" Not having to look to know who that was, you focus on cooking as you say "Ah, my name is Jack and your in my house. But that's not important right now, Are you feeling better? You were covered in scratches when you showed up here last night and all."

Merida raises an eyebrow for a second at the mention of scratches but doesn't dwell on it for long as she says "Yes much better thank you Jack." A look of realization crosses Merida's face suddenly as she says "Oh! Where are my manners, I already know your name and I haven't even told you mine. I'm Merida the royal princess of the land of DunBroch." Merida says in a hurry as you nod in response chuckling, "That's no problem Merida. I would offer a handshake but as you can tell I'm busy with making breakfast."

At the mention of food Merida licks her lips, you chuckle at that. "I take it you would like some?" As a response Merida..

14513.content: As she was standing there eyebrows raised,lips pouted and arms crossed you merely gibbered wordlessly clearly enchanted by her beauty Rose asked "Well aren't you going to speak or shall I find someone who can? It's very rude to remain silent when someone is talking to you." Your throat finally becomes unstuck so and your mouth dry so you can form actual words "Yeah sorry about that it's just that I was...was.. mesmerized...by.." You couldn't finish and she quizzed your true motives "Yes? You were mesmerized by what? It wouldn't be me by any chance would it?" Forced to fully answer you slowly nod as you expect her to get mad and storm away or perhaps slap you in disgust but to your surprise Rose does neither instead there is a small smile playing about her face "Well that's not surprising as most men are quite taken by my beauty and intellect I still have no idea where I am but for the time being I will introduce myself to you(she sticks out her arm to you)I'm Rose Dewitt Bukater and whom may I ask do I have the honor of addressing?" She asked politely you tell her your name and she shakes your hand "Well Willy it's a honor to meet someone as pleasant as you but I really must be getting back you see I'm due to board the R.M.S Titanic,one of the grandest ships known to man first thing tomorrow along with my mother and fiance and sorry to cut introductions short but if you could be so kind to direct me to the nearest.." You shake your head clearly she didn't have a clue did she that she just been transported through space and time in a world she couldn't begin to understand "Yeah about that Ms. Bukater but I'm afraid you won't be able to make it back in time to the Titanic." Her eyebrows narrowed and her lips pursed as expected as she asked "And why is that?" You swallowed hard wondering how you were going to break it to her "Because..because look you fell through a portal right into my living room so it would be practically impossible for you to get back as you are in a entirely different timeline." "Can you please explain to me what exactly you mean?" She asked you gestured her to take a seat in the nearest chair she does as you sit on the couch "Okay how to explain I really don't know where to begin you see this swirling thing called a portal or vortex appeared in my living room where we are now and I have no earthly idea how to explain this..." You groan this was far harder than you thought Rose urged you calmly "Try your best and take it slow do you know where this vortex thing came from?" You shake your head "No not a clue it just appeared out of nowhere but wherever it came from must have affected the space-time continuum in other words Ms. Bukater(she asked you to simply call her Rose from now on)sorry Rose it apparently affected you too whatever you were doing wherever you were you must have seen it and were both fascinated and bewildered by what you were seeing and it must have pulled you through to here." Though you expect her to ask a thousand questions Rose nodded apparently she understood everything "So it pulled me into your world or more specifically into your living room how do I get back?" "I wish I knew Rose I would help you get back if I could but in the meantime if you desire a place to stay and some company I would be more than happy to offer you shelter." You stand up as does she giving you a full smile then offers her hand "That's very generous of you Willy I would very much like to stay here until and if I get back so what is all this? What are all these things?" She looks around in awe from the widescreen TV,to the surround sound system,your laptop and cellphone on the table next to her "I'll have to explain them all to you as this is the year 2016 you have a lot catching up to do Ms. Rose but first are you tired or hungry by any chance?" She shakes her head "No neither but I am ever curious about this year you say it's 2016 I find that hard to believe then again..." As she takes a closer look at the modern things around her then back to you "Could you show me more of this modern era you call 2016? Starting with..."
14513.title: You finally get the urge to speak properly

How astonishing! How did it do that?" "Its controlled by a satellite in space television has been around since the..." You feel stupid to what you're saying as she seems even more confused so you take the short route "Look I'll explain the whole process of television later basically they are moving images on a screen shall we head into the kitchen?" Rose shakes her head "Not just yet you didn't tell me what this small thing is called." She picked up your cellphone lying on the table examining it with intense curiosity "It's a smaller version of what you know as a telephone but a lot more advanced we still use phones to call people as well as a bunch of other things I'll explain more on that as well anything else you want to know about while we're still in the living room?" She nods "Yes explain what this odd thing is on your table." She gestures to your laptop and you carefully explain what it is and what it does turning it on and showing her the main screen as well as typing out her name and showing her own image on the webcam Rose's whole jaw dropped "How incredibly fascinating! I never knew such amazing things existed mind if I try?" As she sits down to type out random things on the screen once you show her how just for fun before typing out your name and beaming at you then she stands up "Well I'm finished shall we go into your kitchen now?" She offers her arm to you as you escort her into the small kitchen and she is beyond fascinated by how the refrigerator,stove,microwave and freezer operates examining each in turn before asking you to show her how each works then you show her into the bathroom,your bedroom and guest room where she will be staying finally Rose appears to be satisfied "Well that was a interesting little tour you showed me Willy and I do thank you for your tremedous generosity so to show my grad..." You shake your head "You don't have to thank me Rose...Its my pleasure to ser.." "Don't tell me what I can and can't do!" She snapped annoyed obliviously she wasn't one for being rudely interrupted "I actually want to thank you Willy for your kindness." As she reaches into one of her dress pockets you're sure for her purse "With what money?" You ask a bit too eagerly she raised a eyebrow then laughed merrily "If I could I would but no I have something else in mind..." As indeed she does pull out her incredibly small change purse but it's not money she pulls out but a tube of lipstick after a few minutes of adding a slick of lipstick onto her cherry lips then slowly steps in front of you puckering up her lips "No with this." And kisses you on the cheek you blush furiously as she smiles "You deserved that for your kindness towards me and now I'd like to ask you a personal question if you don't mind." "Oh yes please! That is if you don't mind I'd love one!" And tenderly took your hand into her own where were you planning to take her first?
15212.title: Sansa Stark

choices: To the laundry room I'll show you how the machines work.
To the outside where I'll show you the car.
To the kitchen,you might be hungry after all.
152122.content:
"Let's just stay in the living room for now and I'll show you around here." You suggested to the very pretty ginger haired girl in her late teens from the fictional world of Westros as she nodded.

"Oh alright. Please tell me what that square thing is on the wall over there?" Sansa asked pointing directly at the widescreen TV on the left side of the wall.

"Oh yeah that's called a television Ms. Stark." You informed her as you picked up the small remote and pressed the red 'Power' button as soon as she saw the bright screen change color and loud noise start emerging from the strange device Sansa Stark actually leaped back in shock and let a loud gasp.

"My....my goodness! What is that?" She cried clutching her chest in surprise.

"I told you,it's called television think of it as a way used for entertainment like..like watching a play or sword or what you might refer to as a...a knight's tournament of sorts only we watch these...magical picture boxes instead." You tried your best to explain while handing her the remote and teaching her how to operate it correctly after a while she got the hang of it.


"Simply astonishing!" She exclaimed as she used the channel buttons to flip through the TV like mad gasping loudly as she witnessed hundreds of colors and some of the most bizarre images one from her medieval age ever saw before turning back to you beaming.

"And this 'television' is another one of your technology?"

"Yeah there's plenty things like this here in what we call the modern world. Are you hungry by any chance?" You asked studying her for a second you hoped she hasn't caught wind the way you were staring at her but she seemed too engrossed in staring around her bizarre,strange whereabouts to notice before turning back to you and shaking her head.

"No thank you. But y-you said this is called t-the modern era? Or Earth? Do you not have knights,princesses,kings or...."

"We did have them Sansa,a very,very long time ago well wait we do have a few queens left here over in a place called England or London...as seen here." As you again showed her the globe and pointed to the U.K. and even managed to show her a few pictures from your world's own medieval history as her eyes widened.

"Oh by the gods...that's horrible!"

"Yeah so are you hungry...oh you already said no but are you tired? As I..we do have a small guest room down the hall." As you gestured to it as she again shook her head.

"No thank you but can I see more of this amazing 'technology' you have? I'd love to see more of this America-United States!" The once tortured eldest Stark child was becoming ever more happy and eager to explore more of this era.

"Well okay here you can escort me...."

1522.title: the portal is still there

choices: A video game character, anime or cartoon character
1523.content:
As you get to your room, you see something that instantly stops you in your tracks. A few metres ahead of you, you see your normal self, sitting on a small chair, sighing heavily while looking at the telescope. With no intention to alert your male counterpart, you tiptoe towards your wardrobe, quietly opening and hiding behind a nearby cupboard. Male clothing surrounds you and it somehow makes you feel uncomfortable, despite the fact that you have only been a girl for a few minutes. You feel your masculinity shrinking rapidly.

Trying to shrug off the feeling of your gender issue, you instead focus on what your next move should be. Should you come out of the closet? Maybe you should stay and remain unnoticed. Floods of different scenarios get inserted in your brain but soon enough, a scarce feeling of Déjà vu hits you hard in the brain, full knowledge of what is going to happen within the five minutes stuck in your thoughts. Slowly, you open your wardrobe door, letting a little bit of your bedroom light shine on your watch. Checking your wrist, you look at the time, trying to figure out when the portal explosion will likely occur. According to your recent memories, you estimate the explosion is going to happen within 12 seconds. In preparation, you slowly count down the numbers, whispering to yourself to a noise level where no-one can hear you.

"Twelve."

"Eleven."

"Ten."

"Nine."

"Eight."

Counting down the numbers in your head, you soon start to get nervous gradually, resulting in your numbers being said more slowly. You take a few milliseconds of hesitation before continuing the count.

"Seven."

"Six."

"Five."

"Four."

Moments before you fully finished your count, a sudden explosion booms downstairs, startling you a little. Without hesitation, you sprint down towards the living room, hiding behind a nearby sofa, patiently and anxiously waiting for something else to happen. The most important part of the portal has yet to start.

A few seconds go by, and your eyes stay focused at the portal as you observe someone or something step out of it. To the side of your hiding place, you can hear your male self, walking down with heavy footsteps. You ignore it easily, instead, wanting to have one question answered.

Who came out of the portal?

1523321.content:
You gasp in shock as you catch sight of the woman laying in front of your couch, you can't believe your eyes! if you remembered your facts right this beautiful woman is the incredible Marilyn Monroe! "But that can't be right. She died at the age of 36 didn't she? More importantly how is she alive!?!" You ask yourself in your head, however you don't get to question it as Marilyn lets out a groan of what you assume to be pain! Quickly springing into action, you put her on the couch, being careful to not cause harm to her.

You quickly grab her a blanket and drape it over her and grab a glass of water for her and yourself. From the way she looked, you had a feeling this was going to be a very long night...

10 minutes later...

You're awoken with a start as Marilyn groans apparently awakening from her slumber, you're up and at her side within seconds. Quickly saying "Whoa there, Ma'am! Don't move to much, you may hurt yourself!" She hears you and gasps for a moment, blinking quickly in shock as she asks you...

info.brief_description: A portal shows up in your home & you'll be shocked when a person shows up!
info.description:
Okay the plot is simple: Your just enjoying some peace out on the back porch of your house until you hear a loud crash in the house. You go to check it out & find a portal! As for who steps out of it is up to you.

Now I only have 7 rules
1. Don't insult other people or religions!
2. No text slang!
3. No death at all!
4. No turning good matured characters evil!
5. Don't make your adds just one sentence (Unless it's a choice chapter) a paragraph or 2 will be fine.
6. Don't derail a plotline just cause you don't like it I don't mind plots getting derailed when it makes sense but when it confuses the readers that's where I draw the line.
7. No REPEAT options please.

Other then that Anything is fair game. However should ANYONE break these rules There Will Be Consequences!!!


(Quick little update here because I just realized I never put in a disclaimer! All the characters, powers, music etc. all belong to their respective owners I don't own any of the things used in this interactive, the only thing I DO own is the main character.)

Now that that's been cleared up please enjoy the story!
